These skeletons have the minion trait and are under the bone prophet's control; the bone prophet can give all these minions the same command with a single action that has the concentrate trait. Any skeletal minions that still remain after 10 minutes crumble to dust.

pkqZFkDwe6SFvUXX.name: Serpentfolk Venom
pkqZFkDwe6SFvUXX.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d4}[poison]]]{2d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

Bottlenose Dolphin.name: Bottlenose Dolphin
Bottlenose Dolphin.publicNotes: The bottlenose dolphin is the most common and widespread species of dolphin. They are social predators who hunt shallow seas and rivers in large family groups called pods. Sailors are fond of bottlenose dolphins and frequently tell tales of how they save drowning fishers or kill sharks with blows from their powerful snouts.

TBp1tYUPtYoOEonO.name: Aquatic Echolocation
TBp1tYUPtYoOEonO.description: A bottlenose dolphin can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range, but only underwater.

khgGPSxgTQcgev3o.name: Deep Breath
khgGPSxgTQcgev3o.description: A bottlenose dolphin can hold its breath for 2 hours.

jN9qLXiQfaOBlFfC.name: Ramming Speed
jN9qLXiQfaOBlFfC.description: The bottlenose dolphin @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swims} twice and then makes a snout Strike. As long as it moved at least 20尺, it gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. A Large or smaller creature hit by this attack must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Bralani.name: Bralani
Bralani.publicNotes: Bralanis embody the freedom of fair competition, embracing opportunities to test their skills against worthy foes and bring mortals together with the thrill of good-natured sports and contests. Their interest in constructive conflict also extends to higher stakes, such as diplomatic negotiations. In these cases, bralanis ensure that neither side's desires are crushed by the other's and work as mediators when needed. They believe in friendly contests to diffuse tension. When discussions are going well, bralanis step back, allowing the participants to shape their own futures. They delight in sailing through violent storms as wind, basking in the raw energy.

X4D3vNjnicVrqgiG.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

zD1p5wo8W7il4Xw4.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
zD1p5wo8W7il4Xw4.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

ManCGXxwaYWyKQzU.name: 气化形体(随意施法) Gaseous Form (At will)
ManCGXxwaYWyKQzU.description:
目标变化成气体形态。在这个状态中，目标形态不定，并且失去任何AC上的物品价值。它对物理伤害获得抗力8，并且免疫精准伤害。它无法施放法术，激活物品，或者使用具有攻击或者操作特征的动作。它获得10尺飞行速度，并且可以钻过超小型的裂隙。目标可以解消该法术。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.sILRkGTwoBywy0BU]{法术效果：气化形体}

Cj6s7OuIDPePwy5R.name: 造风术(随意施法) Gust of Wind (At will)
Cj6s7OuIDPePwy5R.description:
一团暴风从你的掌中喷出，从你施放法术时所在位置直吹到线形终点。这团风吹灭所有小的非魔法火焰，吹散云和雾，吹起负载轻或者更低的物体，并且会推动更大的物体。区域中大型或者更小的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。在之后进入风中的大型或者更小的生物也必须在进入时尝试该豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物无法顶风移动。

失败 该生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。如果它在飞行，它改为承受大失败效果。

大失败 该生物被沿风向推离30尺，倒地，并且承受2d6钝击伤害。

BAJs3gJ34CxRZX5W.name: Fair Competition
BAJs3gJ34CxRZX5W.description: Once per day, a bralani can spend 1 minute to bless willing creatures within 100 feet who are about to participate in a contest. This blessing lasts 24 hours. If a blessed creature cheats or uses the contest to harm another, the creature grows visibly ill, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} and unable to remove this condition for the duration or until they withdraw from the competition. At the end of the contest, participants who competed fairly find it easier to negotiate and understand their opponent's perspective. For 1 hour, they gain a +2 status bonus to Diplomacy checks and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} checks that directly pertain to their opponents.

arLLxzC2PfddWyB8.name: Whirlwind Blast
arLLxzC2PfddWyB8.description: The bralani generates a @Template[type:line|distance:20] of scouring wind that deals [[/r {7d6}[bludgeoning]]]{7d6钝击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save). It can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

scNTrSPuw9K5tRtq.name: Wind Form
scNTrSPuw9K5tRtq.description: A bralani flies at full Speed in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{气化形体 Gaseous Form}.

Brood Leech Swarm.name: Brood Leech Swarm
Brood Leech Swarm.publicNotes: Most smaller species of leeches do not tend to swarm, but brood leeches are prone to gathering in seething, undulant mats of squirming gluttony. When they gather in sufficient numbers to swarm, they eschew the stealth of a lone leech's feeding methods in favor of swift and merciless feeding. In these situations, their mild venom can affect much larger creatures than their usual prey.

ome4gBGaz20PH3OU.name: Blood Draining Bites
ome4gBGaz20PH3OU.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] and is exposed to brood leech swarm venom.

SZrUoVGK2e5HE1dm.name: Brood Leech Swarm Venom
SZrUoVGK2e5HE1dm.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}, and -5-foot status penalty to Speed (1轮)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}, and -10-foot status penalty to Speed (1轮).

Brownie.name: Brownie
Brownie.publicNotes:
Brownies make their homes in the trunks of hollow trees, small earthy burrows, and even under porches or within the crawl spaces of farmhouses. Often attired in clothes that appear to be made of plants or leaves, brownies wear belts lined with pouches and tools. Whatever language they choose to speak is often is riddled with odd pronunciations and colloquialisms. Their manner of speaking might call upon turns of phrase that are decades or even centuries out of vogue, for example, or they might mix up their metaphors in strange ways. It almost seems as if brownies adopt these quirky ways of speaking intentionally-certainly they do not react favorably to corrections to their chatter. There's often no swifter way to annoy a brownie than to try to correct its grammar. Brownies stand barely 2 feet tall and weigh about 20 pounds.

When facing danger, brownies rarely engage in combat, preferring instead to confound and confuse their attackers in order to buy enough time for escape. Content with honest toil and the love of their kin, brownies maintain a pacifist nature, harassing creatures only to run them off or punish them for an insult. Despite this nature, all brownies carry a blade. They refer to their swords with a hint of disgust, and jokingly call their blades their "final trick," reserving their use for the direst of circumstances.

Honest to a fault, brownies take freely but always repay their debt through work or leave something behind as an offering. They may eat an apple from a farmer's orchard but harvest the entire tree as repayment. A brownie might eat an entire pie left on a windowsill, only to straighten up the kitchen or wash the dishes. A brownie can share a home with a family for years and years while avoiding detection. A family that is aware of a brownie in their midst usually finds this a beneficial relationship and leaves dishes of milk, pieces of fruit, trinkets, and sometimes even wine as gifts. In exchange, the resident brownie keeps the home clean, mends clothes, repairs tools, and shoos away vermin and small predators. Bragging about having a brownie in the house is the best way to lose one. Brownies distrust foxes and fear wolves, and they avoid farms with dogs.

Ys2OTavkoyvMU7QG.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

4dJ4DHIq0hvHbkYj.name: 次元门(仅限自身) Dimension Door (Self Only)
4dJ4DHIq0hvHbkYj.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

4Uoy7JHv0Ea9SrCr.name: Baffling Bluff
4Uoy7JHv0Ea9SrCr.description:
The brownie's antics can confuse and disorient a creature. When the brownie uses Baffling Bluff, it targets a single creature within 30 feet; that creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17] save.

The target is temporarily immune to Baffling Bluff for 1 minute.

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target is fooled momentarily and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the next melee Strike the brownie makes against it before the end of the brownie's next turn.

失败 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for 1 round.

大失败 The target is confused for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confused condition.

Bythos.name: Bythos
Bythos.publicNotes: The bythos is a guardian of space and time, and at all times seeks out those who misuse planar and temporal magic. A bythos is a roughly humanoid creature with four arms and a body made of swirling clouds and mist. Despite its appearance, its body feels like dry stone. A bythos seeks out paradoxes caused by irresponsible planar or dimensional travelers and repairs breaches where the barriers between planes have become thin or damaged. If the mortals responsible remain in the area and cannot be convinced to cease their activities, the bythos has no qualms about removing them. Using its ability to manipulate time, a bythos might cause an opponent to quickly die of old age as time speeds up around them, or cause a target to disappear from time and space.
Bythos.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

xoV74Ad4ZTLkT5re.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

fjNBgwnXVFm9Yc36.name: 卜筮术(随意施法) Augury (At will)
fjNBgwnXVFm9Yc36.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

GXXWozDHxwpERohz.name: 禁锢术() Imprisonment (Temporal stasis only)
GXXWozDHxwpERohz.description:
你执行仪式来禁锢一个生物，禁锢方式需要从多个模式中选择一种。尽管部分版本的仪式会提供所有禁锢模式，但大多数版本只包含了仅仅其中一种或几种模式。无论你选择何种禁锢模式，该效果都是无法被反制的，不过可以被 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{解锢术 Freedom}所解放。部分模式的禁锢术可以通过其他方式结束。因为完成仪式需要在执行仪式的整个过程中都维持在与目标距离10尺的范围内，所以通常来说需要你先制服目标再执行仪式。

  • 锁链 你用锁链束缚目标，使其无法使用交谈之外的任何动作。以任何方式尝试靠近、伤害锁链、或者解放被困生物的其他生物均需要成功通过意志豁免，否则便永远无法再这么做。锁链的硬度为5 x 禁锢术仪式的法术等级，生命值为硬度数值的两倍。摧毁锁链可以解放目标。
  • 物化（9环或更高环级） 你把目标生物变为1寸高、或者头部以下的身体化为烟云样子的虚无形态。无论何种形式，你都会把它困到宝石、罐子、瓶子、灯或者类似的容器里。该生物会停止老化，而且变得不再需要进食或饮水。该生物仍然能够感受到周遭环境，且能够在容器内移动和说话，但是它无法使用任何其他动作。破坏容器会杀死目标而非释放它。此种禁锢术同时还是变化（transmutation）魔法。
  • 密牢（仅限10环） 你把目标以假死状态埋葬到地下深处，放逐至现实之外，因此任何手段都无法靠近目标。你还防止了任何预言魔法揭示出使用此禁锢术的地点。@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish}这样强大的魔法能够揭示出禁锢术的位置，但即便是这样的魔法，也无法将目标从密牢中释放；只有10环的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{解锢术 Freedom} 才能做到这一点。
  • 监牢 目标完全无法离开由你选定的某片特定区域或建筑，比如某个牢房或封闭的洞穴。该魔法也能够防止目标通过破坏自己的监牢——无论是以直接或间接的方式——来逃脱。若目标生物的监牢完全被某种外部力量所摧毁，该生物便会重获自由，尽管对于某些大型或天然的监牢来说，此情况基本无法发生。
  • 沉眠（睡眠效果） 你让目标陷入了永恒的睡眠。它会停止老化，而且不再需要进食或饮水。若有生物真诚地爱着目标（无论是亲情、爱情或者其他类似情感），并且真诚地对目标作出1次用于表示情感的肢体行为，就能够让目标从睡眠中解放出来。此种禁锢术同时还是惑控（enchantment）魔法。
  • 永恒静滞 你把目标置入到时间洪流之外，使其陷入假死状态。该生物不会变老，也不会受到任何来源于正常时间流（normal time stream）的任何效果影响。在施放此仪式时，你能够随意指定任意时间长度的静滞期；在这段时间结束之后，静滞便会结束。与其他模式的禁锢术不同，永恒静滞可以被@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{加速术 Haste} 反制。此种禁锢术同时还是变化（transmutation）魔法。

大成功 你禁锢了目标。你可以使用通常来说需要一个额外法术环级（1 additional spell level）的禁锢术模式，或者让任何尝试使用解锢术（freedom）仪式解放目标时所进行的相关检定承受-2环境减值。

成功 你禁锢了目标。

失败 你未能禁锢目标。

大失败 你把自己和次要施法者以相同的方式禁锢起来，以取代原本的禁锢目标。

升阶 (9环级) 除了其他模式之外，你还能够使用禁锢术的物化模式，并且你能够以至多18级的生物为目标。该仪式的基本开销增加至2000gp。

升阶 (10环级) 除了其他模式之外，你还能够使用禁锢术的物化模式和密牢模式，并且你能够以至多20级的生物为目标。该仪式的基本开销增加至6000gp。

rChIZqOgM2sc4XDf.name: 次元锚(随意施法) Dimensional Anchor (At will)
rChIZqOgM2sc4XDf.description:
你妨碍目标传送以及在次元之间旅行的能力。次元锚会尝试反制任何传送效果，以及任何移动目标到另一个位面的效果。法术持续时间由目标的意志豁免决定。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 该效果持续时间为1分钟。

失败 该效果持续时间为10分钟。

大失败 该效果持续时间为1小时。

52OH24WzpzdT3ptJ.name: Envisioning
52OH24WzpzdT3ptJ.description:
When a bythos conveys information, it does so wordlessly through psychic projections. This acts as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]{Telepathy} with a range of 100 feet but is understandable to all creatures regardless of whether they have a language.

The meaning to non-aeons can be vague and is often mysterious. A bythos can use this ability to communicate flawlessly with any other aeon on the same plane.

3c01H24sjgfJHyvI.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

Ai8J0A4OuhkDr7Cx.name: Confusing Gaze
Ai8J0A4OuhkDr7Cx.description:
30 feet.

A creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:34] save. If it fails, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for 1 round (or [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} on a critical failure).

x5lmNBtvBd1z0Azh.name: Temporal Reversion
x5lmNBtvBd1z0Azh.description:
触发 The bythos fails or critically fails a check

频率 每天一次

效果 The bythos rerolls the triggering check and takes the better result.

4PafOhYr090tdIQE.name: Aging Strikes
4PafOhYr090tdIQE.description:
The bythos make two fist Strikes against a single target. If both Strikes hit, the target attempts a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37] save. Creatures that don't get weaker with age or don't age are immune (GM's discretion).

If a creature becomes clumsy 4, drained 4, and enfeebled 4 due to Aging Strikes, it dies of old age.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}, or increases each of these conditions by 1. This effect is cumulative with other aging strikes from bythoses, to a maximum of clumsy 4, drained 4, and enfeebled 4.

大失败 As failure, but the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, or increases these conditions by 2.

WPlqW6SIzbL8jscs.name: Focused Gaze
WPlqW6SIzbL8jscs.description: The bythos focuses its gaze on a creature it can see within 30 feet. The target must attempt a save against the bythos's confusing gaze. A bythos can't use this ability against the same creature more than once per turn.

Qgjku7yO52q21NCG.name: Temporal Flurry
Qgjku7yO52q21NCG.description: The bythos makes four fist Strikes. Its multiple attack penalty increases normally with each attack.

bBQMy1lr5xW6rBgj.name: Temporal Strike
bBQMy1lr5xW6rBgj.description:
The bythos touches a creature or object to displace it from time. The target attempts a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect] save.

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 Time flows around the target; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

失败 The target disappears from the present moment and reappears in the same location [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} later as if no time had passed for it. If a creature or object occupies that space when the target returns, the target appears in the closest available space to its original location.

大失败 As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for an extra [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} after it returns.

Cairn Wight.name: Cairn Wight
Cairn Wight.publicNotes:
Jealous guardians of tombs, barrows, and sepulchers, cairn wights usually spawn from necromantic rituals. For those mortals who cannot abide the thought of separation from their earthly possessions, the undead existence offered by transformation into a cairn wight can be tempting. Perhaps as frequently, particularly avaricious and wealthy royalty or merchants seek out victims to transform into cairn wights to guard their precious wealth for all time.

Only in the rarest instances is the greed of a mortal strong enough to spontaneously transform them into a cairn wight without a dark ritual or the intercession of a powerful divine being. On those occasions, however, the resultant wight exhibits unmatched viciousness and likely owns rare treasure indeed.

As guardians of material possessions, cairn wights are supernaturally bound to the armaments they wore during the ritual used to create them. They can spread their necromantic powers into the weapons they wield. A slash from a cairn wight's sword channels life from the victim into the wight.

aWo3aVa2XXkGsrLY.name: Final Spite
aWo3aVa2XXkGsrLY.description:
触发 The cairn wight is reduced to 0 Hit Points

效果 The cairn wight makes a Strike before being destroyed. It doesn't gain any temporary HP from drain life on this Strike.

gixaFzYqsyV9bsLi.name: Cairn Wight Spawn
gixaFzYqsyV9bsLi.description: A living humanoid slain by a cairn wight's weapon or claw Strike rises as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.sMNqIHHxcVBXG08h]{Spawned Wight} after [[/br 1d4 #Cairn Wight Spawn Transformation]]{1d4轮}. This spawned wight is under the command of the cairn wight that killed it. It doesn't have drain life or cairn wight spawn and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} for as long as it is a spawned wight. If its creator dies, the spawned wight becomes a full-fledged, autonomous cairn wight; it regains its free will, gains drain life and cairn wight spawn, and is no longer clumsy.

KTxjm0shb9zyrh0z.name: Drain Life
KTxjm0shb9zyrh0z.description: When the cairn wight damages a living creature with a melee Strike, using an unarmed attack or its bound weapon, the cairn wight gains [[/r 5 #Temporary Hit Points]]{5 temporary Hit Points} and the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}. Further damage dealt by the cairn wraith increases the drained condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

eG5iE2SpiXdvquWh.name: Funereal Dirge
eG5iE2SpiXdvquWh.description:
The cairn wight chants a low, haunting melody. Living creatures within @Template[type:emanation|distance:50]{50尺} must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save.

The cairn wight can't chant a new Funereal Dirge for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Funereal Dirge]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} and takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against drain life.

Calathgar.name: Calathgar
Calathgar.publicNotes:
Calathgars are mysterious predatory plants that grow in the depths of the densest frozen forests, realms where icicles rarely melt from snow-cloaked trees. A calathgar's blue flowers grow from 3 to 5 feet across (with specimens as wide as 10 feet reported), while the plant itself stands just under 4 feet in height and weighs up to 50 pounds when heavy with seeds.

Calathgars' psyches are alien to most sapient creatures. They have little interest in emotion, culture, or ambition, yet they have nearly flawless memories and can share experiences with other calathgars by 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)as easily as humanoids can pass on information by speech. While calathgars themselves can't speak, they can typically be reasoned with-though like most protective parents, an incensed calathgar defending its young is rarely in a mood to listen.

rdri6pl6hY1glOfy.name: Cold Healing
rdri6pl6hY1glOfy.description:
Calathgars are healed by cold. Anytime a calathgar would take cold damage, it instead regains [[/r {1d6}[healing]]]{1d6 Hit Points} (regardless of the amount of damage the cold effect would have caused).

In severe cold or colder environments,9 calathgars gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing} 1.

UbbiLTnNP4WGrar5.name: Mold Mulch
UbbiLTnNP4WGrar5.description: When a calathgar is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it immediately decays and dies, transforming into a 5-foot patch of mold (or a 10-foot patch of mold if it was killed by fire damage). This patch of mold persists for 1 minute, during which time it deals [[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold伤害} to any creature that begins its turn in this area, or [[/r {1d6}[cold]]]{1d6 cold伤害} to any creature that begins its turn in an adjacent square. The mold patch decays away after an hour, but it can be destroyed before then (treat each 5-foot square as an object with Hardness 0, 10 Hit Points, BT 5, immunity to cold, piercing, and slashing damage; the mold deals half its regular cold damage once it's broken).

s23ZMm1sJc7XLyKW.name: Seed Spray
s23ZMm1sJc7XLyKW.description:
The calathgar expels thorny, frozen seeds in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], dealing [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6穿刺伤害} and [[/r {4d6}[cold]]]{4d6 cold伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true] save).

In mild cold or colder environments, these seeds cling to living creatures they strike, dealing [[/r {1d4}[persistent,cold]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续 Cold伤害}.

The calathgar can't use Seed Spray again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Caligni Slayer.name: Caligni Slayer
Caligni Slayer.publicNotes:
Caligni slayers possess greater occult talents than others of their kind. In most other calignis, the power bartered from the long-lost demigods known as the Forsaken merely burns within. But in caligni slayers, this power is a deep and terrible hunger. Slayers embrace their evil impulses as a result, and they seek to feed on others with their soul harvest ability to keep this supernatural hunger sated. Slayers denied the opportunity to feed descend into paranoia and, eventually, murderous rage.

Delayed feeding improves but never fully restores their composure and patience. Perhaps the greatest manifestation of a slayer's hunger appears at the moment of their death. Upon its last breath, a slayer collapses into itself in a violent, lightless implosion, rather than the blinding eruption of other calignis' deaths, consuming the body itself in a final attempt at satiation.

Slayers view themselves as the cleverest and most gifted of the calignis. They seethe with ill-concealed envy at the position of power caligni stalkers occupy, ever scheming to displace them and claim that power for their own. For their part, stalkers tolerate these machinations as an acceptable price for the talents slayers contribute to an enclave. If necessary, any slayer who grows too ambitious can become a brave sacrifice in battle, for the good of the enclave. In physical stature, slayers fall between the willowy caligni dancers and the diminutive creepers. Stalkers tower above most slayers-yet another source of slayers' envy and resentment.

opNwYrwABCLTV4vZ.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

rcWb1X7tL04A2SNN.name: 黑暗术(随意施法) Darkness (At Will)
rcWb1X7tL04A2SNN.description:
你创造一片黑暗的帷幕，光线无法穿透，并且光源无法在区域中发光。光线无法进入该区域，并且任何非魔法光源，例如火炬或者提灯，在区域中不会发出任何光线，即使其光照可能到达黑暗术之外也是如此。这也会压制等于或低于你的黑暗术环级的魔法光亮。光线无法穿透，所以在区域中的生物无法看到外面。对于外面，这看起来如同一团纯粹黑暗的球。

升阶 (4环级) 即使具有黑暗视觉的生物（但不包括高等黑暗视觉）也几乎无法看穿这黑暗。它们透过黑暗看到的生物视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

u2Swu9GqcWTekOge.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
u2Swu9GqcWTekOge.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

SO2jaHTafmBJ8DGi.name: Black Smear Poison
SO2jaHTafmBJ8DGi.description:
Many calignis use a debilitating poison crafted from subterranean fungi.

Activate T Interact (Injury)

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 如阶段1

阶段3 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

uzTaJDrIHuQpGZCH.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

sMQewzNATahHc65F.name: Death Implosion
sMQewzNATahHc65F.description:
When the caligni slayer dies, their body implodes violently into nothingness, dealing [[/r {3d10}[sonic]]]{3d10 sonic伤害} to creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|traits:damaging-effect] save.

The slayer's gear and treasure are unaffected by the implosion and are left in a pile where they died.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage.

失败 The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for 1 minute.

大失败 The creature takes double damage and is deafened for 24 hours.

s7GGq81IzCx73D2B.name: Call to Blood
s7GGq81IzCx73D2B.description:
Each caligni within 30 feet gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} creatures. This bonus lasts for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.v54mj5jknAynlCM9]{Effect: Call to Blood}

WtPKkX18bEjTQBFy.name: Soul Harvest
WtPKkX18bEjTQBFy.description: The caligni slayer deals an additional [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6负能量伤害} to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} creatures.

Carbuncle.name: Carbuncle
Carbuncle.publicNotes: Never have legend and misinformation met upon a more inauspicious brow than that of the lowly carbuncle. At first glance, carbuncles appear to be little more than ungainly reptiles. What sets them apart is their strange magical abilities and the gemstone-like horn protruding from between their goggling eyes. Although rumors suggest various uses for carbuncle horns, ranging from miracle cure-alls to potent magical components, the truth is much more mundane: a carbuncle's horn is merely a highly reflective growth, not unlike a fingernail.

EungEyymZcbKAl61.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

wJAzn02M6Mv8HeZj.name: 浮空术(随意施法,仅限自身) Levitate (At will) (Self only)
wJAzn02M6Mv8HeZj.description:
你移去重力，令目标漂浮距离地面5尺。在法术持续时间中，你可以通过一个单动作移动目标上或者下移10尺，这具有专注特征。因浮空术而漂浮的生物在攻击骰上承受-2环境减值。漂浮的生物可以花费一个交互（Interact）动作来稳定自身，并在其回合剩余时间里取消该减值。如果目标邻接一个固定的物体，或者足够稳定的地形，他可以通过攀爬（如果平面是垂直的，例如一堵墙）或者匍匐（如果平面是水平的，例如天花板）沿着该平面移动。GM决定具体什么表面可以攀爬，什么表面应当匍匐。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.JqrTrvwV7pYStMXz]{法术效果：浮空术}

1Hex7UaPya8easf7.name: 跳跃术(随意施法) Jump (At will)
1Hex7UaPya8easf7.description:
你的腿充满力量，以跳得更高更远。你向任何方向跳跃30尺且不会接触地面。你必须在30尺内的有坚实地面的空间上落地，否则你会在使用你下个动作后摔倒。

升阶 (3环级) 该射程变为接触，目标变为一个接触到的生物，持续时间变为1分钟，目标能够在使用跳跃（Leap）动作时总如上文所述地跳跃。

43BphUu4vcCAeieN.name: Carbuncle Empathy
43BphUu4vcCAeieN.description: The carbuncle can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]{Telepathically} send mild feelings and sensations to nearby creatures. It can't use this ability to communicate in language or hinder a target, but it might convey a feeling of dread or the scent of food cooking nearby.

nnl33KWF4lCqql97.name: Easy to Influence
nnl33KWF4lCqql97.description: Any mental spell can affect a carbuncle, regardless of creature type limitations. Against a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion} spell, a carbuncle always gets an outcome one degree of success worse than it rolled on its saving throw.

ysLsaBnQ2SlAerXO.name: Fatal Faker
ysLsaBnQ2SlAerXO.description:
触发 The carbuncle takes damage

效果 The carbuncle feigns death by teleporting away and leaving a replica of its corpse behind, creating a colorful flash of light and a croaking sound. The real carbuncle transports to a clear space within 30 feet that it can see, and a hollow shell remains behind. The fake body appears solid until it is touched, at which point it crumbles to dust.

XaaNqqz2ZFyt0c4o.name: Specious Suggestion
XaaNqqz2ZFyt0c4o.description:
频率 three times per day

效果 The carbuncle concentrates on a creature it can see and tries to manipulate that creature. The target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:18] save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

大成功 The attempt backfires and bolsters the target's mind instead, granting it a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws for 1 hour.

成功 The target briefly experiences an unusual but harmless sensation like an unexpected flavor or scent, an urge to eat something strange, or an amusing half-forgotten memory.

失败 The target is compelled to spend all of its actions on its next turn performing harmless, pointless, and usually embarrassing actions.

大失败 As failure, but the compulsion persists for 1 minute. The target can attempt a new save at the end of its turn each round to end the effect.

Carnivorous Blob.name: Carnivorous Blob
Carnivorous Blob.publicNotes: Carnivorous blobs are the ravenous spawn of shattered worlds far beyond the stars, born across the galaxy in inert form until they fall like meteorites onto unsuspecting worlds. These massive beings can lie dormant for years in desolate caverns or barren wastelands. When a carnivorous blob perceives living creatures nearby, it lurches to gelatinous life, seeking out and consuming every creature it can catch until it is destroyed or until it has been unable to locate food for 24 hours, at which point it returns to hibernation. Often, keeping food away from a carnivorous blob is the safest way to defeat it. The blob's ability to split into smaller oozes that might stay hidden after a fight means it can be hard to fully eradicate these mindless predators.

UTaJ0rJXzssLeINs.name: Motion Sense
UTaJ0rJXzssLeINs.description: A carnivorous blob can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

ByGE43xowJglhHxP.name: Reactive Strikes
ByGE43xowJglhHxP.description:
触发 The carnivorous blob takes damage from any source

效果 The blob makes a pseudopod Strike against an adjacent target. If an adjacent creature dealt the triggering damage, that creature is the target of this Reactive Strike.

kryZwH2P5QUcvtyI.name: Split
kryZwH2P5QUcvtyI.description: When a carniverous blob that has 10 or more HP is hit by an attack that would deal piercing or slashing damage, it splits into two identical oozes, each with half the original's HP. One ooze is in the same space as the original, and the other is in an adjacent, unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, it automatically pushes creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space (the GM decides if an object or creature is too big or heavy to push).

xNfSi1bsS4hwfcXU.name: Carnivorous Blob Acid
xNfSi1bsS4hwfcXU.description: A carnivorous blob's acid damages only flesh-not bone, stone, wood, or other materials- but is nonetheless devastating. Whenever a creature takes damage from this acid, it must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (drained 2 on a critical failure). On each subsequent failure, the drained condition value increases by 1 (or by 2 on a critical failure), to a maximum of drained 4.

Carrion Golem.name: Carrion Golem
Carrion Golem.publicNotes: Carrion golems are foul-smelling and fly-swarmed amalgams of putrefied parts stitched together from many different creatures. Unlike most golems, carrion golems only rarely are given a humanoid form, instead appearing more twisted and bestial in frame. As a result, some students of golem crafting claim that the carrion golem isn't a "true golem," but regardless of those claims these foul constructs certainly share other golem-like traits, including their significant immunities. What is true is that most who craft carrion golems don't do so out of true interest in the technique of golem crafting, but for the golem's ability to spread disease. The crafters of carrion golems send their mindless minions to cause immediate destruction and leave wakes of illness and death behind them.

OEYNgSplNvqswLPK.name: Golem Antimagic
OEYNgSplNvqswLPK.description:
harmed by fire ([[/r 4d6]], [[/r 1d8]] from areas or persistent damage); healed by electricity (area [[/r 1d6]] HP); slowed by cold

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. If an entry lists multiple types (such as “cold and water”), either type of spell can affect the golem.

Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical.

Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical.

Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for that round.

Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.

hswGSODfM3HdK8zC.name: Stench
hswGSODfM3HdK8zC.description:
40 feet.

A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for as long as it's sickened on a critical failure). While within the aura, affected creatures take a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

AldxbbHYC1u6qB4A.name: Vulnerable to Gentle Repose
AldxbbHYC1u6qB4A.description: Casting a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]{Gentle Repose} spell on a carrion golem causes it to grow stiff. The golem attempts a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] save. It's unaffected on a critical success, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} on a success, and on a failure is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} and slowed for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

k2d7PB0MeYOIfjcj.name: Filth Fever
k2d7PB0MeYOIfjcj.description:
The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} conditions from filth fever can't end or be reduced until the disease is cured.

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

阶段1 carrier with no ill effect ([[/br 1d4 #hours]]{1d4小时})

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} as long as it remains sickened (1天)

阶段4 unconscious (1天)

阶段5 dead

Catrina.name: Catrina
Catrina.publicNotes:
Not all spirits who enter the Boneyard realize they have died. Catrinas meet these souls, helping to convince them of the finality of their fate to ease a spirit's passing. Catrinas are more likely to intervene when a mortal can't accept their death. They perform their task to keep the afterlife calm, rather than out of true compassion for a mortal's grief. Catrinas only rarely visit the Material Plane, typically to help an extremely important mortal pass on.

Catrinas resemble skeletons dressed in bright flowers and colorful dresses, giving them a simultaneously festive and macabre appearance. Though most catrinas present as feminine, masculine catrinas still dress in bright colors and carry garlands of flowers.
Catrina.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

pqUWKgysApGeGzWo.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

jw75q6Yh45aJWTbt.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
jw75q6Yh45aJWTbt.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

56O2v35BcXiX1Ksi.name: 死者交谈(随意施法) Talking Corpse (At will)
56O2v35BcXiX1Ksi.description:
你赋予目标尸体生命的要素，令其能够回答三个你向它提出的问题。该法术会唤起身躯的潜在记忆，而不是唤回目标已经死去的灵魂，所以该法术需要该尸体基本完好才能运作。尸体受到的损伤越多，其回答的笼统与拼凑程度也就越大，并且它必须要有嘴和喉咙才有可能说话。如果任何人在一周内已经对该尸体施放了该法术，该法术会自动失败。该尸体可以尝试一次意志豁免来抵抗回答该问题，使用其原本生物在死亡时的数据，并且有下列效果。

大成功 目标可以撒谎或者拒绝回答你的问题，并且该目标的灵魂会对你作祟24小时，不断干扰你，令你在此期间无法获得任何休息。

成功 目标可以提供错误的信息，或者拒绝回答你的问题。

失败 目标必须如实回答问题，但它的回答可以是简短的，谜语般的，重复的。它仍然可以误导你，或者尝试拖延时间，以令在你问完所有问题之前法术持续时间耗尽。

大失败 如同失败，但是目标的答案会更加直接，很少重复，但仍然如同谜语。在它欺骗和误导你的欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-2状态减值。

fJsYqRu8WagF6tZb.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自己) Invisibility (At will) (Self only)
fJsYqRu8WagF6tZb.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

oPWhso0y4ezQpGaJ.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

chnUQOapjPm4tXAS.name: Calming Presence
chnUQOapjPm4tXAS.description:
30 feet.

A creature that begins its turn within the area must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:18] save.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to calming presence for 24 hours.

成功 The creature's attack rolls take a -1 status penalty for 1 round.

失败 Any emotion effects that would affect the creature are suppressed and the creature can't use hostile actions. If the creature is subjected to hostility from any other creature, it ceases to be affected by calming presence and is temporarily immune to calming presence for 24 hours.

大失败 As failure, but hostility doesn't end the effect.

sabgo6OVGbFhpOOA.name: Compel Condemned
sabgo6OVGbFhpOOA.description:
The catrina telepathically compels a creature within 30 feet to approach and allow the catrina to kiss them, in preparation for using Kiss of Death. The target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save.

成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Compel Condemned for 24 hours.

失败 The creature must spend each of its actions to move closer to the catrina as quickly as possible, while avoiding obvious dangers. If the compelled creature is adjacent to the catrina, it stays still and doesn't act. If the creature takes any damage, the effect ends and the creature is temporarily immune to Compel Condemned for 24 hours. This effect lasts for 1 round, but if the catrina uses this ability again on subsequent rounds, it extend the duration by 1 round for all affected creatures.

大失败 As failure, but damage does not end the effect.

6gE7wfS2bLW0PuDW.name: Kiss of Death
6gE7wfS2bLW0PuDW.description:
The catrina gives a long, passionate kiss to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} or willing creature, dealing [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6负能量伤害}.

Any creature damaged by the same catrina's Kiss of Death for 3 consecutive rounds becomes unconscious and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying 1}.

jwZ2PMloPddIckyK.name: Spirit Touch
jwZ2PMloPddIckyK.description: An catrina's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch} property rune and deal [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害} to living creatures and [[/r {1d6}[positive]]]{1d6 positive伤害} to undead.

Cave Fisher.name: Cave Fisher
Cave Fisher.publicNotes:
Cave fishers lurk in dark corners near the ceilings of caves and underground structures, lying in wait for prey to approach. When it does, the cave fisher excretes thin, tough, and very sticky filaments at its prey with lightning speed to capture it.

A cave fisher eats just about any live prey smaller than itself, though anything smaller than a rat isn't much of a meal for it. When a cave fisher captures such a creature, it often leaves the hapless animal entangled, using it as bait to attract larger creatures. Because the adhesive on its filament doesn't last long, the fisher frequently needs to eat one filament and excrete a new one. The filaments are translucent and can be hard to see when they're still and in darkness.

Cave fishers hatch with the ability to excrete filaments, but they molt many times before reaching their adult size of about 7 feet long and 400 pounds. They often leave shed shells in conspicuous locations as decoys.

TdOAA9HgzD5psJwW.name: Pull Filament
TdOAA9HgzD5psJwW.description: The cave fisher pulls a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by its filament toward itself, even suspending the target vertically if necessary. The cave fisher attempts an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the cave fisher pulls the creature 15 feet closer to it (30 feet closer on a critical success).

xCffJ5CYclgmYzmC.name: Sticky Filament
xCffJ5CYclgmYzmC.description: Any creature hit by the cave fisher's sticky filament is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. The cave fisher can move while it has a creature grabbed with its filament, but it automatically releases the creature if the cave fisher moves beyond the filament's 60-foot length. The cave fisher can use only one filament at a time, and it can sever the filament and release any creature grabbed by it as a free action. The filament can be severed by a Strike that deals at least [[/r 10 #slashing]]{10 slashing伤害} to it. This doesn't deal any damage to the cave fisher itself. The filament has AC 17, and its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} DC is 19.

Cave Scorpion.name: Cave Scorpion
Cave Scorpion.publicNotes:
Cave scorpions prefer to reside in underground lairs. Most have lost nearly all of their pigmentation, making them appear ghostly when they lurk at the edge of the light. While they prefer to eat large insects, cave scorpions can and will attack humanoids. Some Darklands societies have developed techniques to herd or lure scorpions into pest-infested tunnels and warrens at the edge of their settlements, where the scorpions thrive in a dual role of exterminators and guardians.

Scorpions are frightening enough at their normal diminutive size, but when they grow to reach or surpass the size of a human, they become absolutely terrifying.
Cave Scorpion.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

foIpp0GPCbsHL0dl.name: Cave Scorpion Venom
foIpp0GPCbsHL0dl.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮).

Cavern Troll.name: Cavern Troll
Cavern Troll.publicNotes:
Insatiable scavengers stalking the eternal gloom of the Darklands, cavern trolls consume all in their path-even rocks and minerals when more nourishing sustenance is scarce. These rocky goliaths can tunnel through stone with their iron-sharp claws.

Cavern trolls rarely venture to the surface world, for they have a debilitating vulnerability to sunlight that petrifies them on sustained contact. Unlike common trolls, cavern trolls can regenerate wounds dealt by fire. The crystalline nature of their skin, however, permits sonic attacks to neutralize their signature regeneration.

As cavern trolls age, their flinty skin becomes studded with small crystals and stones of various composition. Paragons of their kind have toothy maws replete with large, crystalline fangs. A typical cavern troll stands 14 feet in height and weighs about 2,000 pounds.

jG3O965IQDZgxg9B.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

tuQ8FrXL4iChAQA1.name: Sunlight Petrification
tuQ8FrXL4iChAQA1.description: If exposed to direct sunlight, a cavern troll immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions or Trample. The slowed value increases by 1 each time the cavern troll ends its turn in sunlight. If the cavern troll's actions are reduced to 0 in this way, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified} until they spends at least 1 minute in darkness. Spells like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst} that create magical sunlight cannot petrify a cavern troll, but the troll is slowed 1 for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} after being exposed to such an effect.

BczEX9fZ2q5qXxKI.name: Rock Tunneler
BczEX9fZ2q5qXxKI.description: A cavern troll can burrow through solid stone at a Speed of 10 feet. It can leave a tunnel if it desires.

Chernobue.name: Chernobue
Chernobue.publicNotes: The chernobue infects all creatures it encounters with itself, spreading pain and calamity wherever it flops and writhes. It sheds ruin and sups on anguish, but a chernobue can sometimes be persuaded to pause for a few moments of conversation if its partner in discourse can keep its attention by providing enough atrocious details. Resembling a tumor-like growth of oily blackness, this vile monstrosity has numerous muscular tentacles, a single glaring baleful eye, and a drooling, toothy maw in the middle of its body.
Chernobue.senses: 高等黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

CHpqAmXq4vOr2TMj.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

hTa7eD0P303Y4ykY.name: 异界传送(仅限自身) Plane Shift (Self only)
hTa7eD0P303Y4ykY.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

QFVCFmJDRYL0iTIf.name: 凌空而行(恒定法术) Air Walk (Constant)
QFVCFmJDRYL0iTIf.description: 目标可以在空气中行走，如同在坚实地面上。它可以如此上升与下降，最大45度角。

OthOWZLzsugOgJdj.name: 黑暗术(随意施法) Darkness (At will)
OthOWZLzsugOgJdj.description:
你创造一片黑暗的帷幕，光线无法穿透，并且光源无法在区域中发光。光线无法进入该区域，并且任何非魔法光源，例如火炬或者提灯，在区域中不会发出任何光线，即使其光照可能到达黑暗术之外也是如此。这也会压制等于或低于你的黑暗术环级的魔法光亮。光线无法穿透，所以在区域中的生物无法看到外面。对于外面，这看起来如同一团纯粹黑暗的球。

升阶 (4环级) 即使具有黑暗视觉的生物（但不包括高等黑暗视觉）也几乎无法看穿这黑暗。它们透过黑暗看到的生物视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

4QHxILhrfigKAsP5.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
4QHxILhrfigKAsP5.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

ckpzKVXKEEwbtEV4.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

CDI8zDOfYxM1bdM6.name: Aura of Order's Ruin
CDI8zDOfYxM1bdM6.description:
30 feet.

A lawful or good creature that begins its turn in this aura's emanation must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (lawful good creatures instead become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}).

yu67ZekTRXDanQoC.name: Boiled by Light
yu67ZekTRXDanQoC.description: A chernobue takes [[/r {2d10}[fire]]]{2d10 points of火焰伤害} each time it starts its turn in an area of bright light.

pRxhn354ZvirgsU6.name: Recall Venom
pRxhn354ZvirgsU6.description:
触发 A creature within 30 feet suffers the effects from stage 2 of rupturing venom

效果 The chernobue calls out telepathically to the semi-alive toxin, causing it to burst out of the target's body and slither through the air to drain back into one of the chernobue's mouths. The poisoned creature takes [[/r {7d6}[bludgeoning]]]{7d6钝击伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|basic:true] save) as the venom exits its body, but is thereafter cured of rupturing venom, and the chernobue regains an equal number of Hit Points.

i9n1VIjQaHqI1V9X.name: Paralyzing Display
i9n1VIjQaHqI1V9X.description:
The chernobue's eye pulses and its lid peels back to reveal mind-bending awfulness. Creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:32] save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Paralyzing Displays for 1 minute.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}. It can attempt a new save to end the effect at the end of each of its turns.

大失败 As failure, but paralyzed for 1 minute.

eF8APed2EwYOr5dF.name: Rupturing Venom
eF8APed2EwYOr5dF.description:
The thick, orange venom injected by a chernobue is semi-alive, and as it seethes in a creature's body, it deals poison damage in addition to bludgeoning damage as it ruptures flesh

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害} and [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6钝击伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6钝击伤害}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

Chupacabra.name: Chupacabra
Chupacabra.publicNotes:
These notorious predators have an undeniable thirst for blood. Chupacabras prefer to prey upon the weak and slow, often hiding in wait and watching potential prey for long periods before attacking. Spry and stealthy, they most often make their homes in areas of high grass and protective rock, their slightly reflective scales allowing them to blend in well with such surroundings.

Chupacabras prefer to eat lone travelers and farm animals (particularly goats), and leave little evidence of their presence apart from the grisly, blood-drained husks of their meals. Their tendency to stay out of sight combined with their naturally nocturnal activity often leads superstitious locals to conclude the worst, imagining that a particularly reckless vampire lives in the area.

A typical chupacabra measures nearly 5-1/2 feet from its muzzle to the tip of its spiny tail, and it stands just under 4 feet tall. With their slight build and lightweight bones, most weigh close to 100 pounds. They mate rarely and only during the hottest months, with the females each producing a single egg that hatches into a tiny, dehydrated creature. The mother typically leaves helpless prey in her cave so the hatchling can immediately feed.

Although chupacabras are typically solitary creatures, they have been known to form small gangs in bountiful areas. Members of these groups work well together, growing bold enough to attack larger animals, small herds, and otherwise more dangerous prey. Stories of chupacabras attacking travelers or laying siege to farmhouses typically stem from the hunting practices of such gangs. Regions where chupacabra activity like this is more common often have complex and colorful myths and tall tales about chupacabra capabilities or motive-and a few of the claims, such as that some chupacabras can fly, are all too true.

abGmJgduMKED2VeX.name: Chupar
abGmJgduMKED2VeX.description:
需求 The chupacabra has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

效果 The chupacabra sucks blood from the grabbed creature. The chupacabra gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} condition for 1 minute and can use the extra action only for Strike and Stride actions. A chupacabra can't use Chupar again while it is quickened in this way.

A creature that has its blood drained by a chupacabra is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} until it receives healing (of any kind or amount).

UmF9ATrgifYyt9He.name: Pounce
UmF9ATrgifYyt9He.description: The chupacabra Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the chupacabra began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

Cockroach Swarm.name: Cockroach Swarm
Cockroach Swarm.publicNotes: While cockroaches tend to gather in cramped spaces, a disturbed colony is sometimes prone to swarming, where hundreds or even thousands of the insects scurry out of their hiding places in a raft of shiny brown and black carapaces on thousands of skittering legs. Given how disgusting many find cockroaches to be, encountering such a swarm can be alarming to even the most seasoned adventurers. The creatures are relentless when disturbed; in contrast to the insects' normally skittish and harmless nature, as swarms they pursue the creature or creatures that provoked them and harry them with thousands of stinging bites.
Cockroach Swarm.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

gI0Pt3FCseRtdPpl.name: Swarming Bites
gI0Pt3FCseRtdPpl.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true] save).

Coil Spy.name: Coil Spy
Coil Spy.publicNotes: Some serpentfolk undergo intense ritual training and practice to improve their innate ability to disguise themselves. These serpentfolk often identify as members of a sinister society known as the Coils of Ydersius, and the most devoted of their number seek out methods of reincarnating into new forms to even more efficiently infiltrate enemy societies. But before such agents take this extreme step, they must prove themselves as Coil spies. These serpentfolk train in methods of infiltrating other societies to such an extent that they might be capable of infiltrating a mammalian civilization for years. Though they're expected to work entirely toward the eventual triumph of their people, most Coil spies also find personal pursuits to keep them occupied in the shorter term. When Coil spies get caught, it's rarely due to a lack of pure skill, but rather to their arrogance or recklessness as they pursue their hedonistic desires.
Coil Spy.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

cJf7dfR7gJ442K2d.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

IlW1FymNgiZZvNAV.name: 幻象伪装(随意施法) Illusory Disguise (At will)
IlW1FymNgiZZvNAV.description:
你创造了一个令你看起来是另一个有相同体型的生物的幻觉。该生物和你相比，身高（6寸内）和体重（50磅内）相近。该伪装通常足以掩盖你的身份，但不足以让你假扮另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变你的声音，气味，或者仪态。你可以改变你的衣服和佩带物的外观，例如让你的护甲看起来像是连衣裙。持握的物品不受影响，并且穿戴的物品离开你时会回复其本来外观。

施放幻象伪装视为欺骗（Deception）技能的 @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{假扮 Impersonate}用法的设立伪装；这忽视任何你可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予你在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上你的等级。你可以解消该法术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

升阶 (3环级) 你可以伪装成任何与你有相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须见过该个人才能使用其外观。该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{法术效果：幻象伪装}

jZN7KNxo55eAkwom.name: 镜影术(随意施法) Mirror Image (At will)
jZN7KNxo55eAkwom.description:
三个你的幻象在你的位置旋转，令想要攻击攻击你的人可能会命中一个幻象，而不是你本人。任何要命中你的攻击会有随机概率命中你的一个幻象，而不是你本身。如果三个幻象均存在，有四分之一的几率命中你（1d4骰出1）。如果两个幻象存在，有三分之一的概率命中你（1d6骰出1-2）。仅有一个幻象时，概率为二分之一（1d6骰出1-3）。

当一个幻象被命中时，它会被摧毁。如果一个攻击骰没有命中你的AC，但是也没有大失败，它会摧毁一个幻象，但是没有额外的效果（即使该攻击在失败时通常会有效果）。如果一次攻击骰大成功，并且将命中一个幻象，一个幻象被摧毁，并且攻击骰变为对你的一次成功攻击。当所有幻象被摧毁时，该法术结束。

y1vZf9cXWJAE7Ig5.name: 腹语术(随意施法) Ventriloquism (At will)
y1vZf9cXWJAE7Ig5.description:
当你说话，或者通过喉嗓发出其他的声音，你可以令你的声音如同从60尺内的其他位置发出，并且你可以随着你说话，自由改变该发声位置。任何听见该声音的生物可以尝试不相信的你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术时间增加到1小时，并且你也可以改变其语调，音质等声音属性。在生物尝试不相信你的幻术前，它必须主动尝试一次察觉检定，或者使用动作与声音交互。

x4vlJSFL6WnsbK82.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

DUJLW3KPZ4HNw8je.name: +4 Status Bonus on Will Saves vs. Mental

0jpjkgun2zt97YLL.name: Deceptive Reposition
0jpjkgun2zt97YLL.description: The Coil spy Strides up to half their Speed and attempts a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}, in either order.

q2KJwlgmVEKQMJPb.name: Maintain Disguise
q2KJwlgmVEKQMJPb.description: A Coil spy can maintain an ongoing illusory disguise as long as they are conscious without having to re-cast the spell; they need only Cast the Spell again to reassume their illusory disguise if they wish to change their appearance or if the active spell is dispelled. Coil spies typically seek privacy when they need to sleep, as an ongoing illusory disguise ends an hour after they fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}.

WLcykyc9hp2QiTO4.name: Serpentfolk Venom
WLcykyc9hp2QiTO4.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d4}[poison]]]{2d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

YRhZxIyDuKIuiHky.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
YRhZxIyDuKIuiHky.description:
The Coil spy's Strikes deal an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Compsognathus.name: Compsognathus
Compsognathus.publicNotes:
The compsognathus is a small bipedal dinosaur that moves in swift, darting motions. Its bite injects a venom that causes numbness and weakness, a trait that the animal uses to bring down larger prey, although it prefers to scavenge food or snatch up insects and other smaller creatures for its meals. The compsognathus is curious to a fault; most encounters that result in combat with these diminutive dinosaurs result not from the creatures' hunger but from frightened defensive reactions when the dinosaurs' inquisitive natures compel them to enter into situations that inadvertently put them at odds with surprised adventurers.

A compsognathus measures 3 feet long from its head to the tip of its tail and weighs 15 pounds. It is small enough to serve as a house pet or even as a familiar for a spellcaster. In cases where magical links aren't involved, however, those encountering or keeping the creatures would be well-advised to treat them with the same caution one might extend to a pet viper or other poisonous reptile, as they are at best partly tame.

Dinosaurs encompass a staggering range of creatures, from tiny but still dangerous scavengers like the compsognathus to lumbering giants like the ravenous spinosaurus to ornery herbivores like iguanodons. Often sought out and partially domesticated to serve as exotic pets for eccentric aristocrats or dangerous guardians for those eager to protect their holdings with frightening but tamable creatures, dinosaurs are far from limited to lurking in primeval "lost worlds"
Compsognathus.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

BIjOxLctW7PgHsOt.name: Compsognathus Venom
BIjOxLctW7PgHsOt.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害} and Enfeebled 1 (1轮)

Cornugon.name: Cornugon
Cornugon.publicNotes:
Hell's armies contain legions upon legions of different devils all suited precisely to their roles. But such an army needs able commanders, and it is this role that cornugons fill. Their mere presence inspires those under their command to improved performance- often through fear of the horrible torments that a cornugon can unleash as punishment for failure. Forged in the fires of Malebolge from the most renowned warriors among lesser devilkind, even the least cornugon is among the fiercest warriors of the multiverse. The greatest among them on occasion ascend further still, becoming those rare and feared legends of Hell called malebranche.

Each type of devil plays a particular role in Hell's bureaucracies and hierarchies, though some have far more specialized functions than others.
Cornugon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

e45FiBhbCxHP7Had.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

SOdblsm3svF3C9dl.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
SOdblsm3svF3C9dl.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

CxhKccyCVc1NDZFs.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

quht5jPh2LiFjJft.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

jzI4ObWhN1kXyFjY.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

O10CpdkrcpxqCHHH.name: Circle of Protection
O10CpdkrcpxqCHHH.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A constant @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mpGCMTldMVa0pWYs]{Circle of Protection} against good is centered on the cornugon.

Fu1B7hcvnk9S79DA.name: Commander's Aura
Fu1B7hcvnk9S79DA.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Allied evil creatures in the aura of lower level than the devil's gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.5NSWRxAsJuvwyl0E]{Effect: Commander's Aura}

rQn75QJUJH2hQKpE.name: Chain of Malebolge
rQn75QJUJH2hQKpE.description:
需求 The cornugon's last action was a success with a spiked chain Strike.

效果 The devil pulls the creature 5 feet closer and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabs} it with the spiked chain (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} DC 42). The creature is automatically freed if the devil makes another spiked chain attack or moves away.

pUwo9wumwrjtvid1.name: Infernal Wound
pUwo9wumwrjtvid1.description:
A cornugon's tail Strike deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed4d6.success].

The DC of the flat check to stop the bleeding starts at @Check[type:flat|dc:20] and is reduced to @Check[type:flat|dc:15] only if someone successfully assists. The DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} to a creature with an infernal wound increases by 10.

A spellcaster or item using healing magic on an infernally wounded creature must succeed at a DC 34 counteract check or the magic fails to heal the creature.

WHISh35la4f2ULAj.name: Stunning Chain
WHISh35la4f2ULAj.description: If the cornugon critically hits with its spiked chain Strike, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned} for 1 round ([[/br 1d4 #Duration Stun]]{1d4轮} on a critical failure).

Culdewen.name: Culdewen
Culdewen.publicNotes:
Perpetually cursed to hunger and failure, a culdewen plies waterways in search of appealing fish to catch-the bigger the better. Of course, this diminutive, emaciated fey calls every living creature a "fish." Only other fey are exempt, and they tend to consider culdewens lost causes. A culdewen can never find satisfaction. Each time they catch a fish, a magical curse forces them to hunt for an appealing spot to dine-an island, cove, or abandoned dock or shack where they can eat in peace. By the time they arrive, their catch will be gone. Every time. Forever.

A foul mood hovers over a culdewen, causing them to swear colorfully, smack things with their oar, and shake their tiny fists at the sky. Conversation with a culdewen is fruitless, as they talk in circles, speaking only of fishing and the weather. Capturing a "fish" gives a culdewen a rare moment of happiness; the culdewen capers and ululates, pleased with their catch, and rushes off to their boat.
Culdewen.allSaves: -2 status to all saves vs. curses

GS4ThRRm7cy5BuYJ.name: Oar (Functions as Mace)
GS4ThRRm7cy5BuYJ.description: With a stout haft and a heavy metal head, a mace is sturdy and allows its wielder to deliver powerful blows and dent armor.

bJzQGcgwU0vilj1V.name: Culdewen's Curse
bJzQGcgwU0vilj1V.description: A culdewen that captures a creature is compelled to immediately retreat to a secluded place to eat, typically journeying by boat. The travel to the secluded place always takes at least 1 day. Their captive is cursed to vanish on the journey-typically being lost in the water or consumed by aquatic creatures-and can be recovered only by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} spell or similarly powerful magic.

GYapjknILGOMiV84.name: -2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Curses

suaF5gRPb1TibfpQ.name: Hooked
suaF5gRPb1TibfpQ.description: A creature struck by the culdewen's fish hook is skewered, taking @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success] as long as the hook remains stuck in it. The fish hook can be removed if a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escapes} (@Check[type:athletics|dc:25]), pulling it free.

bKdGH4QNZyOm2rhg.name: Land the Fish
bKdGH4QNZyOm2rhg.description:
需求 A creature is hooked by the culdewen's fish hook and adjacent to the culdewen

效果 The culdewen hoists the creature over their shoulder, as though it weighs no more than a fish. Unless the creature is unable to act, the culdewen must attempt an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} by the culdewen. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escaping} from the restrained condition (DC 25) also allows a creature to remove the hook.

While hoisting a creature, the culdewen gains a +20-foot status bonus to their Speeds and is compelled to escape with it (see culdewen's curse above).

Da6b96ZUkpdT5y8i.name: Reel In
Da6b96ZUkpdT5y8i.description: The culdewen pulls the rope attached to their hook. If they have no creature hooked, the fish hook returns to the culdewen's hand. If a creature is hooked, the culdewen attempts an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC, pulling it up to 30 feet closer on a success (60 feet on a critical success).

fiJwhvqSCYbkgaJg.name: Swear
fiJwhvqSCYbkgaJg.description: The culdewen unleashes a string of invectives. Each creature that hears them must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.z2mfh3oPnfYqXflY]{Mariner's Curse} and is then temporarily immune for 24 hours. Even on a failed save, the curse ends automatically after 1 day.

Cythnigot.name: Cythnigot
Cythnigot.publicNotes: The cythnigot is a foul fungal parasite that grows and thrives in the corpses of small creatures. It wears these bodies like a suit, but also adjusts and tailors the fleshy covering to suit its needs, and the body ends up looking as alien as anything else spawned from the Abyssal depths. The cythnigot's most identifying feature is the long stalk of fungal material that extends from creature's body, ending in a surprisingly strong set of fanged jaws.

FWHFEirBNdz22BqV.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

Cvcdr8l0DxG0Fszv.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限守序) Detect Alignment (At will) (Lawful only)
Cvcdr8l0DxG0Fszv.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

6H89y4nwsrC7o3X5.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
6H89y4nwsrC7o3X5.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

Kv1pkf5Ma30A8n58.name: Sickening Display
Kv1pkf5Ma30A8n58.description:
The cythnigot presents its awful appearance fully, and creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17] save. Once a creature attempts this save, it's temporarily immune to further Sickening Displays for 1 minute.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} until its next turn.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}, and is flat-footed for as long as it's sickened.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} and is flat-footed for as long as it's sickened.

GCC6Zf1NaPihfEJ0.name: Tangle Spores
GCC6Zf1NaPihfEJ0.description:
A creature bitten by a cythnigot becomes afflicted by fast-growing spores that swiftly grow into twitching spikes and hideous pallid growths of hairlike fibers. These growths erupt from the bite wound and writhe and wrap around the creature's limbs. Plant creatures take a -2 circumstance penalty to save against tangle spores

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 Clumsy 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}, flat-footed, and if you attempt a manipulate action, you must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] or it's lost; roll the check after spending the action, but before any effects are applied (1轮).

D'ziriak.name: D'ziriak
D'ziriak.publicNotes:
These strange creatures are native to the Plane of Shadows, where their colorful nature is in opposition to that realm's overwhelmingly monochromatic palette. Averaging 7 feet in height, d'ziriaks have four arms, two legs, and a termitelike abdomen. The larger pair of arms, used for most tasks, have five‑fingered hands with sharp, insectile claws. The smaller pair of arms are reserved for fine manipulations and are not effective in combat.

D'ziriaks' otherwise dull brown carapaces are decorated with numerous runes glowing in bright colors. These tattoo-like runes indicate an individual's role in d'ziriak society, and set them apart from their home plane's other native inhabitants. The runes glow with natural bioluminescence, and d'ziriaks can make them flare brightly for an instant, at the expense of overstressing the biochemical glands that create and maintain the runes for an extended time. The color and shape of the runes are partially natural, but can be shaped and customized carefully over time to fit the individual's station. The D'ziriak language is a mix of buzzes and chitters, and is spoken by few other creatures. D'ziriaks prefer to communicate with other species using telepathy rather than endure the sound of their language being "butchered by fleshy throats." D'ziriaks organize into hive cities led by a king and queen. These hive cities consist of impressive spires, yet these towers are only the foremost part of the settlement, with many more chambers reaching deep below for residences, workshops, and fungus farms. D'ziriak settlements are lit inside and out with alchemical and magical light sources, often in the shapes of runes. These dimly glowing towers provide travelers with landmarks, and perhaps promise safe havens, on the otherwise gloomy Shadow Plane.

kFNxTYgL056it5oI.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

olvPYkQEIgtlun6u.name: 异界传送(仅限自身,仅限阴影位面) Plane Shift (Self only) (To Shadow Plane only)
olvPYkQEIgtlun6u.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

Z1uxEMSqDnZV9SCY.name: Glow
Z1uxEMSqDnZV9SCY.description:
20 feet.

The colorful runes that decorate a d'ziriak's body create dim light. The natural bioluminescence is specially adapted to the Shadow Plane, able to overcome magical darkness as if it were magical light of the d'ziriak's level.

nuNIIa81vZ9PT2RL.name: Dazzling Burst
nuNIIa81vZ9PT2RL.description:
The d'ziriak causes its body to flare with intense colorful light. Non-d'ziriaks in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save. After using this ability, the d'ziriak loses its glow for 24 hours; during this time it can't use again.

A creature that attempts this save is immune to all Dazzling Bursts for 1 minute.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is dazzled for 1 minute.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 round and dazzled for 1 minute.

Cxm87AR1TJom2drt.name: Double Claw
Cxm87AR1TJom2drt.description:
频率 once per round

效果 The d'ziriak makes two claw Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. This counts as two attacks for the d'ziriak's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

Denizen of Leng.name: Denizen of Leng
Denizen of Leng.publicNotes:
Slavers and raiders from the cold, windswept dimension of Leng, these malevolent humanoids range across reality in ominous black ships capable of sailing beyond the borders of dimensions and planes. Although most denizens of Leng seek slaves and plunder like any pirate, others operate as self-styled ambassadors and merchants, sowing discord with far-ranging plots. While the inscrutable denizens dress themselves in flowing robes, veils, and broad turbans to appear human, their aberrant physiology, when glimpsed, is evident from their crown of stubby horns and tentacled jaws to their furry, goat-like legs.

Above the fierce captains who command the infamous black ships are an even higher caste of denizens of Leng. These cultists and musicians serve as high priests, laboring to appease the frightening gods who look down upon the Nightmare Realm with cold malice.

Oevi96zftiaBjAOH.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

aV7tH63nZZOcXqzb.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
aV7tH63nZZOcXqzb.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

ngnDEklmNIpdoIWS.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
ngnDEklmNIpdoIWS.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

hr8UQcvJzWfTNGoH.name: Planar Fast Healing 5
hr8UQcvJzWfTNGoH.description:
A denizen of Leng maintains a connection to Leng at all times, and when away from Leng, they have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing 5}. They lose this ability on Leng or in areas where planar connections do not function. If killed, their body dissolves into nothingness in [[/br 1d4 #Dissolve Body]]{1d4轮}, leaving behind their equipment. A slain denizen reforms in Leng; they can be permanently killed only when their planar fast healing doesn't function.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FastHealing]

2dHPDZu3BYN1GauB.name: No Breath
2dHPDZu3BYN1GauB.description: Denizens of Leng don't need to breathe.

MJktJ33e2ejK5I1o.name: Debilitating Bite
MJktJ33e2ejK5I1o.description: A creature that takes damage from a denizen's bite must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}. Each time a target fails an additional save against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (to a maximum of Clumsy 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

C91ggah5Ye65LrMH.name: Leng Ruby
C91ggah5Ye65LrMH.description: Many denizens of Leng carry strange rubies mined from quarries in Leng. As long as a creature holds a Leng ruby that it willingly accepted as a gift or payment from a denizen of Leng, any denizen of Leng can target that creature with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KSAEhNfZyXMO7Z7V]{Outcast's Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]{Mind Reading} at a range of 1 mile, and the bearer uses an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw against Outcast's Curse.

Derghodaemon.name: Derghodaemon
Derghodaemon.publicNotes:
Derghodaemons represent death through unfathomable violence and being eaten alive. Whether in life a ravenous murderer hacked them to bits for stew, a werewolf tore them limb from limb, or they simply succumbed to the elements and became worm meat, derghodaemons seek to inflict the same twisted and bloody ends upon any they come across. Unlike some daemons, derghodaemons derive little pleasure from prolonged deaths-to these fiends, the quicker they can enact a gory demise, the sooner they can turn their attentions to their next victim and repeat the violent cycle.

Derghodaemons look like walking masses of razor-sharp insect claws connected to equally menacing chitinous limbs, but few linger on their appearance for long- the gaze of a derghodaemon is enough to cause others in the vicinity to experience severe visual warping. The derghodaemon's appearance becomes more and more twisted as those who stare at it experience vicious hallucinations and ravenous urges to inflict harm on and devour others. Perhaps the most horrific attack derghodaemons can unleash upon their victims, though, is their swarming infestation-the daemons cough up a crawling, buzzing cloud of ravenous insects that cling to those targeted and chew them to death, provided the mind-numbing, half-whispered threats made by the rasp of the insects' bodies don't drive them to violent fury first!
Derghodaemon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Derghodaemon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

HL22Gfjw3DN4v0Sx.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

fVJKjuH7SYz6QQHp.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
fVJKjuH7SYz6QQHp.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

ot1UCPxTvpQLgwz3.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限善良) Detect Alignment (At will) (Good only)
ot1UCPxTvpQLgwz3.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

TBsuxObKIaeVagO5.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

8PnlI5NzEir5W7Il.name: Derghodaemon's Stare
8PnlI5NzEir5W7Il.description: A non-evil target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:32] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for 1 round, or 1 minute on a critical failure. It is temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

SHBwJIixLi2Gr8Lx.name: Savage Assault
SHBwJIixLi2Gr8Lx.description: The derghodaemon makes up to five claw Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the derghodaemon's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

h282lP6zRpC6R83o.name: Swarming Infestation
h282lP6zRpC6R83o.description:
The derghodaemon spews a large swarm, making a swarm spit Strike against up to two adjacent targets within range. Whether or not the targets are hit, each must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:31|traits:damaging-effect] save (at a -2 circumstance penalty if it was actually hit by the swarm spit).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续穿刺伤害} caused by the swarming infestation ends as soon as the creature takes any amount of damage from an area effect.

The derghodaemon can't use this ability for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 The swarm disperses as soon as it deals its swarm spit Strike damage.
