成功 The swarm clings to the target and infests it, dealing [[/r {1d6}[persistent,piercing]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续穿刺伤害}.

失败 The swarm clings to the target and infests it, dealing [[/r {2d6}[persistent,piercing]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续穿刺伤害}.

大失败 As failure, but the hissing sounds caused by the infestation also cause the target to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for 1 round; this additional effect has the auditory, emotion, and mental traits.

Destrachan.name: Destrachan
Destrachan.publicNotes:
This underground reptilian horror walks on two powerful hind legs. Its forelimbs are armed with sharp curving claws, and its toothy, eyeless, tubular head has three hypersensitive frilled ears that turn toward any sound made in its vicinity. This cruel monster's true weapon, however, is an amplified version of the sonic cry that it uses to navigate, communicate, and hunt. It communicates with others of its kind through a complex series of clicks, shrieks, and whistles, but it is intelligent enough to understand other languages. Most destrachans understand at least one other language-usually Undercommon-and can often be reasoned with.

An obligate carnivore, the destrachan relishes fresh meat but won't hesitate to make a meal of carrion it finds in its path. When traveling in packs, the creatures take great delight in stalking travelers through miles of tunnels before attacking and subduing them, then devouring them alive.
Destrachan.allSaves: +4 status to all saves vs. sonic

gHUajYINDeCp7360.name: Echolocation 120尺
gHUajYINDeCp7360.description: A destrachan can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range.

g56aPVqelhyIjRuv.name: +4 Status to All Saves vs. Sonic

DVQrLVPCYEJyvk5s.name: Destructive Harmonics
DVQrLVPCYEJyvk5s.description:
The destrachan emits a harsh sonic cry that deals [[/r {9d6}[sonic]]]{9d6 sonic伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save) in either a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] or a @Template[type:burst|distance:30].

It can't use Destructive Harmonics again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Destructive Harmonics]]{1d4轮}.

gcdD70PvUw3sfPCK.name: Painful Harmonics
gcdD70PvUw3sfPCK.description:
The destrachan emits a sonic cry in either a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] or a @Template[type:burst|distance:30]. This discordant ululation resonates along the nerves and bones of living creatures in the area, manifesting as waves of incapacitating pain washing over the victims. Each living creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save.

The destrachan can't use Painful Harmonics again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Painful Harmonics]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for 3 rounds and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}.

大失败 The creature is deafened for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}.

lXe9Yv9DRWtrP5OH.name: Shattering Harmonics
lXe9Yv9DRWtrP5OH.description:
The destrachan focuses its harmonics against a single item within 60 feet that is made of crystal, metal, stone, or wood. The target object takes [[/r {7d8}[sonic]]]{7d8 sonic伤害}. If the item is attended, its bearer can attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save for the item.

The destrachan can't use Shattering Harmonics again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Shattering Harmonics]]{1d4轮}.

Devourer.name: Devourer
Devourer.publicNotes: When fiends and powerful evil spellcasters are lost beyond the farthest reaches of the multiverse, they sometimes return as horrific undead called devourers that consume the souls of the living to fuel their arcane machinations. Their bodies are ruined and rebuilt, hollow and twisted, even as their minds undergo a spiritual transformation. They gain the ability to bind other souls to their own and drain their essence for magical power, yet can never be sated in their pursuit of it. Seething masses of distorted ghostly shapes surge within their hollow rib cages-manifestations of the devourers' most recently consumed souls.
Devourer.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

yI8fil9Hp8Ob0BcY.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

MeT5lDeI05fBDoW3.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

N9qNd1NMgEeyNwcF.name: Spell Deflection
N9qNd1NMgEeyNwcF.description:
A spellcaster who targets a devourer with a mental spell, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{Banishment}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.sX2o0HH4RjJDAZ8C]{Divine Decree}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ht35SDf9PDStJfoC]{Spirit Song} can attempt a counteract check to free a soul the devourer has trapped with Devour Soul. If this counteract attempt succeeds, the trapped soul is released (though the creature remains dead), and the devourer can't use any soul charges from that creature.

Devourers are otherwise immune to these spells.

bMX8ZvBxeu0Ty5cl.name: Devour Soul
bMX8ZvBxeu0Ty5cl.description:
The devourer touches a creature within reach, dealing [[/r {8d6}[negative]]]{8d6负能量伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26|basic:true] save). If a creature is slain by this attack, its soul becomes trapped within the devourer. While its soul is trapped, a creature can't be resurrected except by powerful magic such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} spell. Destroying the devourer or successfully counteracting Devour Soul (see spell deflection) releases the soul. The devourer can hold only one soul at a time.

A soul has 5 soul charges per level of the originating creature (see the soul spells ability below). The devourer can expend these charges to cast spells. If the soul is freed and the creature returns to life, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} for every 5 soul charges expended. If reduced to 0 soul charges, the soul is consumed and can be restored to life only by powerful magic such as wish.

2a2eONlkTBanM6W0.name: Drain Life
2a2eONlkTBanM6W0.description: When the devourer damages a living creature with its claw Strike, the devourer gains 10 temporary Hit Points and the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}. Further damage dealt by the devourer increases the condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

Hu1SdyNVG4WJmNcx.name: Soul Spells
Hu1SdyNVG4WJmNcx.description: A devourer casts occult innate spells, but to do so it must expend a number of soul charges equal to the spell's level (similar to casting a spell using charges from a staff). It can heighten any spell to a maximum of 6th level by expending more charges as it Casts the Spell. When encountered, a devourer typically has one trapped soul with 10 soul charges.

Dig-Widget.name: Dig-Widget
Dig-Widget.publicNotes:
Thieves covet dig-widgets, specialized constructs built for infiltration. Each dig-widget contains numerous simple tools, including a set of mechanical devices that function as thieves' tools, two arms with drills, and two arms with corkscrews for attaching to and climbing surfaces. Once activated, these devices propel themselves forward. Though they have the full faculties typical of a construct, they usually follow a simple routine: avoid notice, pick any lock barring the path, dig past obstacles, and attack if caught. They're rarely left unattended, as a thief needs to be nearby to follow after-both to steal goods and to stop the dig-widget from engaging in further larceny once it's achieved its goal.

The source of a dig-widget's power is as much mechanical as it is magical. The gears and springs that provide a dig-widget mobility are an improvement over more primitive true clockwork creations (whose functions require constant winding to remain mobile), but at the cost of security, for a dig-widget's moving parts can be dismantled quickly by thieves and others with the proper training.
Dig-Widget.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

ZMxrbMShYOtO3gEG.name: Infiltration Tools
ZMxrbMShYOtO3gEG.description: A dig-widget's face consists of a set of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.6nrCxNQFycUVFOV2]{Infiltrator Thieves' Tools}. They can be salvaged from a destroyed dig-widget with a successful @Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Salvage Infiltration Tools] check. On a failed check, the tools are destroyed.

nYQgnHNVs60rcvUn.name: Mechanical Vulnerability
nYQgnHNVs60rcvUn.description: A creature with expert proficiency in Thievery can attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable a Device} to damage a dig-widget. The DC is 22, and each success deals 20 damage.

mGkbLuXtisEvFNNs.name: Fastening Leap
mGkbLuXtisEvFNNs.description: The dig-widget Leaps up 20 feet onto a creature or object and attempts a corkscrew Strike against it. If the Strike damages the target, the dig-widget attaches to the target (typically to the back of a creature). This is similar to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grabbing} the creature, but the dig-widget moves with that creature rather than holding it in place. While attached, the dig-widget can't use its corkscrew. The dig-widget can be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoved} off, or it can detach itself with an Interact action.

MH7wNM2dBDOtmzVO.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
MH7wNM2dBDOtmzVO.description:
A dig-widget's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Doprillu.name: Doprillu
Doprillu.publicNotes: The aberrations known as doprillus are hulks with banded muscles who wear ornate masks at all times that fill their wearers with magical strength and fighting spirit. Doprillus love to battle, especially by grappling, and are eager to start brawls. On neutral ground, a doprillu offers to duel the strongest-looking opponent, but when a doprillu's home turf is invaded, no rules apply to the confrontation. As befits the superheated blood that fuels them, doprillus make their homes in warm locations: hot jungles, sunny deserts, and underground caverns near sulfur vents.
Doprillu.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. fear
Doprillu.di: enfeebled (while wearing its mask), slowed (while wearing its mask)

Z487oTtboxJKexiF.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

5u6wc1mpLV2mconA.name: 识破隐形(恒定法术) See Invisibility (Constant)
5u6wc1mpLV2mconA.description:
你能看见 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{法术效果：识破隐形}

38cGo2E7vYZ2PNb5.name: +2 Status Bonus to Saves vs. Fear

lWr6fzaJ1ya4uUVM.name: Deflect Arrow
lWr6fzaJ1ya4uUVM.description:
触发 The doprillu is the target of a physical ranged attack

需求 The doprillu is aware of the attack, isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against it, and has a hand free

效果 The doprillu gains a +4 circumstance bonus to its AC against the triggering attack.

gkiQGmXDkxDHGY7j.name: Mask of Power
gkiQGmXDkxDHGY7j.description:
A doprillu's unique wooden mask is the source of its power.

A doprillu deprived of its mask loses its regeneration and its immunity to Enfeebled and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}, and it immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}. The Enfeebled value increases by 1 at the start of each of the doprillu's turns, to a maximum of Enfeebled 4. If the mask is put back on, the doprillu immediately regains its abilities and loses the Enfeebled condition.

A creature can pull off the mask with a successful Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{破拆 Force Open}.

BIIDNJTjlW3lJ1b2.name: Volcanic Veins
BIIDNJTjlW3lJ1b2.description: Fiery magma runs through the doprillu's veins. A creature that starts its turn @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the doprillu takes [[/r {7d6}[fire]]]{7d6火焰伤害}.

Cj8UIWLOhEQ5yNgA.name: Body Strike
Cj8UIWLOhEQ5yNgA.description:
需求 The doprillu has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

效果 The doprillu swings the grabbed creature as a weapon. This Strike has a +30 attack modifier and deals [[/r {3d8+16}[bludgeoning]]]{3d8+16钝击伤害}. The Strike is magical and has a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the grabbed creature takes half the damage dealt to the target.

XHAPOvUbe2eKOW7E.name: Whirlwind Throw
XHAPOvUbe2eKOW7E.description:
需求 The doprillu has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

效果 The doprillu whirls the grabbed creature about, making a Body Strike against each creature in reach. After that Strike, the doprillu can hurl the grabbed creature up to 50 feet as a ranged Strike. This Strike has the same attack modifier and damage as Body Strike, but has the thrown 20 feet weapon trait.

Drainberry Bush.name: Drainberry Bush
Drainberry Bush.publicNotes:
Drainberry bushes are floating bushes that originate from the First World, with long, thorny vines and dense clusters of bright-red berries. Their hollow thorns quickly siphon blood, which is how these carnivorous plants feed, and they rapidly turn consumed blood into fresh batches of delicious berries. Drainberry bushes exude a faint white glow that is a result of stored positive energy.

Drainberry bushes exhibit unusually high intelligence and have an astute sense of value. They typically become insulted when creatures attempt to harvest their berries. Creatures that attempt to converse with drainberry bushes finds the plants telepathically convey only short and simple phrases: most commonly, "Money please," "Deal good," "Deal no good," "Want that," (with a gesture toward an item it covets), "Thank you, customer," and if necessary, "No refunds." Though a drainberry bush considers the market value of its berries to be 25 gp, it greatly prefers interesting art objects as payment-even ones of significantly lower value.

QY55zAJAyvaoflJY.name: Nature Empathy
QY55zAJAyvaoflJY.description: The drainberry bush can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on and make very simple @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of animals and plant creatures.

LmNbsiKPocWzw1cu.name: Blood Berries
LmNbsiKPocWzw1cu.description:
The drainberry bush must drain blood from living creatures for sustenance. This causes clusters of bright red berries to grow among its branches.

Each cluster of berries lasts for 1 day, and a drainberry bush typically has [[/r 1d6+3 #clusters]]{1d6+3 clusters} when encountered. When consumed, a cluster restores [[/r {2d8+10}[healing]]]{2d8+10 Hit Points}. This effect has the healing, necromancy, and primal traits.

A creature can pluck a cluster of berries with a successful unarmed Strike or Thievery check against the bush's AC.

uh97rOTxqm9aQTwC.name: Consume Berries
uh97rOTxqm9aQTwC.description: The bush draws nourishment from one cluster of blood berries, regaining [[/r {2d8+10}[healing]]]{2d8+10 Hit Points}. That berry cluster wrinkles and dies.

8r06lqp1MccJLeUV.name: Drain Blood
8r06lqp1MccJLeUV.description:
需求 The drainberry bush has at least one living creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} with one of its vines

效果 The bush's hollow thorns siphon blood from creatures it has grabbed. Each creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|traits:damaging-effect] save or take [[/r 2d8+10]] damage and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (double damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} on a critical failure). For every creature damaged this way, a cluster of blood berries immediately grows along the bush's branches.

9UqGqGPYi6N8yk6X.name: Storm of Vines
9UqGqGPYi6N8yk6X.description: The drainberry bush makes up to four vine Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the bush's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the bush makes all these attacks.

Draugr.name: Draugr
Draugr.publicNotes:
Risen corpses of sailors who died at sea, draugr reek of the rot and decay of the briny deep. Their eyes glow with ghastly green light, and rotting seaweed, barnacles, and dead sea creatures cling to their bodies. Draugr can't speak, but expresses their malicious emotions with gurgles, as though they were eternally drowning with lungs full of water. They desire little more than to attack living creatures, especially those who sail the sea. Even when they go upon land, draugrs often drag the corpses of those they strike down back to the water, populating the depths with even more dead.

Draugr rise in the haunted places of the sea, where restless spirits, swells of negative energy, or supernatural storms deliver death. A corpse might rest at the bottom of the sea for some time before awakening as a draugr. Collecting detritus and organisms, a corpse becomes increasingly disgusting before it finally rises. Proximity to intelligent life can expedite this process, and an underwater explorer who happens upon a shipwreck might cause a body to snap to unlife as a draugr suddenly. The creatures don't take intrusions lightly, especially upon their place of death.

Though steeped in evil, draugr are susceptible to reminders of their lives as mariners. In particular, a well-performed sea shanty or call-and-response work song might cause a draugr to become lost in reverie for a moment. The creatures have even been witnessed moaning along, unable to sing the words but providing haunting accompaniment. The lull rarely lasts long, though, as the beauty of the song quickly becomes a reminder of the tragedy that befell the draugr, reaffirming their desire for blood and death.

More powerful draugr with burning red eyes are called draugr captains. They're 3rd-level creatures with elite adjustments that can cast obscuring mist as an innate divine spell three times per day.

h0VU0sBf5jz6KCu1.name: The Sea's Revenge
h0VU0sBf5jz6KCu1.description: A creature that slays a draugr is subjected to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.z2mfh3oPnfYqXflY]{Mariner's Curse} spell with a save DC of 17. The curse ends if the draugr is buried in a calm sea or after 1 week passes.

cjYLiElA3muRcJuo.name: Grotesque Gift
cjYLiElA3muRcJuo.description: A draugr's attacks spatter their targets with rancid flesh and rotting seaweed. A creature damaged by a draugr's Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

bS27ihuZ0Xs3mU7a.name: Swipe
bS27ihuZ0Xs3mU7a.description: The draugr makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within its melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A Swipe counts as two attacks for the draugr's multiple attack penalty.

Dread Wraith.name: Dread Wraith
Dread Wraith.publicNotes: These menacing spiritual remnants of wicked warlords or bloodthirsty generals are towering specters of shadow and death. Like other wraiths, dread wraiths haunt the shadowy places of the world, but dread wraiths are more likely to travel greater distances to sow terror or amass influence, often sticking to dark glades or sinister ruins when journeying across sun-dappled lands. Dread wraiths tends to be arrogant and rarely form a pack with others of their kind, preferring instead to dominate groups of ordinary wraiths. A particularly powerful necromancer might compel packs of dread wraiths into service, however, while a particularly malevolent goal-such as to eradicate a bastion of light and life-might draw several dread wraiths together in a common purpose.

dr.exceptions: except force, ghost touch, or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical

Dread Wraith.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. positive

yH19s0CEMs71KZgv.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Positive

flCrHBNNesdvv5af.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

AytjsrleVTlWADIi.name: Draining Presence
AytjsrleVTlWADIi.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature entering the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}. It recovers after it has been out of the aura for 1 minute. This drained condition value is cumulative with the drained value caused by drain life, but not with multiple draining presence auras.

A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to draining presence for 24 hours.

hy3Lxy9hFGa73bQP.name: Sunlight Powerlessness
hy3Lxy9hFGa73bQP.description: A dread wraith caught in sunlight is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}.

KDUeQyj1J71Vb3Q1.name: Absorb Wraith
KDUeQyj1J71Vb3Q1.description:
The dread wraith extends its hand toward another wraith creature within 100 feet. The target wraith dissolves and streaks toward the dread wraith in a straight line, dealing [[/r {6d10}[negative]]]{6d10负能量伤害} to each creature along the line (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true] save).

The dread wraith absorbs the essence of the target wraith, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} and gaining a +10-foot status bonus to its fly Speed for a number of rounds equal to the level of the absorbed wraith. It can use its extra action only to Fly or Strike.

An unwilling target can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save to resist being absorbed.

V5c6DTpIF11FCsWw.name: Drain Life
V5c6DTpIF11FCsWw.description: When the dread wraith damages a living creature with its spectral hand Strike, the wraith gains [[/r 10 #Temporary Hit Points]]{10 temporary Hit Points} and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}. Further damage dealt by the wraith increases the drained condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

y7wcFxhYodNrBPwL.name: Wraith Spawn
y7wcFxhYodNrBPwL.description: A living humanoid slain by a wraith's spectral hand Strike rises as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.HbROgIcU9Z9m6XuD]{Wraith Spawn} after [[/br 1d4 #Wraith Spawn Transformation]]{1d4轮}. This wraith spawn is under the command of the dread wraith that killed it. It doesn't have drain life or wraith spawn. If the creator of the wraith spawn dies, the wraith spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous wraith; it regains its free will and gains drain life and wraith spawn.

Dream Spider.name: Dream Spider
Dream Spider.publicNotes:
A dream spider's webs have an iridescent hue and are infused with the same hallucinogenic compound as the creature's toxin. Originally denizens of tropical jungles, dream spiders have adapted well to temperate environments, particularly thriving among the rooftops of cities where shady alchemists use their venom to produce the drug known as shiver.

Spiders range dramatically in size, yet all are to some extent venomous.

TFsDNtIHhwteQUz9.name: Web Sense
TFsDNtIHhwteQUz9.description: The dream spider has imprecise @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.j2wsK6IsW5yMW1jW]{震颤感知 Tremorsense} to detect the vibrations of creatures touching its web.

bR7DFykvg3BJRRmV.name: Dream Spider Venom
bR7DFykvg3BJRRmV.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} plus stupefied 1 (1轮)

Q7cHvTaIWyRwhMYl.name: Web Trap
Q7cHvTaIWyRwhMYl.description: A creature hit by the dream spider's web attack is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} and stuck to the nearest surface until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escapes} (DC 16).

Dust Mephit.name: Dust Mephit
Dust Mephit.publicNotes:
Whining and self-important creatures, dust mephits are known for their tendency to pronounce doom and gloom at every opportunity, lamenting every insignificant and minor difficulty as though it were an insurmountable obstacle and making themselves out to be heroes for struggling valiantly against their cruel fates. They tend to be thin and gaunt, with dusky brown and gray skin and wings.

Mephits are small, weak creatures that serve at the whims of other elemental entities. The mephits presented here are less common than air mephits, earth mephits, and the like, as they are a blend of two different elements rather than focusing on one alone.
Dust Mephit.hp: 快速愈合2 (in dust or sand)

LA4f99Yw7Dk1e16d.name: 快速愈合2 (in dust or sand)

3t3ulXs6r1EL76F0.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
3t3ulXs6r1EL76F0.description:
The dust mephit breathes a cloud of dust in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals [[/r {2d6}[slashing]]]{2d6 slashing伤害} to each creature within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] save).

The dust mephit can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Dweomercat.name: Dweomercat
Dweomercat.publicNotes: Dweomercats are magically gifted felines from the First World, where they prey upon other creatures and feed upon their primal energy. They are sometimes encountered in areas of the Material Plane where the veil to the First World is thin, or in regions where magic has been irreparably warped. Dweomercats are famous for their ability to twist the metaphorical strings of spells cast on or near them, which they can transform into their own defensive magic or tap into to instantly teleport across the battlefield.
Dweomercat.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Dweomercat.senses: 黑暗视觉, detect magic, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

zSdkC5bHVECvhK79.name: 解除魔法(随意施法) Dispel Magic (At will)
zSdkC5bHVECvhK79.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

sinEXpm7xMjuylIj.name: 侦测魔法(恒定法术) Detect Magic (Constant)
sinEXpm7xMjuylIj.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

SaVJfclmAsjFCBke.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

GVP9BghiDShSeHpL.name: Alter Dweomer
GVP9BghiDShSeHpL.description:
触发 The dweomercat is targeted by a spell or is within the area of a spell as it is cast

效果 The dweomercat gains an effect related to the school of the triggering spell. This effect occurs before the dweomercat is affected by the triggering spell. The effect lasts for 1 minute, until the dweomercat uses this ability again, or until the dweomercat Dismisses the effect, whichever comes first.

  • Abjuration The dweomercat gains a +1 status bonus to AC.
  • Conjuration A cloud of fog appears in a @Template[type:burst|distance:5] centered on a corner of the dweomercat's space. Anything in the cloud is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}.
  • Divination The dweomercat gains a +1 status bonus to all skill checks.
  • Enchantment The dweomercat gains a +1 status bonus to all saves.
  • Evocation Magical feedback deals [[/r {4d6}[force]]]{4d6力场伤害} to the triggering spellcaster (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true] save).
  • Illusion The dweomercat becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This effect ends if the dweomercat uses a hostile action, in addition to the normal end conditions.
  • Necromancy The dweomercat gains 10 temporary HP.
  • Transmutation The dweomercat gains a +1 status bonus to all attack rolls.

nrHgXy7XizFWsPFe.name: Dweomer Leap
nrHgXy7XizFWsPFe.description:
Prerequisites The dweomercat has at least one @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door} spell remaining

效果 The dweomercat casts dimension door, then can make a melee Strike against one creature adjacent to it at the end of its teleport. If the dweomercat ends its teleport adjacent to a creature under an ongoing spell effect or who cast a spell since the dweomercat's last turn, this does not expend a casting of dimension door.

s9Def6M7z5ceOIoj.name: Pounce
s9Def6M7z5ceOIoj.description: The dweomercat Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the dweomercat began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

Earthen Destrier.name: Earthen Destrier
Earthen Destrier.publicNotes: This wave of dirt takes the crude likeness of the melded forequarters of a charging warhorse and a rocky knight wielding a rudimentary lance of gray stone.
Earthen Destrier.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)60尺

eIV0ZcgzUZI0e8VM.name: Earth Glide
eIV0ZcgzUZI0e8VM.description: An earthen destrier can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow} through earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, it moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

st5T6nXfjzQXbUOB.name: Lancing Charge
st5T6nXfjzQXbUOB.description: If the destrier moved at least 10 feet directly before its lance arm Strike, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its damage roll.

AKHyZQZIqFBrYLLC.name: Tilting Strike
AKHyZQZIqFBrYLLC.description:
触发 The earthen destrier tramples a creature

效果 The earthen destrier makes a lance arm Strike against the creature it's trampling at a -5 penalty.

Elasmosaurus.name: Elasmosaurus
Elasmosaurus.publicNotes:
Elasmosauruses are long-necked, primeval reptiles that dwell in deep oceans and seas. Although not truly a dinosaur, elasmosauruses are often found in similar locations and are similarly titanic creatures. Keeping their massive bodies underwater, elasmosauruses use their long necks to catch prey and snorkel air to their massive lungs while remaining mostly hidden from the surface above. An elasmosaurus is 30 feet long and weighs 6,000 pounds.

As rare and reclusive as they are, elasmosauruses are sometimes mistaken for even rarer creatures called water orms, legendary aquatic denizens of remote lakes known for their elusiveness and craftiness. Whereas elasmosauruses are mundane creatures of animalistic intelligence, water orms are magical beings with near-humanoid intelligence and a curious fascination with mortals, and they seem to delight in confounding onlookers. As a result, it's theorized that a typical water orm is more than happy to lead a group of spectators to a lost elasmosaurus, both to throw its pursuers off its tail and for the hilarity that will inevitably ensue.

While elasmosauruses are often found in lost worlds and unsettled regions, those who dwell in the oceans of the world do not contain their hunting grounds to specific regions. As a result, it's not unheard of for a wandering specimen to find its way to coastal waters. Those that do often find the ports of small towns or even large cities to be wondrous banquets and are usually hunted down by coastal guards or adventurers. When a wayward elasmosaurus like this finds its way into a city's sewer system or reservoirs, though, it can become the stuff of urban legends.
Elasmosaurus.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

bC1xvgHpQUnix9Bt.name: Deep Breath
bC1xvgHpQUnix9Bt.description: The elasmosaurus can hold its breath for 2 hours.

FpcxdJ4oqnyX8sBs.name: Long Neck
FpcxdJ4oqnyX8sBs.description: An elasmosaurus's long neck allows it to interact with the surface while its body remains submerged underwater. While submerged no deeper than 15 feet underwater, an elasmosaurus can still stick its head up to breathe. An elasmosaurus gains cover against attacks made against creatures who are above the water's surface while it is underwater, even if its head is above the surface.

Q0zvzLaylr0AYBGR.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

qgyml1ToPqFdJIKa.name: Drag Below
qgyml1ToPqFdJIKa.description: The elasmosaurus attempts an Athletics check against a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} foe's Fortitude DC. If the elasmosaurus succeeds, the foe is forcibly moved 5 feet toward the elasmosaurus's body. If the elasmosaurus critically succeeds, the foe is moved 10 feet towards the elasmosaurus's body.

PF6tfwJNh5sVOavs.name: Thrashing Retreat
PF6tfwJNh5sVOavs.description: A swimming elasmosaurus thrashes the area around it as it attempts to flee. It makes two paddle Strikes, each of which must be against separate targets, and each of which takes the normal multiple attack penalty. It then Swims up to its swim Speed. This Swim does not trigger reactions based on movement.

Ember Fox.name: Ember Fox
Ember Fox.publicNotes: Ember foxes resemble their canid namesakes, save for the flames that make their fur and the tips of their long whiskers flicker and glow.

JlQUb1sbsYfmz5Vi.name: Cloak in Embers
JlQUb1sbsYfmz5Vi.description:
触发 An adjacent ally is targeted by an effect that deals fire damage

效果 The ember fox drapes itself across its ally, granting the ally fire resistance 10 against the incoming attack.

Emperor Cobra.name: Emperor Cobra
Emperor Cobra.publicNotes: These aggressive serpents infest bogs and lowlands. Despite a length of over 16 feet and weighing over 200 pounds, they can climb trees in seconds. An emperor cobra wards off predators by flaring its hood and hissing at its attacker.
Emperor Cobra.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

1MWjpvCpwBy0BFwq.name: Emperor Cobra Venom
1MWjpvCpwBy0BFwq.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] ,

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1轮)

LvD2kKe3HyLRK3Gr.name: Flare Hood
LvD2kKe3HyLRK3Gr.description:
The emperor cobra flares its hood. Each non-emperor cobra creature within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}.

Eremite.name: Eremite
Eremite.publicNotes:
Eremites roam the planes to seek out ideal portions of other creatures, such as a hero's sword-arm or an angel's pinions. Eremites capture these specimens to clinically test their true limits, then harvest specimens and add them to their own bodies. An eremite might attach tongues to their hand as extra fingers or a fist to the back of their neck in a horrid "improvement." Eremites average 7 feet tall and weigh approximately 200 pounds.

The search for ultimate sensation through self-mutilation is the horrifying preoccupation of the shadow-dwelling fiends known as velstracs. They transcend their stoic detachment only when inflicting pain and terror upon their victims, practicing new forms of torture, or when turning their agonizing practices back on themselves. Velstracs consider themselves enlightened beings, transcending such limitations as morality or mortal taboos, but their victims know them as emotionless tormentors who inflict sadistic suffering. These fiends claim to seek perfection in thought, form, and action, although they don't recognize any refinement that doesn't require the painful excision of the flesh or spirit.

Velstracs manifest from the souls of the most extreme masochistic or sadistic mortals who are judged and sent on to the Shadow Plane. They take on forms that suit their vile predilections, ranging from the low-ranking augurs to the maestros of suffering and mutilation called eremites. The process of transformation warps the soul step by step, with other velstracs conveying their new members through untold chambers of pain among the dark reaches of the Shadow Plane.
Eremite.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Eremite.senses: 高等黑暗视觉, painsight, true seeing

7XnqXwEoetjKQZg4.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

LdMlE7uRJEkPdKUA.name: 行影术(随意施法) Shadow Walk (At will)
LdMlE7uRJEkPdKUA.description: 你进入幽影位面，使用其空间扭曲的性质来加速旅行。目标通过幽影位面和物质位面的交界处进入幽影位面的边界。目标在幽影位面中无法看见物质位面（但该位面的一些事物可能是物质位面的模糊投影）。在幽影位面中时，目标可能会遭遇到该位面的原住民。在位面交界之间的幽影会折叠空间，能相对物质位面加速你的旅行。每沿着该交界旅行3分钟，目标会如同在物质位面上旅行1小时。在任何时刻，目标可以解消该法术的效果，但这只影响该目标。幽影的折叠是不准确的，所以当法术结束时，目标会出现在物质位面中距离目标地点大致1英里远的地方（但一同旅行并且在幽影位面同一点解消该法术的目标会在同一位置出现）。

c8DVpWzqdTXj4S64.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
c8DVpWzqdTXj4S64.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

KceVAfrBOyOgCGUj.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
KceVAfrBOyOgCGUj.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

RTunxYN9r4ztOeQC.name: 异界传送(仅限主物质位面或阴影位面) Plane Shift (To Material Plane or Shadow Plane only)
RTunxYN9r4ztOeQC.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

ZYBGyu05L6Ve0V1r.name: 幽影虹吸(随意施法) Shadow Siphon (At will)
ZYBGyu05L6Ve0V1r.description:
触发 一个法术或者魔法效果造成伤害。

你通过将物质位面的能量和幽影位面的能量交换，令目标法术变成了一种部分为幻术的形式。尝试反制目标法术。如果该尝试成功，任何会被该法术伤害的生物仅承受一半的伤害。但该法术在其他方面如常运作。在这次尝试中，幽影虹吸的反制等级视为高2级。

bQ7xqBShE3D6pEMf.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

gAdwnZ4OP8sPpuOg.name: Painsight
gAdwnZ4OP8sPpuOg.description: A velstrac automatically knows whether a creature it sees has any of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} conditions, as well as the value of those conditions.

fBpvD0xb43MGDESG.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

NsRn4K2Tli8P3WKm.name: Ignore Pain
NsRn4K2Tli8P3WKm.description: An eremite's actions can't be disrupted due to damage or Strikes (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.NMWXHGWUcZGoLDKb]{Attack of Opportunity}).

UEAEQewstiRA9wbc.name: Paralytic Perfection
UEAEQewstiRA9wbc.description:
30 feet.

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it feels compelled to offer pieces of its own flesh to the eremite. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:40] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round.

BfXMGYIBKEZIaKVV.name: Evisceration
BfXMGYIBKEZIaKVV.description:
需求 The eremite has a creature grabbed

效果 The eremite excises flesh or bone from a creature it has grabbed. The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed6d10.success].

pmHXQt1EgMIVwD1i.name: Exquisite Pain
pmHXQt1EgMIVwD1i.description:
An eremite's knowledge of pressure points and pain centers is unsurpassed. A creature hit by an eremite's melee Strikes must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 4} on a critical failure).

A creature that critically succeeds is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

4b9FtRKJfWmjYbQR.name: Focus Gaze
4b9FtRKJfWmjYbQR.description:
The eremite stares at a creature they can see within 30 feet. The creature must immediately attempt a Will save against paralytic perfection.

In addition, if the creature was already paralyzed, on a failed save, its unnatural longing causes it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}.

After attempting this save, the creature is then temporarily immune until the start of the eremite's next turn.

03MMQCPuK2UJR1Z6.name: Graft Flesh
03MMQCPuK2UJR1Z6.description:
需求 The eremite holds a piece of flesh they collected via Evisceration

效果 The eremite attaches the stolen flesh to themself. They either regain 100 Hit Points; reduce the value of their clumsy, drained, enfeebled, or stupefied condition by 3; or reduce the stage of any affliction affecting them by 3.

isUs3BDvVUggXstu.name: Shadow Traveler
isUs3BDvVUggXstu.description: When an eremite uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rxvS7EMJ7qmexAyA]{Shadow Walk}, they arrive at exactly their intended destination.

Esobok.name: Esobok
Esobok.publicNotes: Esoboks are brute hunters and pugnacious sentinels that serve as the guard dogs of the Boneyard. These squat, powerful quadrupeds have a frill of dark feathers around their distinctive heads which resemble a crocodile skull. Esoboks rarely bother with those who are truly dead, allowing the dead of the Boneyard to go about their business while remaining watchful for danger. Though cunning when sniffing out threats to the Boneyard or to their psychopomp handlers, they're among the least intelligent of the psychopomps and rarely speak except to utter growling threats. The wise listen when an esobok makes a threat, as it won't do so twice.
Esobok.senses: 黑暗视觉, lifesense 60尺, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

TeoUKrxXSlxbQGds.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

QRGAhXT66Xuc32WM.name: 隐形术(仅限自身) Invisibility (Self only)
QRGAhXT66Xuc32WM.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

B0vz4xw1pLJ9FeyD.name: Pounce
B0vz4xw1pLJ9FeyD.description: The esobok Strides and then makes a Strike. If it began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after the Strike.

elLeiMASiyy7jPxz.name: Spirit Touch
elLeiMASiyy7jPxz.description: An esobok's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch} property rune and deal [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害} to living creatures and [[/r {1d6}[positive]]]{1d6 positive伤害} to undead.

qXrvqRXGNuAyfORa.name: Wrench Spirit
qXrvqRXGNuAyfORa.description:
需求 A creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the esobok's jaws

效果 The esobok releases the target from the Grab but wrenches its spirit free as it does so. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save. Creatures without souls (such as most constructs) and creatures whose bodies and souls are one (such as most celestials, fiends, and monitors) that roll a failure or critical failure on the save get a success instead.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}.

失败 The esobok wrenches the target's soul from its body into its jaws. mindless undead creatures of level 2 or lower are destroyed, other undead creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned} for 1 round, and all other creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}. At the end of each of its turns, a creature paralyzed by this effect can attempt a new save to end the effect. The paralysis ends automatically if the esobok attempts a jaws Strike or speaks.

大失败 As failure, but as long as a creature is stunned or paralyzed, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}.

Fen Mosquito Swarm.name: Fen Mosquito Swarm
Fen Mosquito Swarm.publicNotes: When deadly fen mosquitoes gather in large numbers, they form into lethal swarms capable of draining blood at a truly alarming rate. Fen mosquito swarms are typically encountered only in tropical swamps or bogs, but during humid months in spring or summer they can drift into riverine areas or even through the waterfront reaches of settlements.

jwprc3z4QABxyA1y.name: Pyrexic Malaria
jwprc3z4QABxyA1y.description:
The victim can't reduce its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened} condition while it's affected by pyrexic malaria

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

Onset 4 days

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段3 如阶段2 (1天)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} (1天)

阶段5 dead

9O71o5KF846nZWVa.name: Swarming Bites
9O71o5KF846nZWVa.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true] save) and is exposed to pyrexic malaria. Creatures that fail the saving throw also take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success].

Fetchling Scout.name: Fetchling Scout
Fetchling Scout.publicNotes:
The people known today as fetchlings are a distinct ancestry descended from generations of humans who became trapped ages ago on the Shadow Plane. No longer human at all, these people, who call themselves kayals, have become monochromatic in coloration, with flesh tones and hair colors varying between white, black, and all shades of gray. Their limbs are lithe and willowy, and their eyes are generally solid yellow, yellow-green, or white, though a rare few have a purple or blue glow.

Fetchlings have developed their own complex societies in the Shadow Plane, often under the tolerance of or in servitude to the strange, malignant creatures there, such as the sinister velstracs or the enigmatic d'ziriaks. While individual fetchlings can be any alignment, they are all survivors in a harsh environment, which leads to a tendency toward pragmatism. Fetchling clothing mimics the regions they dwell in, with drab colors tending toward darker shades. When they trade with humans or other societies on the Material Plane, they often wear masks or concealing clothing to hide their appearance.

Typical fetchling communities are insular and swiftly close ranks in the event of an intruder. Though individual fetchlings don't mind traveling to and blending in with other societies to facilitate trade, they often hide or even react defensively if they have their own visitors. When one considers the nature of the other denizens of the Shadow Plane, however, this tendency to assume the worst of interlopers might make sense to some.

Fetchlings are not as common on the Material Plane; most of those who dwell there are loners by choice who have left their home to seek out adventure elsewhere, exiles who were banished from their homelands, or planar castaways with no ability to return to the Shadow Plane. This last category, the lost and stranded, are the most likely to be found in larger groups. In cities of significant size, one can sometimes even find a small community of a few dozen or more fetchlings living among humans, although they often do so subtly by dyeing their hair, wearing brightly colored clothing, and utilizing layers of makeup to hide their pallid complexions.

LRu9rZ2D08Nr5Wa4.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

P6oJVM0MDCy82QgU.name: Shadow Blending
P6oJVM0MDCy82QgU.description: When the fetchling scout is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} as a result of dim light, the flat check to target them has a DC of 7, not 5.

PpVuZdKsS2ms3K3h.name: Shadow Stride
PpVuZdKsS2ms3K3h.description:
需求 The fetchling is in dim light

效果 The fetchling Strides. They have a +10-foot status bonus to their Speed during this Stride. The DC from shadow blending increases to 11 during this Stride, and the fetchling remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} by dim light until the end of the movement, even if they leave dim light during the Stride.

mcOn5wJPK3EDRCeU.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
mcOn5wJPK3EDRCeU.description:
The fetchling scout's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} creatures.

When the monster Strikes a creature that has the flat-footed condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon.

Filth Fire.name: Filth Fire
Filth Fire.publicNotes: These creatures look like roiling clouds of black smoke churning above a mound of burning refuse. Leering faces form and fade in the smoke above, while the burning trash writhes in spasmodic lurches, obviously alive.

F7GzmZlJ6PXy8Cm5.name: Smoke Vision
F7GzmZlJ6PXy8Cm5.description: The filth fire ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from smoke.

nxblqBzJUsncnJ9t.name: Noxious Burst
nxblqBzJUsncnJ9t.description:
Toxic materials and churning rubbish within the filth fire's body explode in one of three ways. The filth fire chooses the effect, but it can't make the same choice twice in a row.

  • Fiery Beam (evocation, fire, primal) The filth fire expels a @Template[type:line|distance:30] of flame that deals [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害} with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true|traits:evocation,fire,primal|overrideTraits:true] save.
  • Shrapnel Blast (evocation, primal) The filth fire shoots jagged rubbish out in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] that deals [[/r {2d12}[piercing]]]{2d12穿刺伤害} with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true|traits:evocation,primal|overrideTraits:true] save.
  • Toxic Fumes (evocation, poison, primal) The filth fire belches a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] of toxic smoke that deals [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|basic:true|traits:evocation,poison,primal|overrideTraits:true] save). A creature that fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Fire Jellyfish Swarm.name: Fire Jellyfish Swarm
Fire Jellyfish Swarm.publicNotes: While individually one of these fist-sized jellyfish is merely a nuisance, in great numbers, fire jellyfish can form into dangerous swarms. Bobbing in the water, they create a cloud of stinging tentacles. They were named in part for their bright coloration, but those who are stung by fire jellyfish learn the larger reason for their name-the pain of their stings is comparable to being burned alive.

lugrDlIHRd8kGDKs.name: Burning Swarm
lugrDlIHRd8kGDKs.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes [[/r {3d8}[poison]]]{3d8毒素伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save) and is exposed to fire jelly venom.

nhcCpe4q2AuE5rBl.name: Fire Jelly Venom
nhcCpe4q2AuE5rBl.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3} (1轮)

Fire Yai.name: Fire Yai
Fire Yai.publicNotes: Fire yai take the form of fire giants. Like fire giants, fire yai are shrewd and militaristic and have an incredible appetite for the thrill of war. While they engage in battle to conquer and control others, fire yai also love the thrill of war, fighting for the sheer joy of it. Presenting a fire yai with a true challenge in combat can potentially earn their mercy and an offer to join and serve at their side. Fire yai's third eyes shoot forth burning missiles of fire.
Fire Yai.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

mlQrjH8yonwvq4Td.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

YVBJxmLTHes9asum.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At will) (Self only)
YVBJxmLTHes9asum.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

iznQySJVx9S3aKAQ.name: +2 Striking Katana
iznQySJVx9S3aKAQ.description: A katana is a curved, single‑edged sword known for its wickedly sharped blade.

k4Emo2tqftGwEdIo.name: +1 Resilient Breastplate
k4Emo2tqftGwEdIo.description: Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or half‑plate armor that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.

HFAfo9jbjahhbw5J.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

4f8Xn8AVpubItk3h.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

7x3Iu1Xd8r44ZR48.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

J0ri0JZTtI3g3kxN.name: Change Shape
J0ri0JZTtI3g3kxN.description:
The fire yai takes on the appearance of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.80TiZrVvIBW7E6L2]{Fire Giant}. This doesn't change their Speed or Strike attack and damage.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

0t8zkWyTQVqJBcMG.name: Impaling Push
0t8zkWyTQVqJBcMG.description:
The fire yai attempts a katana Strike. If it hits, the fire yai attempts an Athletics check against the target creature's Fortitude DC.

大成功 The fire yai Strides or Flies up to half its Speed in any direction. The struck creature takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed4d6.success] and is pushed along with the yai an equal distance. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} until the yai's next turn or until the yai makes a katana Strike.

成功 As critical success, but the creature takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success].

失败 The struck creature is pushed back 5 feet.

大失败 The struck creature is unaffected.

lJ7R0wPVIxspGA72.name: Smoke Form
lJ7R0wPVIxspGA72.description:
The fire yai transforms into a cloud of smoke and then Flies up to its fly speed. This movement does not trigger reactions, and the fire yai can move through spaces occupied by other creatures. The fire yai returns to its physical form after this move, and must end the movement in a space in which it can fit.

All creatures in spaces through which the fire yai moves with Smoke Form must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}.

The fire yai cannot use Smoke Form for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Fjord Linnorm.name: Fjord Linnorm
Fjord Linnorm.publicNotes: Fjord linnorms make their homes in damp caves behind ice-cold waterfalls in the river-veined coastal reaches of the north. While they may appear graceful as they swim up the fjords for which they're named, they are as vile as any other of their species and take pleasures in capsizing river boats before gobbling up their terrified crews.
Fjord Linnorm.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Fjord Linnorm.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺, true seeing

hA360VLZ8uHZCZxF.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

pX8XlXGbLapNVOQT.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
pX8XlXGbLapNVOQT.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

XSu8EpdK6CVQXvZe.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
XSu8EpdK6CVQXvZe.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

JWaVcBKV9F51VWja.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

zIgTjSPfr6rcIZod.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

0gNZbOZYyi010Pow.name: Curse of Stolen Breath
0gNZbOZYyi010Pow.description: When a creature slays a fjord linnorm, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:41] save or become unable to ever breathe underwater (either via a natural ability or a spell such as water breathing). In addition, the victim can hold its breath only half as long as normal, and whenever it holds its breath it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}.

mBjJ5gUJvowlXzIH.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
mBjJ5gUJvowlXzIH.description:
The fjord linnorm expels a @Template[type:line|distance:120] of icy bile, dealing [[/r {17d6}[cold]]]{17d6 cold伤害} to creatures within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save). Any creature that fails its save is covered by the ice, which freezes and fuses with the creature's skin, giving it a -10-foot penalty to Speed. A creature can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{破拆 Force Open} the ice (DC 34) to free itself; otherwise, the ice remains for 1 minute.

The fjord linnorm can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

wyy8wN5QiLr4fV2L.name: Fjord Linnorm Venom
wyy8wN5QiLr4fV2L.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 [[/r {4d6}[cold]]]{4d6 cold伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {6d6}[cold]]]{6d6 cold伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

Flytrap Leshy.name: Flytrap Leshy
Flytrap Leshy.publicNotes:
While often seen as unfriendly by non-leshys, flytrap leshys get along well with other leshys. Nonetheless, they're among the most aggressive leshys, often guarding the most vulnerable places in the natural world with their flytrap mouths and hands.

When a large threat emerges, pairs of flytrap leshys band together to create amalgams capable of driving back powerful foes. This unusual form of communal defense suffuses flytrap leshy society, and they often form relationships between multiple individuals that would confuse or even scandalize more uptight humanoids-to a flytrap leshy, though, there's nothing strange about sharing your innermost secrets with people you literally merged together with to defend your home from an enemy.

J7vnMM93liaoRzjV.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

mXh2p5FT7dkLC4KJ.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

yooFGlf4aPfCD1vV.name: Verdant Burst
yooFGlf4aPfCD1vV.description:
When a flytrap leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from its body, restoring [[/r {3d6}[healing]]]{3d6 Hit Points} to each plant creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30].

This area immediately fills with flytraps, becoming difficult terrain. If the terrain is not a viable environment for these flytraps, they wither after 24 hours.

qxsT5YmSCH2dqJAT.name: Amalgam
qxsT5YmSCH2dqJAT.description:
A flytrap leshy can combine itself with an adjacent and willing flytrap leshy that is not currently affected by Amalgam. The leshy using Amalgam physically merges with the target, restoring [[/r {3d8}[healing]]]{3d8 Hit Points} to the target.

The leshy can Sustain a Spell to continue Amalgam, but once they stop, the target leshy takes [[/r {3d8}]]{3d8伤害}. If the target leshy dies, Amalgam ends at once and the original leshy gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition or increases their dying condition value by 1 if they were already dying.

As long as Amalgam is sustained, the target leshy gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws, its AC increases to 21, and it gains an additional reaction at the start of each turn.

BJelgf4pdEHXMd9u.name: Change Shape
BJelgf4pdEHXMd9u.description:
The flytrap leshy transforms into a Small flytrap. This ability otherwise uses the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Tree Shape}.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

PrFbn0CsipqWtp4z.name: Flytrap Toxin
PrFbn0CsipqWtp4z.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1轮),

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} (1轮)

Froghemoth.name: Froghemoth
Froghemoth.publicNotes: A terrifying abomination of teeth, tentacles, and unbridled rage, the froghemoth is thankfully rarely encountered even in the deepest swamplands or most remote Darklands caverns. Capable of devouring dinosaurs and even dragons, it is a frighteningly effective ambush hunter, immersing itself in the mire with only its eyestalk protruding and watching in every direction at once with uncanny precision.

zdW63lmShrSpZWkm.name: Otherworldly Vision
zdW63lmShrSpZWkm.description: A froghemoth's alien eyes allow it to perceive creatures within 30尺, even if they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} or ethereal. It can still be fooled by successful Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide}, but it has @Check[type:perception|dc:38|traits:action:seek] in such cases. It also sees through and is unaffected by illusions with the visual trait if they are within 30 feet.

pfYqWHlnkQUBpJIo.name: Electric Torpor
pfYqWHlnkQUBpJIo.description: Though a froghemoth is immune to electricity damage, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round whenever it would have otherwise taken electricity damage.

2KNgUCdMbbr8kaE7.name: Barbed Tongue
2KNgUCdMbbr8kaE7.description:
A creature hit by the froghemoth's tongue becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the froghemoth. The creature isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the froghemoth's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a successful Strike against AC 31 that deals at least 15 slashing damage.

This deals no damage to the froghemoth but prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes 1 minute.

tVBujCEfyKPKjA2Q.name: Flailing Tentacles
tVBujCEfyKPKjA2Q.description: The froghemoth makes up to four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. These count toward the froghemoth's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

BfQDGpd8cSNGgENd.name: Retract Tongue
BfQDGpd8cSNGgENd.description: The froghemoth pulls a creature grabbed by its tongue toward itself. The froghemoth rolls an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, the froghemoth pulls the creature into an adjacent space, and if it critically succeeds it can also make a bite Strike against the creature after the pull.

Frost Troll.name: Frost Troll
Frost Troll.publicNotes: Frost trolls are nightmarish frozen monsters of rime-stained claws and hoarfrost teeth. Possessing wits superior to those of common trolls, frost trolls often hunt in packs of three-one attacking their quarry openly while the remaining two pause to assess weaknesses before moving in for the kill. Frost trolls relish the taste of human flesh and adjust their hunting grounds seasonally to remain in close proximity to their favorite prey. Of slighter frame than common trolls, a typical frost troll stands 11 feet tall when not hunched and weighs 900 pounds. Their sickly, cracked flesh is of an icy, cerulean pallor. Frost trolls often adorn themselves with trophies of bone and hide flayed from their kills.

ZoL2vMSlQqYIUJAX.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

8JhtIGFYB5PcTSIt.name: Ice Stride
8JhtIGFYB5PcTSIt.description: A frost troll isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor do they need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice.

Frost Worm.name: Frost Worm
Frost Worm.publicNotes:
The frost worm's single round, red eye gleams prominently at the head of its monstrous mass, white as a winter snowfall. What appears to be a bifurcated lower jaw is actually two spiky parapodia that the worm uses to shovel food into its lamprey-like mouth. An adult frost worm measures 35 feet long and weighs 8,000 pounds.

A frost worm is an apex predator that uses camouflage, burrowing, and deceit to ambush its prey. When it attacks, a frost worm produces a distinctive, high-pitched trill. Though some survivors of frost worm attacks have compared it to a wailing lament, the trill has a captivating effect on nearby creatures, causing them to stop and listen even as the monstrous creature approaches.

The cold shed by a frost worm is as dangerous as its trill or its jaws, and while it is not fond of warmer climates, neither is it particularly hampered in such regions. A frost worm that somehow finds itself in temperate or even tropical environs causes the immediate area to chill and ice over with frost over time, creating seemingly impossible pockets of frozen terrain.

MPJFQqOrPfQloQLr.name: Death Throes
MPJFQqOrPfQloQLr.description: When a frost worm dies, it explodes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:100] of searing cold blood. All creatures and objects in range take [[/r {10d8}[cold]]]{10d8 cold伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

jISdvlh9f3wIBxZ8.name: Freezing Blood
jISdvlh9f3wIBxZ8.description:
触发 The frost worm takes piercing or slashing damage

效果 The frost worm's freezing blood sprays out on a random creature within 10 feet of the frost worm. That creature takes [[/r {7d6}[cold]]]{7d6 cold伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

GFW3IASGrcBSyETb.name: Worm Chill
GFW3IASGrcBSyETb.description:
5 feet.

A creature that enters or begins its turn in the emanation takes [[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

BdPJLN1AK4im8nIu.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
BdPJLN1AK4im8nIu.description:
The frost worm exhales a blast of frost, dealing [[/r {13d6}[cold]]]{13d6 cold伤害} to creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:50] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

KtIqgI2Oe8cbrguF.name: Worm Trill
KtIqgI2Oe8cbrguF.description:
The frost worm emits a hypnotic trill. Each non-frost worm creature within 100 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:32] save. The effects of Worm Trill last for 1 round, but if the frost worm uses this ability again on subsequent rounds, it extends this duration by 1 round for any creature already affected.

成功 The creature is unaffected and is immune to Worm Trill for 24 hours.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} by the frost worm.

大失败 As failure, but the fascinated condition doesn't end if the frost worm uses hostile actions against the creature.

Ghonhatine.name: Ghonhatine
Ghonhatine.publicNotes:
In transforming xulgaths, drow fleshwarpers sought not to create a new type of creature but to recapture a form of xulgath predecessor believed entirely vanished from Golarion. Ghonhatines are the result-hulking reptilian beasts who prefer to crawl on all fours and tear at their foes with bestial fury.

Horrid abominations reshaped by vile alchemical magic, the two fleshwarps presented here were created by drow, who transform captured elves or xulgaths into twisted monstrosities that can then be loosed to cause havoc and terror.
Ghonhatine.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

GEb3KusxBDvL8CkC.name: Stench
GEb3KusxBDvL8CkC.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for as long as it's sickened on a critical failure).

While within the aura, affected creatures take a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.wX9L6fbqVMLP05hn]{Effect: Stench}

pmfr4MB1abUN5RbW.name: Feed
pmfr4MB1abUN5RbW.description:
需求 The ghonhatine is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour

效果 The ghonhatine devours a chunk of the corpse. For 1 minute, the ghonhatine gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing 5} and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls. It can gain these benefits from any given corpse only once.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.wPW6kVscJgBLPVKZ]{Effect: Ghonhatine Feed}

HIRmU6WblxuDmWc6.name: Fleshgout
HIRmU6WblxuDmWc6.description:
A ghonhatine's vomit carries an awful disease that, over time, can cause a suffering creature's flesh to develop painful boils that eventually slough away, leaving gaping wounds

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

阶段1 carrier with no ill effect ([[/r 1d4 #Incubation]]{1d4小时})

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1天)

阶段4 enfeebled 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3} (1天)

阶段5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 4}, enfeebled 2, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} (1天)

阶段6 dead

Giant Amoeba.name: Giant Amoeba
Giant Amoeba.publicNotes: These blobs of nearly transparent protoplasm are identical in form and behavior to the microscopic creatures from which they have evolved, except their outlandish size makes them all the more dangerous. Unlike slimes, puddings, and other deadly oozes, giant amoebas have an outer membrane that contains their internal structures, making them more susceptible to slashing weapons than their amorphous kin. However, this membrane is also extremely flexible and permeable, allowing them to surround prey and absorb it, suffocating and slowly digesting it in the amoeba's acidic fluids.

N9in8b8yuAVDLoyD.name: Motion Sense
N9in8b8yuAVDLoyD.description: A giant amoeba can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

aQDe7We9BV7qqiIm.name: Envelop
aQDe7We9BV7qqiIm.description:
需求 The giant amoeba begins its turn with a target its size or smaller @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

效果 The giant amoeba maintains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab} and extends pseudopods to surround the creature and pull it inside the amoeba's body. This thereafter has the same effect as if the amoeba had @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.zU3Ovaet4xQ5Gmvy]{Engulfed} the creature (DC 17, [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6酸液伤害}, Escape DC 17, Rupture 3).

eQGUATVlHv8iZ97x.name: Weak Acid
eQGUATVlHv8iZ97x.description: A giant amoeba's acid damages only organic material-not metal, stone, or other inorganic substances.

Giant Ant.name: Giant Ant
Giant Ant.publicNotes:
Giant ants are much like their smaller kin in their industrious habits, though growing to the size of ponies makes them much deadlier.

Ants are industrious insects that aid the natural processes of decay and renewal.
Giant Ant.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

izA7GPk45mKcDG02.name: Giant Ant Venom
izA7GPk45mKcDG02.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8 poison}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 poison}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {1d12}[poison]]]{1d12 poison}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3} (1轮)

EhmJLz0h6EUzbywV.name: Haul Away
EhmJLz0h6EUzbywV.description:
需求 The giant ant has a Large or smaller creature grabbed

效果 The giant ant Strides up to its full Speed, carrying the grabbed creature with it. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} if the grabbed creature is Medium or larger.

Giant Badger.name: Giant Badger
Giant Badger.publicNotes:
The violent, territorial giant badger is a relentless predator. An obligate carnivore, its prey ranges from rabbits to deer, livestock, and even the occasional traveler or adventurer. A giant badger's claws are sharp and strong enough to carve tunnels from solid rock. They typically stand 4 feet tall at the shoulder and weigh 500 pounds.

The burrowing badger is plentiful in most temperate forests. All badgers are naturally fierce and tenacious, and their squat stature belies their strength and speed.
Giant Badger.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

iSVPM2m77YXV78mJ.name: Badger Rage
iSVPM2m77YXV78mJ.description:
The giant badger enters a state of pure rage that lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies it can perceive, or until it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, whichever comes first.

While raging, the giant badger has AC 17, its jaws Strike deals 1d8+8 damage, and its claw Strike deals 1d6+6 damage. While raging, the giant badger also can't use actions that have the concentrate trait except for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}.

After it has stopped raging, a giant badger can't use Badger Rage again for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{Effect: Rage}

Giant Chameleon.name: Giant Chameleon
Giant Chameleon.publicNotes: Giant chameleons are legendary for their ability to change their skin color in response to their surroundings. Their eyes are capable of peering in different directions independently, making them almost as difficult to sneak up on as they are to notice in the first place.

qbn93YsujSFI6TMZ.name: Camouflage
qbn93YsujSFI6TMZ.description: The giant chameleon can change its coloration to match its surroundings. It doesn't need cover to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} with a Stealth check.

sguXTwhSIa1swJ1p.name: Tongue Grab
sguXTwhSIa1swJ1p.description: If the giant chameleon hits a creature with a tongue Strike, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the giant chameleon. The target isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the giant chameleon's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with an attack that hits AC 15 and deals at least 4 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the giant chameleon, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

Giant Cockroach.name: Giant Cockroach
Giant Cockroach.publicNotes: Cockroaches are communal creatures, rarely setting out on their own unless they are searching for food. If an adventurer encounters a single giant cockroach while exploring, they had best take precautions against others, as there is likely an entire colony nearby.
Giant Cockroach.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

aJhXMbTAQPFT4ySw.name: Scurry
aJhXMbTAQPFT4ySw.description:
触发 The giant cockroach is targeted by a melee attack

效果 The giant cockroach gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack resolves, the cockroach Strides, Climbs, or Flies up to 10 feet.

Giant Crab.name: Giant Crab
Giant Crab.publicNotes:
Crabs are scavenging crustaceans known for their hard shells and iconic sideways gait. They use their claws to defend themselves, hunt, and fight other crabs for territory. When confronted with threats from outside their species, most crabs prefer to flee, but when retreat isn't possible, they clamp on to their foes as tightly as they can.

The statistics presented here represent giant crabs that live close to the water's surface. Crabs that live deeper underwater often exhibit more extreme adaptations to their environment. Crabs who live in the depths where little light reaches gain darkvision and cold resistance, and those adapted to the most hostile reaches of the deep sea can detect nearby creatures through subtle shifts in ocean currents.

These skittering creatures are prized for their delicious meat, but their size makes them dangerous targets for harvesting.

ez4TlFP9ir8diYv7.name: Scuttle
ez4TlFP9ir8diYv7.description:
触发 A creature that the giant crab can see targets the crab with an attack

效果 The giant crab scuttles to the side and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack resolves, the crab can Stride up to its speed in a straight line as part of the reaction.

WXEuGWzgAk5JMfEE.name: Vulnerable to Prone
WXEuGWzgAk5JMfEE.description: If a creature critically succeeds on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip} the giant crab, the crab is flipped over onto its back in addition to the usual effects. A giant crab that is flipped onto its back has a particularly hard time defending itself; instead of taking the normal -2 circumstance penalty to AC for being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}, it takes a -4 circumstance penalty to AC.

Giant Crawling Hand.name: Giant Crawling Hand
Giant Crawling Hand.publicNotes:
A giant crawling hand is the appendage of a very large creature, such as a giant.

Typically, crawling hands are formed when severed appendages are endowed with a crude sentience by evil necromantic energies that turn them into tireless killers. Yet crawling hands can also arise spontaneously, usually when a creature loses an appendage in a place rife with necromantic energy or with a connection to the Negative Energy Plane.
Giant Crawling Hand.senses: lifesense 30尺, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

l6ptuF1kw5FfVHfl.name: Pus Burst
l6ptuF1kw5FfVHfl.description:
触发 The giant crawling hand takes piercing or slashing damage

效果 A random creature adjacent to the giant crawling hand is sprayed with vile pus that deals [[/r {4d6}[negative]]]{4d6负能量伤害}. The affected creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|traits:damaging-effect] save.

大成功 The creature takes no damage.

成功 The creature takes half damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

失败 The creature takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}.

大失败 The creature takes double damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}.

QACVidUBGQoHHpqW.name: Mark Quarry
QACVidUBGQoHHpqW.description: A crawling hand can be assigned a quarry by anointing the hand with a drop of the intended quarry's blood. If the hand ever has no quarry, it automatically gains the next creature it damages as its quarry.
