The hand gains a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seeks} its quarry, to Survival checks when it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Tracks} its quarry, and damage rolls when it Strikes its quarry.

Giant Dragonfly.name: Giant Dragonfly
Giant Dragonfly.publicNotes: These buzzing insects are the size of a small horse. They are ambush predators known to hunt beasts and humanoids alike, capable of using impressive aerial acrobatics to swoop down from above and snatch away their prey.

vVt7KeVPbqT0jHZQ.name: Clutch
vVt7KeVPbqT0jHZQ.description:
需求 The giant dragonfly has a Medium or smaller creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} in its mandibles

效果 The dragonfly tries to transfer the grabbed creature to be clutched by its legs. The giant dragonfly attempts an Athletics check against the creature's Reflex DC. On a success, it transfers the creature (which remains grabbed) to its legs, freeing its mandibles to attack. The dragonfly can have only one creature clutched at a time.

DPcRdZIL38qcDj2I.name: Snatch
DPcRdZIL38qcDj2I.description: The giant dragonfly can Fly at half Speed while it has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} by Clutch, carrying that creature along with it.

xXv6eUeKYXjO80rc.name: Swoop
xXv6eUeKYXjO80rc.description: The giant dragonfly Flies up to its Speed and makes one mandible Strike at any point during that movement.

Giant Dragonfly Nymph.name: Giant Dragonfly Nymph
Giant Dragonfly Nymph.publicNotes: The aquatic, wingless offspring of dragonflies are called dragonfly nymphs. Giant dragonfly nymphs can be several feet in length and mostly hunt in shallow waters, eating carrion and ambushing living creatures with their fully grown counterparts. They are not daunted by larger creatures, compelled by their instinct to eat as much as possible to sustain their growth.

clxrPF7TPJ4sS2A6.name: Extend Mandibles
clxrPF7TPJ4sS2A6.description: The giant dragonfly nymph extends its jaws to a surprising distance. The dragonfly nymph makes a mandibles Strike with a reach of 10尺, but the mandibles lose the agile trait for this Strike.

Giant Fly.name: Giant Fly
Giant Fly.publicNotes:
This pony-sized fly's twitching limbs seem to never stop moving as it constantly cleans itself and scoops anything edible into its mouthparts. While primarily carrion eaters, giant flies sometimes prey on livestock or other animals too slow to get away.

Giant flies are pony-sized insects that have massive compound eyes and bodies bristling with short, stiff hairs. Their lairs are notorious for the rotting meat they stockpile to lay their eggs into. Their maggot-dens are also prime breeding grounds for virulent diseases.
Giant Fly.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

GimuDrJ7GoLAne8i.name: Avoid the Swat
GimuDrJ7GoLAne8i.description:
触发 The giant fly is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see

效果 The giant fly gains a +2 circumstance bonus against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the giant insect can Fly up to its fly Speed.

kGJwFA2RdVWHs6ty.name: Fly Pox
kGJwFA2RdVWHs6ty.description:
A giant fly could carry any disease, but most transmit a virulent but not fatal infection called Fly Pox with their bite

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

Onset 1 day

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1天)

阶段2 如阶段1 (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1天)

阶段4 如阶段3 (1天)

阶段5 enfeebled 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} (1天)

Giant Frog.name: Giant Frog
Giant Frog.publicNotes: Giant frogs can grow up to 6 feet long and weigh over 200 pounds, with rows of razor-sharp teeth lining their gaping mouths.

YhTp7RIQLVLYYNUn.name: Sticky尺
YhTp7RIQLVLYYNUn.description: Giant frogs are not flat-footed when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balancing} on a narrow surface, and they gain a +4 bonus to Reflex saves to avoid falling.

YlO5up5kkSrroKf6.name: Tongue Grab
YlO5up5kkSrroKf6.description:
A creature hit by the giant frog's tongue becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the giant frog. The creature isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the frog's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a Strike against AC 13 that deals at least 2 slashing damage.

This deals no damage to the frog but prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

Giant Hippocampus.name: Giant Hippocampus
Giant Hippocampus.publicNotes: Living in the deepest reaches of the ocean, giant hippocampi haven't been sighted near the shore and are often regarded as legends made up by sailors.
Giant Hippocampus.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

FNSLMfCQHDGPvjsv.name: Sudden Retreat
FNSLMfCQHDGPvjsv.description: The giant hippocampus makes a tail Strike, then Swims with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its swim Speed. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.

Giant Jellyfish.name: Giant Jellyfish
Giant Jellyfish.publicNotes: Unlike its smaller cousins, the giant jellyfish is an active predator that chases down its prey through reefs or open water. It can even squeeze its enormous bell-shaped body into the tight confines of shipwrecks to drape its mane of tentacles across the exposed flesh of its prey.

8Xjni4fPUr5P0Dl9.name: Jellyfish Venom
8Xjni4fPUr5P0Dl9.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d8}[poison]]]{2d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1轮)

F2cUCIHpa06Qkqy2.name: Squeeze
F2cUCIHpa06Qkqy2.description: A giant jellyfish can fit into tight spaces as if it were a Medium creature. It can move at its full Speed while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeezing}.

Giant Leech.name: Giant Leech
Giant Leech.publicNotes: Capable of growing to lengths of nearly 5尺, giant leeches have circular maws filled with hook-like teeth. They prefer to dwell in stagnant or slow-moving shallow water or in damp, moist undergrowth. Horses and larger animals are their favorite prey, but they won't balk at a chance to latch onto a human- or halfling-sized meal.

OQMwQiE7vGLPMasL.name: Blood Drain
OQMwQiE7vGLPMasL.description:
需求 The giant leech has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}

效果 The giant leech drains blood from the creature it has grabbed. This deals [[/r 2d4]] damage. A creature that has its blood drained by a giant leech is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} until it receives any kind or amount of healing.

Giant Maggot.name: Giant Maggot
Giant Maggot.publicNotes:
Giant flies lay their eggs on the bodies of larger monsters or livestock. When they hatch, these eggs release squirming maggots the size of human children, ravenous young who voraciously consume any flesh in the immediate vicinity-typically starting with the body upon which they were born.

Giant flies are pony-sized insects that have massive compound eyes and bodies bristling with short, stiff hairs. Their lairs are notorious for the rotting meat they stockpile to lay their eggs into. Their maggot-dens are also prime breeding grounds for virulent diseases.

3YdQIsd5sKYMGTIc.name: Regurgitation
3YdQIsd5sKYMGTIc.description:
触发 The giant maggot takes damage

效果 The giant maggot regurgitates its rancid, foul meal. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

The giant maggot can't use Regurgitation again until it spends at least an hour feeding on a corpse.

zvArmvrursLxbgGq.name: Gnaw Flesh
zvArmvrursLxbgGq.description:
需求 The giant maggot has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} a creature

效果 The giant maggot deals [[/r {1d8+2}[slashing]]]{1d8+2 slashing伤害} to the grabbed creature as it chews the creature's flesh (@Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true] save).

Giant Mosquito.name: Giant Mosquito
Giant Mosquito.publicNotes: These horrifically enlarged versions of the common mosquito often prey upon megafauna like dinosaurs and other large creatures, but they won't turn down a chance to drink the blood of a smaller target-such as a humanoid.
Giant Mosquito.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

43gvQaRJhhjmfG3Z.name: Blood Drain
43gvQaRJhhjmfG3Z.description:
需求 The giant mosquito has a creature grabbed

效果 The giant mosquito uses its proboscis to drain blood from the grabbed creature. This deals [[/r 3d6]] damage, and the giant mosquito gains temporary Hit Points equal to the damage dealt. A creature that has its blood drained by a giant mosquito is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} until it receives healing of any kind or amount.

eFiZ1wgGbxx9AVu1.name: Septic Malaria
eFiZ1wgGbxx9AVu1.description:
The victim can't reduce its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened} condition while it's affected by septic malaria

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|traits:disease]

Onset 1 day

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段3 如阶段2 (1天)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} (1天)

阶段5 dead

Giant Slug.name: Giant Slug
Giant Slug.publicNotes:
These massive, primeval relatives of ordinary slugs squirm slowly through swamps and grasslands. Giant slugs are always voracious and prefer to eat flesh or plants high in water content. They frequently consume livestock or strip bare entire orchards or melon crops. For cattle, pigs, or other sizable meals, they first shred the creatures using their radula-tongue-like appendages covered in teeth- to make them easier to consume. The mucus secreted by a giant slug is powerfully acidic and viscous. Wherever it travels, the creature leaves a trailing brown strip that kills most vegetation. Farmers and ranchers, especially those living near swamps known to contain giant slugs, keep close tabs on these journeys. Many almanacs go into great detail on slug migration and mating seasons. Since each giant slug needs its own wide hunting ground, the creatures typically come into proximity to mate only once a year. Either or both slugs can become impregnated, and any that do typically lay a clutch of around 100 eggs. They usually lay these eggs in a shallow bog or a cool, humid cave.

Giant slugs tend to travel at night, as the creatures dislike sunlight and dry weather. They have been known to seek out locations like barns, the undersides of bridges, or even fortifications like castles for shelter as dawn starts to break. Woe to the unprepared farmer who ambles out at sunrise to milk the cows but instead finds that a giant slug has made the barn its home! Subterranean giant slugs don't have to worry about sunlight, and crawl about on no schedule in particular. Narrow tunnels pose little obstacle for them, as the creatures can easily compress their bodies. These factors make their movements very unpredictable, so they pose quite a menace for underground peoples like kobolds or xulgaths.
Giant Slug.senses: no hearing, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

HPPj6Nf4GtdwCAEx.name: No Hearing
HPPj6Nf4GtdwCAEx.description: A giant slug has no auditory senses. It is immune to auditory effects, automatically critically fails Perception checks that require it to hear, and takes a -2 status penalty to Perception checks (but not initiative rolls) that involve sound but also rely on other senses.

5WLytdwKYQa3JLh7.name: Malleable
5WLytdwKYQa3JLh7.description: The giant slug can fit through tight spaces as if it were a Large creature. While @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeezing}, it can move at its full Speed. It can Squeeze through spaces that typically fit only a Medium creature, but it does so at the usual Speed for Squeezing.

72YvqHEAOHV34zLK.name: Mucus
72YvqHEAOHV34zLK.description: Any creature hit by the giant slug or that moves into its mucus trail is coated in sticky, caustic mucus. It takes [[/r {1d4}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续酸液伤害} and takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds while the damage persists.

3s66FP7raqgSCnP1.name: Mucus Trail
3s66FP7raqgSCnP1.description: Any square the giant slug moves into is coated in mucus. These spaces are difficult terrain, and any creature that moves into one or ends its turn in one is subjected to the slug's mucus. After an hour, the mucus dries and the area is no longer difficult terrain.

Giant Solifugid.name: Giant Solifugid
Giant Solifugid.publicNotes:
The smallest of giant solifugids are still large enough to harry desert traders and their mounts.

These monstrous vermin have six legs and two large feeding appendages easily mistaken for an additional pair of legs. They are often called camel spiders, sun spiders, or wind scorpions, despite the fact that they are neither spiders nor scorpions.

hEsUevgpSNSIcNzB.name: Pounce
hEsUevgpSNSIcNzB.description: The giant solifugid Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the giant solifugid began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

Giant Squid.name: Giant Squid
Giant Squid.publicNotes: Dwelling deep within the oceans, this huge cephalopod grows up to 45 feet in length and can weigh up to 600 pounds. Its arms and tentacles are lined with hundreds of hooks and suckers, allowing it to seize its prey with ease.

GSglY8uncoV8v0jg.name: Jet
GSglY8uncoV8v0jg.description: The giant squid moves up to 200 feet in a straight line through the water without triggering any reactions.

dO0urnF4xfwl5Yp8.name: Ravenous Embrace
dO0urnF4xfwl5Yp8.description: The giant squid makes up to four arm Strikes, each with a different arm and against a different target. The giant squid then makes a beak Strike against one creature that it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} during Ravenous Embrace. Each arm Strike counts separately for the squid's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until the squid has made all of its arm Strikes; the beak Strike uses the multiple attack penalty as normal.

Giant Tick.name: Giant Tick
Giant Tick.publicNotes: This grotesque tick is the size of a dog and scurries with surprising speed.

UHFNjGmcb7jCzvBE.name: Attach
UHFNjGmcb7jCzvBE.description: When the giant tick Strikes a creature larger than itself, its barbed hypostome attaches it to that creature. This is similar to Grabbing the creature, but the giant tick moves with that creature rather than holding it in place. The giant tick is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} while attached. If the giant tick is killed or pushed away while attached to a creature on which it has used Blood Drain, that creature takes [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续 Bleed伤害}. Escaping the attachment or removing the giant tick in other ways doesn't cause bleed damage.

eOpB0SxDMEU65Oyy.name: Blood Drain
eOpB0SxDMEU65Oyy.description:
需求 The giant tick is attached to a creature

效果 The giant tick uses its hypostome to drain blood from the creature it's attached to. This deals [[/r 1d4]] damage, and the giant tick gains temporary Hit Points equal to the damage dealt. A creature that has its blood drained by a giant tick is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} until it receives healing (of any kind or amount).

mzdRGmCygfrC7SXm.name: Tick Fever
mzdRGmCygfrC7SXm.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

Onset 1 day

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1天)

Giant Toad.name: Giant Toad
Giant Toad.publicNotes: Most giant toads live in dry environments, particularly deserts, and eagerly eat almost any creature smaller than themselves. They're known to eat giant rats, then take over the rats' burrows as homes. Giant toads have large poison glands behind their eyes that enable them to coat their skin with poison. This leads to them having very few natural predators, and populations can quickly explode if left unchecked. While most consider giant toads dangerous pests, some groups of ogres and hill giants cultivate them to collect their poison for recreational use.
Giant Toad.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

AhfsEZ9fBUS6e02P.name: Poisonous Warts
AhfsEZ9fBUS6e02P.description: Any creature that hits the giant toad with an unarmed Strike or otherwise touches the toad is exposed to giant toad poison.

KQBI90QlI48BEPP3.name: Giant Toad Poison
KQBI90QlI48BEPP3.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} (1轮)

tmi63gM84pc6s5qK.name: Tongue Grab
tmi63gM84pc6s5qK.description:
A creature hit by the giant toad's tongue becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the giant toad. The creature isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, but it can't move beyond the reach of the toad's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a successful Strike against AC 15 that deals at least 6 slashing damage.

This deals no damage to the toad but prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

Giant Whiptail Centipede.name: Giant Whiptail Centipede
Giant Whiptail Centipede.publicNotes: Whiptail centipedes are sleek and swift tunnel predators.

U69lb7BfCPLfTsfG.name: 借机攻击(仅限甩尾) Attack of Opportunity (Tail Only)

gd4pTa9mCV6qrbcN.name: Undulate
gd4pTa9mCV6qrbcN.description: The giant whiptail centipede Strides or Steps. During this movement, it can pass through spaces as narrow as 5 feet without Squeezing.

JTKyH2bv7vq73eF0.name: Whiptail Centipede Venom
JTKyH2bv7vq73eF0.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

Giant Wolverine.name: Giant Wolverine
Giant Wolverine.publicNotes: Giant wolverines grow to the approximate size of horses and claim even more expansive territories than their more diminutive wolverine cousins. While a smaller wolverine will defend its prey from armed humanoids, a giant wolverine is unafraid to stalk and kill such creatures.
Giant Wolverine.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

nKM6FVNsXbBwEPNq.name: Gnaw
nKM6FVNsXbBwEPNq.description:
需求 The wolverine has a creature grabbed from its jaws Strike

效果 The wolverine chews violently on the creature, dealing [[/r {2d6}[piercing]]]{2d6穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|basic:true] save). A creature that fails its save also takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success].

YdcYSwBDfJFctOhL.name: Pounce
YdcYSwBDfJFctOhL.description: The giant wolverine Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the giant wolverine begins this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after the attack.

jzbdXMuXge2oT2ol.name: Wolverine Rage
jzbdXMuXge2oT2ol.description:
The giant wolverine enters a state of pure rage that lasts either for 1 minute, until there are no enemies it can perceive, or until it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, whichever comes first. While raging, the giant wolverine has AC 20, its jaws Strike deals 2d6+11 damage, and its claw Strike deals 2d4+11 damage. While raging, the giant wolverine can't use actions that have the concentrate trait, except for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}.

After it's stopped raging, a giant wolverine can't use Wolverine Rage again for 1 minute.

Glass Golem.name: Glass Golem
Glass Golem.publicNotes:
Crafted of hardened glass and held together by magically treated lead, glass golems are both deadly guardians and works of exquisite art. Glass golems most often protect grand cathedrals or opulent palaces-testaments to the wealth and power of those they serve, or once served. Once spurred into action by the commands of their creators, glass golems are quicker and more agile than most other golems. Their sharp, blade-like limbs can easily sever veins and arteries, creating wounds that bleed profusely.

Of all the various types of golems, the glass golem is the one most akin to a work of art. Just as powerful aristocrats might use an ice golem for temperature regulation or a wood golem as an ego-boosting statue, a glass golem's colorful glass construction can elevate the beauty of any chamber by its mere presence.

kcRvfKLlgq9sdmsj.name: Golem Antimagic
kcRvfKLlgq9sdmsj.description:
harmed by sonic ([[/r 6d6]], [[/r 2d6]] from areas or persistent damage); healed by fire (area [[/r 2d6]] HP); slowed by cold

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. If an entry lists multiple types (such as “cold and water”), either type of spell can affect the golem.

Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical.

Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical.

Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for [[/r 2d6]] rounds instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's slowed 1 for that round.

Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.

LwBTFYgYLRf8gXzt.name: Spell Reflection
LwBTFYgYLRf8gXzt.description:
触发 The glass golem is targeted by a spell

效果 The glass golem positions its magical, reflective surfaces to turn the spell back on the caster. It tries to counteract the spell by attempting an Acrobatics check for its counteract check. If it successfully counteract the spell, the effect is turned back on the caster.

4cuSJxJLUg7icXmj.name: Vulnerable to Shatter
4cuSJxJLUg7icXmj.description: A glass golem is affected by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell as though the golem were an unattended object.

lQZGx8hWnzcG2R6l.name: Dazzling Brilliance
lQZGx8hWnzcG2R6l.description:
The glass golem creates waves of scintillating luminosity that cast bright light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] (and dim light for the next 60 feet). The light lasts until the start of the glass golem's next turn, after which the glass golem can't use Dazzling Brilliance for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}. A creature within the bright light or that enters the bright light must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:23] save.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 round and then dazzled for an additional 4 rounds.

Gorgon.name: Gorgon
Gorgon.publicNotes:
Though they may resemble constructs to the untrained eye due to their metallic, interlocking armor plates that look and feel like polished stone, gorgons are a creature of flesh and bone. These ill-tempered beasts greet interlopers with a charge or trample accompanied with belches of petrifying breath. Gorgons are dangerous on their own, and when they band together in herds, they become especially deadly.

Gorgons typically subsist on petrified flesh or fossils. These supernatural beasts can gain sustenance from natural stone if they must, though they find raw stone flavorless, so it's not a preferred food source. In battle, gorgons use their petrifying breath to turn their prey into stone. They break up the resulting statues with their hooves or horns and swallow the stony chunks with loud chewing bites. Gorgons cannot digest unpetrified organic material, and if they try, they experience sickness and great gastrointestinal peril. Such discomforts are not life threatening to gorgons, but they do make the creatures even more ill tempered than usual-much to the chagrin of anyone they subsequently encounter.

Gorgon flesh tastes vaguely like beef, but with a gritty, earthy texture and aftertaste that most meat connoisseurs find off-putting. Creatures with a close association to earth and stone are more likely to find the flavor appetizing; stone giants in particular consider gorgon steaks to be delicacies. Some cultures, notably dwarven cultures, consider the preparation of gorgon for meals as both a physical and a culinary challenge. Chefs who work with gorgon flesh can find renown for their skill in creating palatable dishes from such naturally unpalatable meat.
Gorgon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

OC4UGWpbAZyLbFb6.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
OC4UGWpbAZyLbFb6.description:
The gorgon breathes a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of green gas. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save.

The gorgon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature's body hardens and stiffens, causing it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns.

大失败 The creature becomes petrified permanently.

Stt8YZwfNCRzNgkQ.name: Powerful Charge
Stt8YZwfNCRzNgkQ.description: The gorgon Strides twice, then makes a horn Strike. If it moved at least 20 feet from its starting position, the Strike's damage is increased to 3d12+12.

Gosreg.name: Gosreg
Gosreg.publicNotes:
Gosregs are agents of the Dominion of the Black that insinuate themselves into humanoid societies to foster the goals of their sinister alien masters. They act as spies and special forces that can mingle with humanoid society while enacting plans for the rest of the Dominion in secret.

In their natural forms, gosregs dart about in a jerky gallop due to their stumpy legs and gangly arms. They take on the appearances of humanoids to infiltrate societies, and they drop their disguises only when they feel they are ultimately compromised and must resort to physical violence to protect their agendas. Their brain-like heads and bestial legs suggest a potential link with a similar Dominion of the Black agent: the dreaded intellect devourer.
Gosreg.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

Jqh53awrV2X4sb81.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

PYpTwTM9SFGR0Vc5.name: 梦魇术 Nightmare
PYpTwTM9SFGR0Vc5.description:
你向目标送去一段恼人的噩梦。在目标下一次入睡时，它必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果你知道目标的名字但是从未遇见过它，目标在意志豁免上获得+4环境加值。

大成功 目标不承受任何负面效果，并暂时免疫1星期。

成功 目标经历了噩梦，但不会承受除了糟糕回忆以外的负面效果。

失败 目标经历噩梦，并且在醒来时 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。

大失败 目标经历噩梦，醒来时疲乏，并且获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} 直到不再疲乏。

WKWzTrWyiPJNihmZ.name: 思维感知 Thoughtsense
WKWzTrWyiPJNihmZ.description: The gosreg senses a creature's mental essence as a precise sense with the listed range; it cannot sense mindless creatures with thoughtsense.

qoqJdxMXA4DPeMal.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

UIgdlwmkkFjjq6Kl.name: Unsettled Aura
UIgdlwmkkFjjq6Kl.description:
30 feet.

Gosregs project a field of discordant energy that unsettles the minds of thinking creatures. Any non-mindless creature within 30 feet of a gosreg takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves.

Fp4obYTKAlnrpeFi.name: Change Shape
Fp4obYTKAlnrpeFi.description:
The gosreg takes on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage modifiers with its Strikes, but it might change the damage type its Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

pTowxMM6c9JCvVGF.name: Mind Bolt
pTowxMM6c9JCvVGF.description: A gosreg concentrates its field of discordant mental energy and projects it into the mind of an enemy within 60 feet. The target takes [[/r {6d6}[mental]]]{6d6心灵伤害} (@Check[type:will|dc:30|basic:true] save). On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Granite Glyptodont.name: Granite Glyptodont
Granite Glyptodont.publicNotes: This squat and stony creature looks like an armadillo with a large raised back and a flail-like tail. The granite glyptodont has no true need to feed, as with all elementals, yet it does seem to linger after transforming the flesh of those it calcifies, as if the mere proximity of flesh fossilizing into stone pleases it somehow.
Granite Glyptodont.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)90尺

2VxyCqJZcASXlsyq.name: Calcification
2VxyCqJZcASXlsyq.description:
A blow from a granite glyptodont's tail hardens the flesh of the creature struck. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] saving throw or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} on a critical failure). Further failed saves against calcification increase the value of the slowed condition. Once a creature's actions are reduced to 0 by calcification, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified}. If the creature isn't petrified, the slowed conditions end once 1 minute passes without the creature failing a save against calcification.

Every 24 hours after it was petrified, the creature can attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save to recover. On a success, it becomes flesh again, but is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for the next 24 hours. On a critical success, the creature recovers and isn't slowed. On a failure, the creature remains petrified, but can try again in 24 hours. On a critical failure, the petrification is permanent, and the creature can't attempt any more saves.

hwZzmzZjVpUb64cH.name: Earth Glide
hwZzmzZjVpUb64cH.description: A granite glyptodont can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow} through earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, it moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

Gray Ooze.name: Gray Ooze
Gray Ooze.publicNotes: These dangerous oozes are the bane of any who travel through swamps, marshes, or damp caves. Easily masquerading as pools of clear water or patches of wet stone, gray oozes lie in wait for unwary victims to reach down for a drink or step into what appears to be a puddle, then lash out with whiplike pseudopods to ensnare and consume their hapless prey.

vApfqAgqE1h1XDQe.name: Motion Sense
vApfqAgqE1h1XDQe.description: A gray ooze can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

xgpvgBd8BjAbDY4N.name: Puddled Ambush
xgpvgBd8BjAbDY4N.description:
触发 A creature enters a space occupied by a gray ooze

需求 Initiative has not yet been rolled

效果 The gray ooze automatically notices the creature, then makes a pseudopod Strike against one creature adjacent to itself before rolling initiative.

2wgeHmf6T4ScZpAk.name: Gray Ooze Acid
2wgeHmf6T4ScZpAk.description: A gray ooze's acid damages only metal and organic materials, not stone.

Green Dracolisk.name: Green Dracolisk
Green Dracolisk.publicNotes: Dracolisks are rare magical crossbreeds of chromatic dragons and basilisks. None now know how they first came to be, but they have proven viable and can breed with one another as well as with basilisks. While a dracolisk appears much like a young true dragon of its parent type, its eight legs are an immediate indication that it is something more. Its coloration varies, depending on the nature of its draconic ancestry, though it's lighter on its underside and darker near its wing tips. A typical dracolisk is 15 feet long and weighs 3,000 pounds.
Green Dracolisk.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

5RsDoTAVa9W8gKnx.name: Draconic Resistance
5RsDoTAVa9W8gKnx.description: A dracolisk has resistance 10 to the type of damage it produces with its breath weapon.

dZoSOjCNPr4EIzGG.name: Petrifying Glance
dZoSOjCNPr4EIzGG.description:
触发 A creature within 30 feet that the dracolisk can see starts its turn

效果 The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save. If it fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 minute as its body stiffens.

KQAihkBcgo2L9lGv.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
KQAihkBcgo2L9lGv.description:
The dracolisk breathes a gout of energy based on its draconic heritage, as noted below. This breath weapon deals [[/r {6d10}[poison]]]{6d10毒素伤害}, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true] save.

The dracolisk can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Black @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of poison

BQDQsCBmg1gB3VSr.name: Petrifying Gaze
BQDQsCBmg1gB3VSr.description:
The dracolisk stares at a creature it can see within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save. If it fails and has not already been slowed by Petrifying Glance or this ability, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}. If the creature already was slowed by this ability or Petrifying Glance, a failed save causes the creature to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified} permanently.

A creature petrified in this manner can be instantly restored to flesh by being coated (not just splashed) with fresh dracolisk or basilisk blood no more than 1 hour old. A single dracolisk contains enough blood to coat [[/r 1d4+2 #Medium creatures]] Medium creatures in this manner.

OUEVYrICDhOs5NML.name: Savage Jaws
OUEVYrICDhOs5NML.description: The dracolisk makes a single Strike with its jaws. If the attack hits, it deals [[/r {4d12+16}[piercing]]]{4d12+16穿刺伤害} (versatile S). This counts as two attacks for its multiple attack penalty.

Grendel.name: Grendel
Grendel.publicNotes:
This reaver of the cold marsh is not just a monster; he is a force of nature. Where there is peace and prosperity in the world, Grendel strikes, eager to prove that tranquility is transitory and death is the only constant. He stalks the edge of his fens, seeking settlements where joy holds sway. He strikes under cover of night, primarily targeting celebrations or festivals. The more happiness or joy he can extinguish, the better.

Although Grendel is a unique creature, killing him won't save the world from his ravages for long. Once Grendel's mother instinctively feels the pain of her violent son's death, she soon births a replacement. The new Grendel seems to avoid the sites his elder brothers terrorized, as if he instinctively knows that such a place hosts heroes powerful enough to defeat him.

u7R9PDTQDTEJeQAX.name: Keen Hearing
u7R9PDTQDTEJeQAX.description: Grendel's hearing is a precise sense to a range of 120 feet.

g9enKXrvCUkwck8W.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
g9enKXrvCUkwck8W.description:
Grendel gains an extra reaction at the start of each of his turns that he can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity with his claw. He can't use more than one Attack of Opportunity triggered by the same action.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

5djM8sO4U2PY23bG.name: Unstoppable
5djM8sO4U2PY23bG.description:
触发 Grendel would take @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害} or gain one of the following conditions: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}

效果 The persistent damage or condition from the triggering effect doesn't affect Grendel.

PSqd8jopT7V35lJt.name: Hands of the Murderer
PSqd8jopT7V35lJt.description: Grendel's fist Strikes deal 18 bludgeoning damage on a failure (but no damage on a critical failure).

P5tslJuQziddpFpV.name: Tooth Grind
P5tslJuQziddpFpV.description:
需求 Grendel is grabbing a creature

效果 Grendel makes a bludgeoning jaws Strike against the creature he's grabbing. On a hit, the creature also takes [[/r 2d6]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续伤害} and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}, or increases its wounded value by 1 if already wounded. On a critical hit, the creature instead becomes wounded 2, or increases its wounded value by 2 if already wounded. If a creature dies from Tooth Grind, Grendel regains 40 HP; this is a healing effect.

Grimstalker.name: Grimstalker
Grimstalker.publicNotes:
These violently murderous fey have one purpose: to stealthily hunt down and slay humanoids brazen enough to dare set foot in the wilderness. Though they prefer to hunt from the shadows, grimstalkers do not fear taking their grisly work to the very edges of civilization. This boldness serves as a reminder that nature can be cruel, capricious, and owes no debt to humanity. Grimstalkers are happy to perform nature's dirty work and particularly enjoy targeting loggers, hunters, and explorers, regardless of whether they respect the natural setting they work or travel within.

Grimstalkers are gaunt and hairless, and their mottled, green and brown flesh gives them the appearance of moss-draped bark. When damaged, they bleed a thick, sap-like blood. They mark their territories by lopping off the heads of their victims and stringing them up in the surrounding trees, a practice that often lures dangerous scavengers into their lands. Carnivorous and thorny plants are often found in wilds where grimstalkers dwell, filling roles that pets might in human society, though grimstalkers tend to treat these "pets" poorly at best.

There are few accounts of grimstalkers working with other fey-for the most part, grimstalkers see their kin from the First World as cowards or weaklings, or perhaps both. Even notoriously violent fey such as redcaps shy from them, as grimstalkers consider their own kind the only company worth keeping.

Grimstalkers hunt in small bands, using stealth to approach their targets. They surround enemies first, then work to unnerve them by knocking on trees or howling out threats in Aklo to distract and panic their quarry. Of course, a band of grimstalkers won't stay together for long, quickly succumbing to bickering and infighting. These violent arguments are common pastimes among grimstalkers, often ending with each grimstalker going its own way. Not even the presence of more powerful fey or commanding creatures can keep grimstalkers from their predisposed bickering. Some scholars theorize that this quality speaks to an ancient curse that once afflicted fey who were judged too cantankerous, but in truth, it's just part of what makes a grimstalker what it is: ill-tempered, confrontational, and bitter.

T7rl8xICznuEuEmm.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

bKkmonWLmkkxYnh2.name: Camouflage
bKkmonWLmkkxYnh2.description: A grimstalker can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} in natural environments, even if it doesn't have cover.

vKcQxEXLQx45iyeq.name: Grimstalker Sap
vKcQxEXLQx45iyeq.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮),

阶段3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

brun3T7XF65PG2xu.name: Woodland Stride
brun3T7XF65PG2xu.description: A grimstalker can always find a path, almost as if foliage parts before it. A grimstalker ignores difficult terrain caused by plants, such as bushes, vines, and undergrowth. Even plants manipulated by magic don't impede its progress.

Grindylow.name: Grindylow
Grindylow.publicNotes:
The top half of a grindylow looks vaguely like that of a goblin, but from the waist down, their bodies split into a tangle of suckered, wriggling tentacles. They dwell mostly in shallow waters both fresh and briny, including lakes, rivers, coastal regions, and near coral reefs. Grindylows generally organize into schools ranging from a few individuals to a few hundred. Smaller schools can sometimes be brought under the leadership of a powerful aquatic creature, though such alliances last only until the school faces a major setback, at which point the surviving grindylows scatter and form smaller schools of their own.

Grindylows aren't territorial, but they are pragmatic; while they rarely build permanent structures, they will adopt a good hunting ground for generations until driven away by predators. They often lair in mobile shelters, such as a sargasso of seaweed or the hull of an abandoned ship. They are skilled scavengers and hunters that eat anything they can sink their teeth into.

Grindylows respect the power of bigger sea predators but have a special hatred for squids (or anything they believe looks like a squid). Sailors plying grindylow-infested waters often paint the images of squids on the bottoms of their hulls in hopes of warding the little terrors off. While this can keep smaller schools at bay, it can also backfire, potentially inciting larger groups to gather for a coordinated attack; this becomes especially more likely if the ship's route becomes predictable. This hatred of squids does not extend to other tentacled creatures; grindylows consider octopuses to be the epitome of grace and power.

nplfqbEUtcOBlV0b.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
nplfqbEUtcOBlV0b.description:
A grindylow gains 1 extra reaction at the start of each of its turns that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity with a tentacle. It can't use more than one Attack of Opportunity triggered by the same choice.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

T7L2FMHmpDoURw0s.name: Clinging Suckers
T7L2FMHmpDoURw0s.description: When a grindylow @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grabs} a creature larger than itself, it attaches to that creature. The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} creature is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, but if it moves, the grindylow moves with it. If the creature is Medium or smaller, it takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds while the grindylow is attached. The grindylow is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} while it is attached to a creature.

ftJSskhqjZaMBNyZ.name: Jet
ftJSskhqjZaMBNyZ.description: The grindylow moves up to 60 feet in a straight line through the water without triggering reactions.

Grippli Scout.name: Grippli Scout
Grippli Scout.publicNotes:
Gripplis make their homes in the treetops of tropical jungles and forests. These frog-like humanoids are uniquely adapted to their environment, with oversized eyes that give them keen vision in both light and dark and large toes that allow them to easily scale trees. Gripplis vary widely in physical appearance, with their physiologies influenced by their surrounding environment. Those who live in verdant forests, for example, typically have bright green skin and red eyes. In contrast, gripplis who live in regions of rot and decay have mottled-brown coloration, and those who dwell near lakes or streams may bear bright blue and orange stripes. Typical gripplis stand just over 2 feet tall and weigh approximately 30 pounds.

Whatever region they come from, gripplis tend to be peaceful hunter-gatherers. Due to their modest understanding of agriculture, gripplis don't maintain typical farms like other humanoids do. Rather, they cultivate mushroom patches and gather a wide array of fruits from the surrounding wilderness. While most gripplis hunt insects, some societies also capture and breed them, nurturing herds of giant dragonflies or beetles that they eventually slaughter for food. Particularly enterprising gripplis might even seek out and tame larger flying insects to use as mounts during their hunts. The rearing of such massive insects is no easy feat, however, so gripplis who manage to do so are often heralded as local heroes.

Gripplis usually construct their villages in particularly dense copses, stringing thin rope bridges between wide wooden platforms built around each trunk. They make use of broad leaves and thick branches to further obscure their villages, making them especially difficult to spot from the forest floor, and riddle the surrounding forest with labyrinthine trails that only they can navigate.

Grippli scouts typically keep watch on the outskirts of grippli settlements. More potent gripplis inhabit the settlements, be they religious leaders, powerful druids, or agile warriors that, due to their small size, focus more on finesse weapons and ranged attacks than on melee tactics.

IwPCTJvgvDQC90Yj.name: Hurl Net
IwPCTJvgvDQC90Yj.description:
需求 The grippli is wielding a net in two hands

效果 The grippli makes a ranged Strike (with a +9 modifier) against a Medium or smaller creature within 20 feet. On a hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. On a critical hit, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} instead. The DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} the net is 16. A creature adjacent to the target can Interact with the net to remove it.

kziZybKPrc34cUoX.name: Jungle Stride
kziZybKPrc34cUoX.description: Gripplis ignore difficult terrain in forests and jungles.

Grodair.name: Grodair
Grodair.publicNotes:
Grodairs are bizarre fishlike creature native to the First World. Their supernatural physiology includes a strange organ with an extradimensional space capable of storing thousands of gallons of water. This grants grodairs the ability to create a suitable environment for themselves anywhere by releasing the water, quickly transforming any surrounding land into a shallow bog. When grodairs wish to leave for a new location, they simply suck up all the water back up. When necessary, grodairs can also travel on land by walking upon the tangle of long, fleshy tentacles that dangle from their bellies.

Grodairs have two sets of eyes that function independently. While this makes the creatures difficult to surprise, it also makes them easy to distract. During conversations, they have a tendency to lose focus quickly and have difficulty remembering things. Still, they are avid conversationalists and enjoy hearing tales about the world. While this quality makes grodairs quite likable, they aren't reliable. They have difficulty following plans or schedules, and they can keep a secret only if they happen to forget it first. For these reasons, grodairs don't always make the best allies.

Grodairs are voracious and curious omnivores who love trying new foods-in fact, the pursuit of new and interesting food is the most common reason that they venture out of First World. They can also capture and store within their throats any small animals and plants easily suspended in water, and eject them for consumption at a later time.

JSpF7t2LpyYp70eW.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

P48WRIeVuuAB8JWK.name: Death Flood
P48WRIeVuuAB8JWK.description: When a grodair dies, its body explodes in a blast of pressurized water that deals [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6钝击伤害} to creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true] save). A creature that fails its save is pushed 5 feet (or 10 feet on a critical failure).

8J1VrbhC0fQxs0Xu.name: Muddy Field
8J1VrbhC0fQxs0Xu.description: The grodair transforms all soil, sand, or similar sediment in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] into mud for 1 round. This mud is difficult terrain for creatures other than grodairs.

HAh9hAsU8XCNWPOU.name: Organ of Endless Water
HAh9hAsU8XCNWPOU.description: The grodair causes water to pour from a magical sac on its spine, either a stream of water at a rate of 1 gallon per round, or a fountain in a 5-foot-long stream at a rate of 5 gallons per round. It can stop the flow of water as a single action.

Gylou.name: Gylou
Gylou.publicNotes: Though gylous are deeply entrenched in the expansive and complex machinations of Hell, they are highly skilled agents capable of nuanced diplomacy, masterful deception, physical finesse, and nearly any other tasks they set their minds to. This versatility has led to gylous becoming widespread throughout all layers of Hell, enabling them to filter key information to their masters regarding other devils' plots and schemes. Their allegiance is no secret, but their skills are so great that powerful devils employ one or more gylous regardless. While most gylous have a feminine form (combined with their role, this is the source of their common moniker of "handmaiden"), some have other gender presentations, and nearly all gylous take on carefully cultivated illusions to best suit the roles they fill. More often than not, gylous arise when lesser devils who have demonstrated exceptional utility and invaluable skills are uplifted into a new form, though on rare occasions they are shaped from the souls of evil mortals who showed unparalleled savvy within bureaucratic enterprises.
Gylou.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Gylou.senses: 高等黑暗视觉, true seeing

OAaAcan3IQyoJJ4X.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

pZNjrGx8hawqDqpa.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
pZNjrGx8hawqDqpa.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

bkk440fw7A5zFFVh.name: 幻象造物(随意施法) Illusory Object (At will)
bkk440fw7A5zFFVh.description:
你创造一个固定物体的视觉幻象。该幻象必须能完全处于法术区域中。该物体会自然活动，但是不会发出声音或者产生气味。举例而言，幻象瀑布中会出现水并流下，但是它会是安静的。

当生物触摸幻像，或者使用搜索（Seek）动作来检查它时，该生物可以尝试不相信你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 你的幻象也会发出合适的声音，产生正常气味，并且摸起来也很正常。该法术获得听觉特征。该持续时间增加到1小时。

升阶 (5环级) 如2环级，但是持续时间为无限。

PvAhmTacSiuheD52.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
PvAhmTacSiuheD52.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

ZXR3Dqh3vpkb4MJB.name: 注目术(随意施法) Enthrall (At will)
ZXR3Dqh3vpkb4MJB.description:
你的言语令目标迷魂。你在施法和持续时间中持续演说或者歌唱。注意到你的演说或者歌唱的目标可能会失去注意力；每个目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果目标的信仰，族裔，政治观念对立，或者其他它不远认同你的说法的情况，GM可能赋予一个环境加值（最大为+4）。

在你维持法术时，每个进入射程的生物必须尝试一次豁免。如果你在演说，注目术获得语言特征。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且注意到你尝试使用魔法。

成功 目标不必注意，但是也没发现你在使用魔法（他也许发现其他人被注目术影响）。

失败 目标对你 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}。当它发现其不认同的行为或者说法时，它可以尝试另一次意志豁免。如果它成功，他不再迷魂，并且暂时免疫1小时。如果目标成为敌对行为的目标，或者其他生物对其尝试交涉或者威吓，迷魂会立即结束。

大失败 如同失败，但是目标不会在其不认同你时尝试豁免以结束迷魂。

Gsx5q76S7ZPL3iXd.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

ESiP5kSLjg2exhAh.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

oqYW7IkKIsygycAY.name: Reflexive Grab
oqYW7IkKIsygycAY.description:
触发 A creature leaves a square within the gylou's reach using a move action or attempts a melee Strike against the gylou

效果 The gylou lashes out with a tentacle, attempting to Grapple the triggering creature. If the triggering Strike was with a melee weapon, the attacking creature can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.wQYmDStjdjn0I26t]{Release} the weapon to cause the gylou to automatically fail the Athletics check.

nLocPM8hKYMstnGr.name: Change Shape
nLocPM8hKYMstnGr.description:
The gylou adopts the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change their Speed or the attack and damage modifiers of their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning).

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

LZTLNHZnYh3Eg4aU.name: Indispensable Savvy
LZTLNHZnYh3Eg4aU.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 The gylou attempts a skill check but hasn't rolled yet

效果 The gylou demonstrates a preternatural ability for the task at hand. They use their Deception modifier for the triggering check and for all skill checks using the same skill thereafter until the next time the gylou uses this ability or until 24 hours have passed, whichever happens first.

RTUQPDiCd9wKvFow.name: Tentacle Encage
RTUQPDiCd9wKvFow.description:
需求 The gylou has a Medium or smaller creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

效果 The gylou transfers the grabbed creature into their lower body's net of encaging tentacles, freeing their limbs and tentacles to make Strikes. This has the same effects as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.uJSseLa57HZYSMUu]{Swallow Whole} (Medium, [[/r {2d12+12}[bludgeoning]]]{2d12+12钝击伤害}, Rupture 30), except the encaged creature is not at risk of suffocation, and the gylou can bring the encaged creature with them when they cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door}. A gylou can have only one creature encaged at a time.

Hadrosaurid.name: Hadrosaurid
Hadrosaurid.publicNotes:
Hadrosaurids are a broad grouping of herbivorous dinosaurs that share characteristic flat snouts filled with rows of grinding teeth well suited for feeding on vegetation. Also known as "duck-billed dinosaurs" due to the unusual shape of their jaws, hadrosaurids are lumbering creatures that can rival an elephant for size, although they tend to be much less aggressive and are prone to flight when confronted with danger rather than stubbornly standing their ground. Many species of hadrosaurids have uniquely shaped crests on their heads that give each species its own unusual profile, making them easily recognizable even to an amateur dinosaur watcher.

Giants and other oversized creatures have been known to domesticate hadrosaurids to serve as livestock. Despite their ability to sprint quickly, they don't make particularly viable mounts due to their timid natures, but in a large group, a panicked gathering of hadrosaurids can wreak great damage with their trampling.

A hadrosaurid can walk for short distances on its hind legs but prefers to graze and travel on all fours. The typical hadrosaurid is 20 to 30 feet long and can weigh up to 10,000 pounds.
Hadrosaurid.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

qfIg2ulL65DhV6X2.name: Sprint
qfIg2ulL65DhV6X2.description:
频率 once per minute

效果 The hadrosaurid Strides twice. It has a +20-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

Hamatula.name: Hamatula
Hamatula.publicNotes: Hamatulas are forged in Erebus to protect infernal vaults from those foolish enough to try to rob the archdevil Mammon. In case the vicious spines protruding from their bodies and ability to teleport weren't deadly enough, they are also clever wielders of warding glyphs. They are effective conjured guardians, though they resent being pulled away from their duties in Hell. Unlike most fiends, hamatulas are formed from several souls that lack any features distinctive enough to merit another role.
Hamatula.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

Nbea4sMv3ZuYKikA.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

g0gdzzzvux4ApSD5.name: 守卫刻文(随意施法) Glyph of Warding (At will)
g0gdzzzvux4ApSD5.description:
你通过将敌对法术记入一个符号，制造了一个陷阱。当施放该法术时，你也施放一个更低环级的法术并存入刻文中。该储存的法术施放必须花费3个或者更少的动作，具有敌对效果，并且以一个生物为目标或者具有一个区域。你可以为刻文设定一个密语，一个触发器，或者均设定。任何生物移动，开启，或者接触目标容器，或者进入了目标区域时，没有说出密语或者激活刻文的触发条件，均会施放内存的伤害法术。

当一个法术被存于刻文内后，刻文获得该法术的所有特征。如果存储的法术以一个或者更多生物为目标，它以引发刻文的生物为目标。如果该法术具有区域，该区域以引发刻文的生物为中心。守卫刻文的持续时间在刻文被触发时结束。该刻文视为魔法陷阱，使用你的法术DC作为发现它所需的察觉检定DC以及解除它所需的盗窃（Thievery）检定DC；这两种检定均要求进行尝试的生物为受训才可能成功。

你可以解消守卫刻文。你同时可以生效的守卫刻文数量等于你的施法属性调整值。

y8TePj5x2rTRtyMK.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
y8TePj5x2rTRtyMK.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

t8ToZMzymYUk47az.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

WJHihy42QBNSUonW.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

nQuUyJS1AvKyFrA0.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
nQuUyJS1AvKyFrA0.description:
Barb only. A hamatula gains an extra reaction at the start of each of its turns that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity. It can't use more than one Attack of Opportunity triggered by the same action. In addition to the normal trigger, a hamatula can make an Attack of Opportunity against a creature that touches it or an adjacent creature that attempts a melee Strike against it.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

BVXX982lJiCTVido.name: Bloodletting
BVXX982lJiCTVido.description: On a critical hit, the hamatula's barbs deal @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed3d6.success].

UuUlz5A5IwoGhe6n.name: Frightful Strike
UuUlz5A5IwoGhe6n.description:
触发 The hamatula hits a creature with a barb Strike

效果 The creature struck must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3} on a critical failure). Regardless of the result of its saving throw, the creature is then temporarily immune to Frightful Strike for 24 hours.

vMYnNlSJnYJepYe8.name: Impaling Barb
vMYnNlSJnYJepYe8.description: The hamatula makes a barb Strike, then Strides up to half its Speed without triggering reactions. If the Strike hits, the hamatula impales the target with one of its barbs and snaps the barb free as it moves away from the target. This deals an additional [[/r {2d8}[piercing]]]{2d8穿刺伤害} to the target and pins it to an adjacent surface, rendering it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} (Escape DC 29).

QK7BnQXUv5A7jm84.name: Warden of Erebus
QK7BnQXUv5A7jm84.description: A hamatula's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.o0l57UfBm9ScEUMW]{Glyph of Warding} innate spell can contain any common spell from the Core Rulebook that meets the criteria in glyph of warding; the hamatula doesn't need to provide the spell.

Hellcat.name: Hellcat
Hellcat.publicNotes:
Hellcats are devious predators native to the fiery pits of Hell. While the fiendish creatures appears as skeletal smilodons, their bones smoking with heat and dripping with boiling blood, they are not undead. They are living hellspawn with transparent flesh that reveals their burning skeletons. A typical hellcat is 9 feet long and weighs 1,000 pounds.

Left to their own devices, hellcats spend their time hunting-that is, seeking and stalking prey just for the thrill of the chase. As fiendish creatures, they do not require mortal sustenance, but they do devour their prey for the sheer pleasure of inflicting pain. They are also far more intelligent than most assume, and they resent being treated as unintelligent animals; those who treat a hellcat as a one may find themself made into a trophy for its pack, as a hellcat goes to great lengths to coordinate elaborate revenge upon those who fail to show proper respect.

Though they can't speak, hellcats know Infernal and can communicate by telepathy with any creature capable of speech. They rarely say much except to make whispered threats and to acknowledge the orders of their diabolic masters.

Hellcats are quick to retreat if they are clearly outmatched or up against foes they're unable to reach, but they never forget prey that escapes them. They often track potential victims and recruit allies, including other hellcats, to make coordinated attacks or ambushes against their foes.
Hellcat.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Hellcat.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

oC5vZAEFIISSmofG.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

ubj0ypG0da0nRirb.name: Fade into the Light
ubj0ypG0da0nRirb.description:
触发 The hellcat begins its turn in bright light

效果 The hellcat becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} until its no longer in bright light. If the hellcat uses a hostile action, the invisibility ends after that hostile action is completed.

eKrrD4BYO7xl9vPo.name: Fearful Attack
eKrrD4BYO7xl9vPo.description: The hellcat deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} creatures.

8Mkj5lFXbki11UgV.name: Infernal Mindlink
8Mkj5lFXbki11UgV.description:
The hellcat telepathically link its senses to all other hellcats within 100 feet for 10 minutes. It loses this contact with any hellcat that moves out of a 100-foot radius.

While linked to at least one ally, the hellcat can't be flanked and gains a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws.

mgA0es28Vb0TAr40.name: Menacing Growl
mgA0es28Vb0TAr40.description:
The hellcat produces a low growl to disorient and frighten foes. The hellcat can cause this vocalization to originate from somewhere else within 30 feet. Non-fiends in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

The hellcat can't issue another Menacing Growl for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 4}.

HT78d5cKcguY6IcL.name: Pounce
HT78d5cKcguY6IcL.description: The hellcat Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the hellcat began this action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after the ability's Strike.

Hezrou.name: Hezrou
Hezrou.publicNotes: Hezrous dwell in the vast and endless Abyssal swamps, mires, and waterways and are equally at home on land and in the water. A hezrou's presence has an obvious effect on nearby flora and water, causing plant life to twist and knot and infusing water with a foul odor and brackish taste-signs much easier to spot on the Material Plane than in the Abyss. Long exposure to this corruption can cause vile transformations and hideous mutations, and entire miserable communities of corrupted creatures sometimes rise in swamplands where a hezrou dwells. Hezrous themselves prefer simple pleasures, and they often waste their considerable intellect in the pursuit of comfortable places to slumber, squealing meals to eat, or objects of beauty to deface. They do not seek out cults to fawn over them but will not turn away those who seek to worship on their own. Hezrous form from the souls of those who abused and polluted their environs or neighbors, either through the introduction of toxins to the region or the insidious spread of drugs and poisons through a society.
Hezrou.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

wyti8UM7xKPOJOv6.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

DbvMliTitDLEnD8H.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
DbvMliTitDLEnD8H.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

5FQFNi5wNLjJfVVi.name: 神圣狂怒(随意施法) Divine Wrath (At will)
5FQFNi5wNLjJfVVi.description:
你引导你的神祇的怒火，攻击对立阵营的敌人。选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。你造成你所选阵营类型的4d10伤害；每个区域中的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。对应你所选阵营的生物不受影响。既不对应也不对立的生物将其豁免骰结果视为更好一级。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

大失败 该生物承受全部伤害，并且 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}; 当其恶心时，也会 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10。

ghbtjQahExs1AvpE.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

fZOolgYWKm1a27op.name: Purity Vulnerability
fZOolgYWKm1a27op.description: A hezrou revels in the foulness it exudes and becomes distraught when contaminations are purified. The first time in a round when a contamination is purified (such as via purify food and drink) or a toxin is neutralized (such as via neutralize poison) within 30 feet of a hezrou, the demon takes [[/r {6d6}[mental]]]{6d6心灵伤害}.

gEADE2ZlQ0vRnps7.name: Stench
gEADE2ZlQ0vRnps7.description:
30 feet.

A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for as long as itʼs sickened on a critical failure).

While within the aura, affected creatures take a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

nHTCIVLK6QSJqHd3.name: Poisonous Pustules
nHTCIVLK6QSJqHd3.description:
需求 The hezrou is grappling a creature

效果 Toxic fluids spurt from burst boils and weeping wens on the hezrou's body. A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} by the hezrou takes [[/r {2d12+6}[poison]]]{2d12+6毒素伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:30|basic:true] save).

Hippocampus.name: Hippocampus
Hippocampus.publicNotes: Hippocampi serve as steeds for aquatic humanoids or roam wild in the sea.
Hippocampus.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

LYeMRFsmLZRCk3uE.name: Sudden Retreat
LYeMRFsmLZRCk3uE.description: The hippocampus makes a tail Strike, then Swims with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its swim Speed. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.

Hippogriff.name: Hippogriff
Hippogriff.publicNotes:
With the proud bearing of a great raptor and the magnificence of a powerful horse, hippogriffs are thought to be an accidental fusion of creatures or perhaps the creation of a flesh-warping wizard with a keen aesthetic sense. Regardless of their original source, these animals are now a common sight in the skies above their favored plains or hill country.

Hippogriffs bear the wings, forelegs, and head of a bird of prey, with feather coloration similar to that of a hawk or eagle, though some breeders have managed to produce specimens with stark-white or coal-black feathers. Their torso, hindquarters, and tail resemble those of a horse and usually are colored bay, chestnut, or gray, with some coats bearing black, pinto, or even palomino coloration.

Hippogriffs are similar in size to large horses. Much like their equine cousins, hippogriffs often have to keep wary eyes on the skies above them, as both are preferred meals for hungry griffons and wyverns. Only hippogriffs' superior speed helps protect them from these predators.

Hippogriffs are exceptionally territorial and fiercely protect the lands under their domain. They typically favor sweeping grasslands, rolling hills, and prairies. Exceptionally hardy hippogriffs make their homes nestled into niches on canyon walls, from which they comb the rocky deserts for coyotes, deer, and the occasional humanoid. Hippogriffs prefer mammalian prey, but they graze after every meal to aid in digestion.

Since hippogriff hunting habits can be dangerous to both ranchers and their livestock, such communities often set bounties on hippogriffs. As a result, preserved hippogriffs frequently decorate frontier taverns and remote outposts alongside the taxidermic remains of deer, elk, and bears.

However, other communities train hippogriffs from hatching to be ridden by elite soldiers in combat- the most notable among these groups in the Inner Sea region is the Sable Company Mercenaries in the city-state of Korvosa. Attempts are sometimes made to train adult hippogriffs in the same manner, but this often proves far more difficult. Hippogriff riders must use special saddles and combat techniques that allow them to act in concert with their mount, fighting effectively while avoiding interfering with the movement of their companion's wings.
Hippogriff.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

NWD8KA0NNOrEyrvq.name: Flying Strafe
NWD8KA0NNOrEyrvq.description: The hippogriff Flies up to its fly speed and makes two talon Strikes at any point during that movement. Each Strike must target a different creature. The attacks take the normal multiple attack penalty.

Hippopotamus.name: Hippopotamus
Hippopotamus.publicNotes: Typical adult hippos move quickly on land and attack stealthily in the water. Though herbivorous, hippos are notoriously aggressive and territorial.
Hippopotamus.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

m9kHAZ6q8lhsA9dC.name: Deep Breath
m9kHAZ6q8lhsA9dC.description: The hippopotamus can hold its breath for 5 minutes.

oNpExBZGMP135Gh8.name: 倾覆 Capsize
oNpExBZGMP135Gh8.description: The hippopotamus tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. The hippopotamus must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 25 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the hippo) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

Hodag.name: Hodag
Hodag.publicNotes:
Because they are often described only in drunken retellings of loggers' or miners' tales, hodags are considered by many to exist only in the local folklore of remote areas. However, some individuals have actually encountered these dangerous beasts firsthand, and even fewer have lived to tell their tales.

Hodags are reptilian creatures the size of bulls. These vicious predators' long claws can tear creatures apart in seconds. Their backs sport dozens of long spines that run from their snouts all the way down the length of their powerful tails. Their wide mouths are full of sharp and twisted rows of teeth not unlike those of a shark. The hodags' rough, scaly hides carry hues of green and brown, allowing them to blend into their forest surroundings where they ambush prey. Only their glowing red eyes reveal their presence, though hodags have learned to use this to their advantage by drawing attention to their eyes in one area, then closing their eyes and stealthily moving to another area to cause their prey to misconstrue their location.

In the wintertime, when snow and ice blankets a region, hodags grow a foul-smelling coat of greasy, dark-brown fur that sprouts in tufts from between their scales. A typical hodag measures over 10 feet long from snout to tail and weighs upward of 700 pounds.
Hodag.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

VzMnFSYbgzk4CXes.name: Trackless
VzMnFSYbgzk4CXes.description: A hodag sweeps the ground behind it with its tail as it moves, obscuring its tracks. The DCs of checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a hodag are increased by 10.

Od1YX31hXRHCzHS3.name: Rip and Tear
Od1YX31hXRHCzHS3.description: The hodag makes two claw Strikes and one jaws Strike in any order.

x3sRV0Fub8ixWfBV.name: Toss
x3sRV0Fub8ixWfBV.description:
The hodag Strides, then makes a Strike against a target in reach. If it moves at least 20 feet and succeeds at its Strike, the hodag deals damage normally and then attempts an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC to toss the enemy into the air.

On a success, the tossed creature is thrown 10 feet in a straight line in the direction of the hodag's choice and then lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}. If the creature is knocked into a solid object, it takes [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6钝击伤害} as well before landing prone. The hodag can instead toss a creature straight up in the air. The creature lands in the same square where it started, takes [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6钝击伤害}, and lands prone.

Hound Archon.name: Hound Archon
Hound Archon.publicNotes: Among the rank-and-file soldiers of Heaven's armies, few individuals are more dependable and truer to the cause than the noble hound archons, embodiments of the virtue of diligence. Unlike horned archons, who perform at a similar level along Heaven's grand hierarchy, hound archons do not scout ahead for evil or perform reconnaissance missions in hostile territory. A hound archon's role is as a soldier in the heart of battle or, occasionally, as a sentinel tasked with protecting a particular strategic location or holy site.
Hound Archon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

VTh3x19pApL0tjtU.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

HsTNpm0qjSAwEMqC.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
HsTNpm0qjSAwEMqC.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

QItaAvzvKUUHn205.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

2SKe9OcSUJ5AXTPf.name: Archon's Door
2SKe9OcSUJ5AXTPf.description: Once per day, if an archon sees another creature cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door}, the archon can use dimension door (heightened to 5th level) within 1 round to attempt to follow that creature to the maximum distance of the archon's dimension door. If the archon's dimension door has enough distance, the archon appears the same distance and direction from the creature as before either creature used dimension door.

lWwRydUGrcy5WmZf.name: Change Shape
lWwRydUGrcy5WmZf.description:
A hound archon can take the appearance of any canid animal of Small to Large size. This doesn't change their Speed or the attack and damage bonuses for their Strikes, but if the canid's bite attack has the Knockdown ability, then the hound archon's bite attack gains that ability while they are in that form.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

3mOfCebY1QT6qHAG.name: Diligent Assault
3mOfCebY1QT6qHAG.description: The hound archon carefully makes one greatsword Strike and one jaws Strike in any order. These attacks count toward the hound archon's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

Hound Of Tindalos.name: Hound Of Tindalos
Hound Of Tindalos.publicNotes:
Lean and athirst, the hounds of Tindalos are drawn to those who tamper with the flow of time, travel through time, or use magic or rare alchemical drugs to send their thoughts or perception back or forward in time. Powerful spellcasters can draw them from the Dimension of Time via rare rituals, but doing so attracts the hounds' ire, so few who traffic in such rituals live long enough to spread their knowledge. While the hounds possess great cunning and cruel intellect, they rarely interact with other creatures-other than to hunt and destroy those who have attracted their unblinking attention.

Once a hound catches scent of a mortal to hunt, it calls others of its ilk. The pack then pursues its victim through all space and time until it catches, slays and devours them. Those pursued can escape only by avoiding all angles, as hounds of Tindalos could step through them from nothingness at any time.

5rxGka9M6pYlIoVb.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

QTK9hewzSwMZUHHY.name: 隐形术(仅限自身) Invisibility (Self only)
QTK9hewzSwMZUHHY.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

RrDmY99gWZJtFtjo.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

u6tuxFGclP3Cf3u2.name: Otherworldly Mind
u6tuxFGclP3Cf3u2.description: Whenever a creature targets the hound with a mental effect, that creature takes [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6心灵伤害} (@Check[type:will|dc:25|basic:true] save). On a critical failure, it also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

1IvCoMHs0qGTlw8J.name: Ripping Gaze
1IvCoMHs0qGTlw8J.description:
30 feet.

The hound of Tindalos's eyes glow balefully, causing painful but bloodless wounds to rip open in the body of a creature that meets its awful gaze. When a creature ends its turn in the aura's emanation, it takes [[/r {4d6}[slashing]]]{4d6 slashing伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|basic:true] save).

A creature that critically succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

kuV1kCq4ZEiH9DzH.name: Vulnerable to Curved Space
kuV1kCq4ZEiH9DzH.description: When a hound of Tindalos is not adjacent to a structural angle of 90º (or more acute), its resistance to physical damage is suppressed and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}. It can't recover from this sickened condition, but the condition ends automatically once the hound is again adjacent to a suitable angle.

xq3V1P1OXiEGcqZs.name: Angled Entry
xq3V1P1OXiEGcqZs.description:
The hound of Tindalos casts a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door} spell, but it must transport itself into a space adjacent to an angle of 90º (or more acute) in the structure or environment around it. For example, it could teleport to a space adjacent to a wall (using the angle between the wall and floor) or a corner in a room, or adjacent to a sizable tree growing straight up out of the ground, but not to a flat plain or a room with only curved corners and edges.

Once per day, the hound can use this ability to plane shift to or from the Dimension of Time, with the same restrictions on what angles it can appear next to.

Ice Golem.name: Ice Golem
Ice Golem.publicNotes:
Ice golems are either carved from massive blocks of ice, or pieced together from individual components that are then fused together through heat and refreezing.
