In most cases, the resulting shape is little more than a crude approximation of a humanoid form, but given the right talent, an ice golem could be an exquisitely carved statue of a mythical creature, famous persona, or even a deity.

While ice golems most frequently serve as guardians in freezing climates, the magic that holds an ice golem together keeps it from melting in warmer temperatures. This, combined with the fact that ice golems lie on the lower end of the scale as far as cost and difficulty to create, gives these constructs unusual features that puts them in great demand. The rich and powerful in hot, arid regions often commission ice golems not only as guardians for their estates and vaults, but for comfort-the presence of an ice golem standing quietly sentinel in the corner of a room can help to keep the chamber at a comfortable temperature. The truly decadent use ice golems as servants to keep drinks cold.

1LmOy2NMwi2RqSKT.name: Golem Antimagic
1LmOy2NMwi2RqSKT.description:
harmed by fire ([[/r 4d6]], [[/r 1d10]] from areas or persistent damage); healed by cold (area [[/r 1d6]] HP); slowed by water

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. If an entry lists multiple types (such as “cold and water”), either type of spell can affect the golem.

Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical.

Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical.

Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for that round.

Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.

2svyNegNoV205Fbp.name: Icy Demise
2svyNegNoV205Fbp.description: When an ice golem is destroyed, its body explodes in a blast of frigid air and razor-sharp ice, dealing [[/r {2d6}[slashing]]]{2d6 slashing伤害} and [[/r {2d6}[cold]]]{2d6 cold伤害} to creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true] save.

CUl4eRbkbnzMJ2kZ.name: Vulnerable to Endure Elements
CUl4eRbkbnzMJ2kZ.description: An ice golem can be targeted with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5esP2GVzvxWsMgaX]{Endure Elements} even if it's not willing. If it is targeted, for 1 round it can't use Breath Weapon or benefit from creeping cold, and its fist attack doesn't deal cold damage.

W3rITonxbyLEARlP.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
W3rITonxbyLEARlP.description:
The ice golem exhales a blast of freezing mist that deals [[/r {6d6}[cold]]]{6d6 cold伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

dj9YzVTLAtPASMHB.name: Creeping Cold
dj9YzVTLAtPASMHB.description: When the ice golem gets a critical hit with a fist Strike, the target also takes [[/r {2d6}[persistent,cold]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续 Cold伤害} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Ice Mephit.name: Ice Mephit
Ice Mephit.publicNotes: Though capable of the same depths of cruelty as their fire mephit kin, ice mephits carry theirs out in a more calculating way. Unlike most mephits, these pale blue mephits prefer solitude to company. Lacking in empathy, they are known for their callousness, and have a reputation for brutal honesty. They also have few moral qualms about acting selfishly and exploiting weakness for their own gain, should the chance arise.
Ice Mephit.hp: 快速愈合2 (when touching ice or snow)

a29GFo7lbKhSTAYm.name: 快速愈合2 (when touching ice or snow)

kFLwkDqwtyueOpyG.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
kFLwkDqwtyueOpyG.description:
The ice mephit breathes shards of ice in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals [[/r {1d6}[cold]]]{1d6 cold伤害} and [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6穿刺伤害} to each creature within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] save).

The ice mephit can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Ice Yai.name: Ice Yai
Ice Yai.publicNotes: Ice yai combine the brutality of frost giants with the grace of martial artists. More than any other oni, ice yai delight not in the pleasures of the flesh, but in flesh itself-rather than indulging in oft-destructive mortal vices like drink or lust, ice yai pursue physical perfection, reveling in the process of turning their bodies into powerful fighting machines.
Ice Yai.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

QrWMNrtokpcMTBMi.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

eXhIeUv9hE9Bnejj.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At will) (Self only)
eXhIeUv9hE9Bnejj.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

hwNl8SFYu6kOmwly.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

lhaBLbyRbWQceU9t.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

zZd6BogevnvvWpQx.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

eaXk793zko55RRmG.name: Icy Deflection
eaXk793zko55RRmG.description:
触发 The ice yai is targeted by a ranged Strike or spell attack roll that doesn't have the fire trait

效果 The ice yai creates a reflective blockade of ice, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack roll. If the attack misses, the ice yai redirects the attack to another creature within 20 feet of the yai. The attacker rerolls the attack roll against the new target.

N4XGBKf3QWAL89KZ.name: Change Shape
N4XGBKf3QWAL89KZ.description:
The frost yai takes on the appearance of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.oSvWsqFnQLS5wlvg]{Frost Giant}. This doesn't change their Speed or Strike attack and damage.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

CpDQG0xz9auLn9gr.name: Double Punch
CpDQG0xz9auLn9gr.description:
频率 once per round

效果 The ice yai makes two fist Strikes.

oc2KzcT2MuHsRZ1k.name: Frozen Strike
oc2KzcT2MuHsRZ1k.description:
On a critical hit with a fist Strike or a hit with an ice missile Strike, the target creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} for 1 round.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 3} for 1 round.

Icewyrm.name: Icewyrm
Icewyrm.publicNotes: Resembling wingless, serpentine dragons formed of jagged ice and shot through with veins of nearly frozen water, these elementals dwell within icebergs and enjoy striking out at passing ships or creatures. They're especially common in frigid stretches of ocean in the Plane of Water, where icebergs cluster together into enormous islands of ice.

8UmPplmBw6ibPa9v.name: Explosion
8UmPplmBw6ibPa9v.description: When the icewyrm dies, it explodes, dealing [[/r {8d6}[cold]]]{8d6 cold伤害} to each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true] save).

UZc2Evb7hxJkfGtx.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
UZc2Evb7hxJkfGtx.description:
The icewyrm breathes a @Template[type:line|distance:60] of freezing shards of razor-sharp ice, dealing [[/r {3d12}[cold]]]{3d12 cold伤害} and [[/r {3d12}[piercing]]]{3d12穿刺伤害} to every creature in the line (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

The icewyrm can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Jw8Rmo5ZFh9ouq86.name: Ice Burrow
Jw8Rmo5ZFh9ouq86.description: The Icewyrm can Burrow through ice or snow with a Speed of 20 feet. It moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

Icicle Snake.name: Icicle Snake
Icicle Snake.publicNotes: Translucent and capable of hanging suspended and near motionless, icicle snakes sense the heat of living creatures as a threat and attempt to use their camouflage and chilling bite against foes.

M3YBIgGHTHFIcGRF.name: Icicle
M3YBIgGHTHFIcGRF.description: Until the next time it acts, the icicle snake appears to be an unassuming icicle. It has an automatic result of 27 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as an icicle.

Ifrit Pyrochemist.name: Ifrit Pyrochemist
Ifrit Pyrochemist.publicNotes:
Ifrits' blood blazes with elemental fire. Most ifrits are second-class citizens who serve under the iron heel of the efreeti and their Dominion of Flame, but those born outside the efreet hierarchy or who choose to flee it live lives of passion in search of fame, glory, and power.

Ifrits are fond of fire, but this doesn't mean they all embrace fire's destructive nature. Those who seek more productive roles in a society find inspiration in the way flames flit and dance, and they pride themselves in their skills as acrobats or dancers. The church of Sarenrae particularly welcomes ifrit fire dancers, both in appreciation of their skill and to help ensure these ifrits have a safe place apart from their more violent kin.

But by and large, ifrits are drawn to professions and callings that allow them to wallow in the glories of fire. Ifrit pyrochemists apply this calling to alchemical teachings, seeing purity in every single bomb thrown or conflagration lit.

Mu6RmJmoPp5iM9ld.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

eRnSGx9tKMwZStVB.name: Lesser Alchemist's Fire
eRnSGx9tKMwZStVB.description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 1d8 fire damage, [[/r {1}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}, and 1 fire splash damage.

7FgPojTX7HEIApDW.name: Blank Formula Book
7FgPojTX7HEIApDW.description: A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

qZDyd8KGBqXEYFHU.name: Lesser Elixir of Life
qZDyd8KGBqXEYFHU.description:
Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creatures natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r {3d6+6}[healing]]]{3d6+6 Hit Points} and gain +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.EpB7yJPEuG6ez4z3]{Effect: Lesser Elixir of Life}

eF4sqCqXrBkfqjib.name: Lesser Smokestick
eF4sqCqXrBkfqjib.description:
Activate A Interact

With a sharp twist of this item, you instantly create a screen of thick, opaque smoke in a burst centered on one corner of your space. All creatures within that area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

The radius of the burst is 5 feet.

DU6e2UkT2fc49Zk3.name: Lesser Alchemist's Fire
DU6e2UkT2fc49Zk3.description:
[[/r {1}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}

1 Fire Splash Damage

nKqb3ksLlia2sFBZ.name: Infused Items
nKqb3ksLlia2sFBZ.description:
An ifrit pyrochemist carries the following infused items, which last for 24 hours or until the next time the pyrochemist makes their daily preparations:

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.yd3kEK21YknZLlcT]{Lesser Alchemist's Fire} (5)

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{Lesser Elixir of Life} (2)

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.MoBlVd36uD9xVvZC]{Lesser Smokestick}

dFKXMQ8FbHDHNhTC.name: Quick Bomber
dFKXMQ8FbHDHNhTC.description: The ifrit pyrochemist draws an alchemical bomb with an Interact action and throws it as a ranged Strike.

Iguanodon.name: Iguanodon
Iguanodon.publicNotes:
Iguanodons are large, herbivorous dinosaurs that inhabit swamps and forests where they browse on the abundant vegetation. The iguanodon is capable of moving on two feet or on four, quickly switching from one stance to the other depending on whether it needs to move through dense foliage or to reach delectable morsels hanging up in the canopy.

Although iguanodons are herbivores, they are notoriously quick to anger. Their thumb spikes make their claws particularly devastating weapons. A well-placed blow from one of these claws can turn a hungry predator into a cowering beast with one swift strike. Iguanodons are 30 feet long and weigh 6,000 pounds.
Iguanodon.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

filzxUgupqvL1ZQq.name: Gouging Lunge
filzxUgupqvL1ZQq.description: The iguanodon makes a thumb spike Strike at an adjacent foe and then Strides up to 15尺, dragging its thumb spike across the foe to gouge out a brutal wound. If this Strike hits, it deals an extra [[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8 points of slashing伤害} and the following Stride does not trigger reactions from the creature struck. This thumb spike Strike counts as two attacks when calculating the iguanodon's multiple attack penalty.

Imentesh.name: Imentesh
Imentesh.publicNotes: The loquacious proteans known as imenteshes serve as missionaries, spies, and heralds of chaos to further the protean goal of reality's dissolution. Imenteshes are cunning, curiously diplomatic, and profoundly whimsical. They travel beyond the Maelstrom for their work, frequently adopting extravagant personal attire and decorations that often border upon the garish, all to curry favor with less chaotic beings.
Imentesh.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Imentesh.senses: 黑暗视觉, 熵力感知(模糊感官)60尺

Q6cQBmJGmIcB0lWr.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

4TTBHqodJtZulkHb.name: 神圣狂怒(混乱) Divine Wrath (Chaotic)
4TTBHqodJtZulkHb.description:
你引导你的神祇的怒火，攻击对立阵营的敌人。选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。你造成你所选阵营类型的4d10伤害；每个区域中的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。对应你所选阵营的生物不受影响。既不对应也不对立的生物将其豁免骰结果视为更好一级。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

大失败 该生物承受全部伤害，并且 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}; 当其恶心时，也会 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10。

RM8PNh1GNliHv6hz.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
RM8PNh1GNliHv6hz.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

4rEcF7higflYgkOC.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
4rEcF7higflYgkOC.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

y7xDGYy2BAsv28Gu.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
y7xDGYy2BAsv28Gu.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

nv8kWBvEcv3diNEd.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限守序) Detect Alignment (At will) (Lawful only)
nv8kWBvEcv3diNEd.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

4fUKQrOX75rYdFV8.name: 熵力感知 Entropy Sense
4fUKQrOX75rYdFV8.description: An imentesh can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants the imentesh the ability to sense creatures within the listed range. A creature under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{回避侦测 Nondetection} or that is otherwise shielded from divination and prediction cannot be noticed via entropy sense.

KTc5frqwQnvcjRY9.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

UVvsMOpzGvjOBeG1.name: 幻蛇体质 Protean Anatomy 15
UVvsMOpzGvjOBeG1.description:
An imentesh's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after the imentesh takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

The imentesh is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}, the imentesh automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

XaAIKVkn76K7fFFS.name: Change Shape
XaAIKVkn76K7fFFS.description:
The imentesh takes the appearance of any Large or smaller creature. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

IukwgU6DfXFrQy49.name: Inflict Warpwave
IukwgU6DfXFrQy49.description: An imentesh inflicts a warpwave on a creature within 100 feet @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29] save to resist).

dEiJsJoECS4hvDnB.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
dEiJsJoECS4hvDnB.description:
An imentesh's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed targets.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

9FcMZnkENPj4z3q0.name: Warpwave Strike
9FcMZnkENPj4z3q0.description: Any creature struck and damaged by an imentesh's jaws Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29] save or be subject to a warpwave.

uDrkrfwjoPByW5Zs.name: 扭曲波 Warpwaves
uDrkrfwjoPByW5Zs.description:
Many proteans can subject their foes to disorienting alterations perceived in time and space by creating ripples of unstable reality in the environment called warpwaves.

When a creature fails its saving throw and is affected by a warpwave, roll [[/r 1d8]] and consult the table below for the specific effect on that creature.

Unless indicated otherwise, a warpwave effect lasts for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}, and a new warpwave effect negates any previous warpwave effect already affecting a creature.

d8 Warpwave Effect
1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3} on a critical failure)
2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} and gains [[/r 4d6 #Temporary Hit Points]]{4d6 temporary Hit Points}
3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} (permanent on a critical failure)
4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3} on a critical failure)
5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} by filaments of energy
6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} (Stride, Strike, or Step only)
7 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}
8 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 3} on a critical failure)

Intellect Devourer.name: Intellect Devourer
Intellect Devourer.publicNotes: Intellect devourers serve as advance scouts and infiltrators for the powerful force of alien beings called the Dominion of the Black. These monsters roam the Darklands, from which they mount secret invasions of the world above. When an intellect devourer infiltrates a society, its first priority is to acquire a body. It might first seek out a graveyard for a fresh corpse, as this is easier than fighting and killing someone. When the aberration compresses itself into the host's brain cavity, its real body goes dull to sensation as it connects to the nervous system of its host. If found out, an intellect devourer might quickly inhabit a new body to make its escape, preferably something inconspicuous such as a domestic animal.

lCfKYASIe4pKTiK3.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

2q5Hz0vUEER1aViF.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only)
2q5Hz0vUEER1aViF.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

1RcuxgvvscX2wpNJ.name: 狂乱偏执(随意施法) Paranoia (At Will)
1RcuxgvvscX2wpNJ.description:
你令目标将所有其他生物视为严重威胁。目标陷入对周围所有生物的严重偏执中，并必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标相信其周围所有人都是潜在威胁。它对所有不处于敌对的生物均 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.I1ffBVISxLr2gC4u]{不友好 Unfriendly}，即使本来是盟友。他不对任何人视为盟友。该法术在1轮后结束。

失败 如同成功，但是该效果持续1分钟。

大失败 如同失败，除了目标相信它眼中所有人都是不共戴天之仇敌。它会使用其反应动作和自由动作对付每个人，无论本来是否为盟友，这由GM决定。除此之外，它会如通常一般理智行动，相对于不理他的生物，他会倾向攻击和妨碍主动攻击它的生物。

升阶 (6环级) 你能以至多5个生物为目标。

Sv1f9lzuigDrIgpC.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
Sv1f9lzuigDrIgpC.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

dYvQOwzgoNuS9cG8.name: Body Thief
dYvQOwzgoNuS9cG8.description:
The intellect devourer reduces in size and burrows into the brain of a creature dead for no longer than 1 day. At the start of the intellect devourer's next turn, the body revives at its maximum Hit Points, controlled by the devourer. The intellect devourer is conscious and can sense everything the possessed body could.

Any effect that ends the possession kills the host body with the same effects as Exit Body. The intellect devourer can't use any of the host creature's spells with Body Thief but can use its own spells.

The host body slowly decays while inhabited by the intellect devourer, becoming uninhabitable after 7 days unless preserved with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]{Gentle Repose} or a similar effect.

GCGNJYiHP5GMdDAQ.name: Exit Body
GCGNJYiHP5GMdDAQ.description:
需求 The intellect devourer is controlling a body with Body Thief

效果 The intellect devourer leaves its host body, which dies instantly and is no longer a suitable host for any Body Thief ability. The intellect devourer appears at full size in an adjacent space.

pHckdhGspQesS1nl.name: Ravage
pHckdhGspQesS1nl.description:
The intellect devourer makes two talon Strikes against a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} creature, using the same attack modifier as its highest attack modifier.

These Strikes gain the death trait. If Ravage kills the target, the intellect devourer may use Body Thief against it as a free action.

wHsOiFn1P7QcaaJ2.name: Stolen Identity
wHsOiFn1P7QcaaJ2.description: While an intellect devourer uses Body Thief, it gains the ability to understand and speak all languages known by the host, as well as knowledge of the host body's abilities, identity, role in society, and personality. However, it does not gain the specific memories or knowledge of the host body.

Invidiak.name: Invidiak
Invidiak.publicNotes: For most demons, possessing a creature requires a ritual, magic item, or condition, but for invidiaks, who lack a body, possession is akin to donning a suit of clothing. Known also as shadow demons, invidiaks are formed from envious mortal souls.

dr.exceptions: except force, ghost touch, or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical

Invidiak.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

jdfDA1e2B3iIQzhU.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

J8gjFlA8Gb7zM2ZT.name: 占据术(接触) Possession (range touch)
J8gjFlA8Gb7zM2ZT.description:
你将你的精神与灵魂投射入目标的身躯中，尝试控制目标。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果你想，你可以选择对目标而言更好的成功度结果。当你占据一个目标时，你自己的身体 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}，并且无法正常醒来。你能感知到占据目标的所有可感知事物。你可以解消该法术。如果被占据的身体死亡，该法术结束，并且你必须尝试一次强韧豁免，对抗你的法术DC，否则会 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1小时，或者在大失败时24小时。如果该法术在一场遭遇中结束，你在被占据生物的先攻值前行动。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 你占据目标，但是无法控制它。你在法术持续时间中随该身体移动。

失败 你占据目标，并且获得部分控制。你不再有单独的回合；但是你可以控制目标。在每个目标回合开始时，它可以尝试另一次意志豁免。如果它失败，它该回合被你 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{控制 Controlled} ；如果它成功，他决定自身的动作；并且如果它大成功，它将你排出，并且法术结束。

大失败 你完全占据目标，并且他只能看着你如傀儡一般操控它。目标被你控制。

升阶 (9环级) 该持续时间为10分钟，并且你可以肉身进入该生物的躯体，在法术持续时间中保护肉身免受危害。

kxdTx8XfluDNDeWc.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
kxdTx8XfluDNDeWc.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

CpTRDv42ZCA5jHZL.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

TtqhvUO0vvhjbIFp.name: Exorcism Vulnerability
TtqhvUO0vvhjbIFp.description: If an invidiak attempts to possess a creature and the creature rolls a critical success on its saving throw to resist @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession}, or if an invidiak's possession of a creature is ended prematurely, such as via a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, the invidiak takes [[/r {6d6}[mental]]]{6d6心灵伤害} and cannot use possession for 24 hours.

tIiXnBCscCuQi4WY.name: Favored Host
tIiXnBCscCuQi4WY.description:
Each invidiak has a particular type of creature they prefer possessing, chosen from the following list:

  • aberration
  • animal
  • beast
  • any humanoid (such as dwarf)

In most cases, the favored type of target is human. When an invidiak uses possession against a favored host, the duration of possession increases to unlimited, and the effect lasts until dispelled or until the invidiak dismisses it.

OJg4VMV8aMk40kBm.name: Shadow Blend
OJg4VMV8aMk40kBm.description: The invidiak Strides up to twice their speed. If the invidiak ends their movement in an area of dim light, they become hidden as long as they don't move and the lighting in the area they're in doesn't grow brighter than dim light.

fDEMKsDuC7SNDbx6.name: Unbodied Possession
fDEMKsDuC7SNDbx6.description: An invidiak leaves no body behind when using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession}.

Irlgaunt.name: Irlgaunt
Irlgaunt.publicNotes:
Irlgaunts resemble titanic spiders or crabs, but with cephalopod-like tendrils erupting from the tips of their chitin-armored legs. Their jagged gray shells allow them to blend into the rocky walls of the high mountain passes and deep ravines that serve as their hunting grounds. Despite their size, they move with incredible alacrity, bounding across chasms and skittering up sheer mountain cliffs without pause. Though they are formidable in melee, irlgaunts have an even more powerful ranged attack. These creatures can pelt their opponents by forcefully regurgitating gastroliths-melon-sized clusters of rocks enveloped in coagulated digestive enzymes strong enough to break down flesh and bone. Gastroliths are fragile and explode on contact, spraying the area with shards of rock and caustic acid.

While one might easily mistake an irlgaunt for a simple brutish beast, they have a keen intelligence and use devious hunting strategies. They set traps for travelers and are fond of using gems and magical items taken from previous victims as bait. They have been known to start rockslides or otherwise block passages to reroute explorers into their clutches. They also use their gastroliths to direct the movements of their prey, forcing victims into dead ends at the edge of chasms or cliffs.

For the most part, irlgaunts live solitary lives, likely because finding enough food to sustain a community tends to be difficult. However, they still maintain a sense of extended, regional community, actively gathering when organizing for war or to discuss other issues that affect their species or shared territories. They have been known to occasionally ally with giants, but these truces are usually nebulous.

6BxCWHRHwlGUEbIO.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

3NM1dClgOcqEF0sP.name: 融身入石(随意施法) Meld into Stone (At will)
3NM1dClgOcqEF0sP.description:
你融入相邻的，体积足以容纳你和你的穿戴物和持有物的石块中。当你释放该法术时，你必须触摸该石块。你可以听见，但无法看见石头外的情况，并且你可以在石块中施放法术，只要该法术无需到石头外的效果线。

对石块足够的物理伤害会将你弹出，并对你造成10d6的伤害。穿墙术（passwall）会将你弹出且不会造成伤害，并且结束融身入石。你可以解消该法术。

IGYasXoP7pT26KvN.name: 塑石术(随意施法) Shape Stone (At will)
IGYasXoP7pT26KvN.description:
你将目标石块变成你选择的粗糙形状。该塑形过程十分粗糙，无法制造复杂的组件，细致的细节，可动部分，或者其他类似的东西。当你塑形一个石头时，站在其上的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免或者特技（Acrobatics）检定。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标在石头上 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} 。

大失败 该生物从石头上摔落（如可能）并且倒地着地。

DSxcWM211sMMf5q3.name: Regurgitate Gastrolith
DSxcWM211sMMf5q3.description:
The irlgaunt violently regurgitates a melonsized clot of brittle stone supernaturally infused with digestive enzymes. The stone and acid explode on impact within a range of 30尺, dealing [[/r {7d6}[piercing]]]{7d6穿刺伤害} and [[/r {7d6}[acid]]]{7d6酸液伤害} to creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:33|basic:true] save).

The irlgaunt can't Regurgitate Gastroliths for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

nM4ThlQUyejxc6bH.name: Stone Step
nM4ThlQUyejxc6bH.description: The irlgaunt ignores difficult terrain composed of rocks and stone.

Irnakurse.name: Irnakurse
Irnakurse.publicNotes:
Irnakurse are surface elves who drow have subjected to particularly cruel and humiliating fleshwarping practices, as drow take special delight in the torment of their surface-dwelling kin. The process of crafting an irnakurse involves twisting an unfortunate elf into a deformed mass of misplaced limbs, loose flesh, and bony protrusions-parts that should be internal are often left on full display to the world. Irnakurse are subject to mental conditioning that causes them to hate their prior forms, and these creatures prefer to attack surface elves over all other targets.

Horrid abominations reshaped by vile alchemical magic, the two fleshwarps presented here were created by drow, who transform captured elves or xulgaths into twisted monstrosities that can then be loosed to cause havoc and terror.

bxjYZ892TLi9AizW.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

o40ddeHAtx8cJ0uY.name: Mind Lash
o40ddeHAtx8cJ0uY.description:
A non-evil creature hit by an irnakurse's tentacle is overwhelmed with corrupted images of a ruined life and must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 4} on a critical failure).

After attempting this save, a creature is temporarily immune to Mind Lash for 24 hours.

jr6lRjG0ZeZgW116.name: Soul Scream
jr6lRjG0ZeZgW116.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The irnakurse unleashes an alien shriek of nightmarish horror and pain. All non-evil creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save. The irnakurse can Sustain Soul Scream for up to 6 rounds; each time it does, it repeats the effect.

大成功 The creature is unaffected, and is temporarily immune to Soul Scream for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is stupefied 1. Further failed saves against Soul Scream increase the condition value by 1, to a maximum of stupefied 4. Each time the character gets a full night's rest, the stupefied condition gained from Soul Scream decreases by 1.

大失败 As failure, except the stupefied value increases by 2 instead of by 1.

ml69ZMPwkVsbCTC7.name: Storm of Tentacles
ml69ZMPwkVsbCTC7.description: The irnakurse makes up to four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the irnakurse's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all of its attacks.

Isqulug.name: Isqulug
Isqulug.publicNotes: The isqulug's appearance, though unsettling, might be its least awful aspect. The creature resembles a bipedal amphibian with tentacles instead of arms and a head composed of an undulant mass of what appear to be shifting, slimy transparent eggs filled with writhing larvae. In truth, these larvae constitute the mind and consciousness of the isqulug-its "body" is little more than an organic suit manufactured from the flesh of those it has consumed, analogous to the complex web of a spider or the hive of a colony of bees, but fully capable of movement and violence.
Isqulug.senses: 高等黑暗视觉, host scent 30尺

boOcmJoGp5w8sRkS.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

h67Ean1BYGruHE1T.name: 纠缠术(随意施法) Entangle (At will)
h67Ean1BYGruHE1T.description: 区域中的植物会纠缠生物。该区域视为困难地形。每轮当某个生物在区域中开始回合时，它必须尝试一次反射豁免。在失败时，其在速度上承受-10尺环境减值，直到其离开区域，在大失败时，它也会获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}，持续1轮。生物可以尝试逃脱对抗纠缠术的DC，以移除这些效果。

DfffftC2BwZMqeyZ.name: 隐雾术(随意施法) Obscuring Mist (At will)
DfffftC2BwZMqeyZ.description: 你唤来一团迷雾。在雾中的所有生物获得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，并且在雾外的所有生物对其内的生物获得隐蔽。你可以解消这团云雾。

9tPZMhAImnch102N.name: 飞行术 Fly
9tPZMhAImnch102N.description:
目标能够在空气中穿梭，获得等于其速度或者20尺的飞行速度，取较高者。

升阶 (7环) 该持续时间增加到1小时。

bj3LBfUDYYqFHskT.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

swAJMaqujVUFqFKT.name: Host Scent
swAJMaqujVUFqFKT.description: An isqulug can precisely sense any creature infected with isqulugia within 30尺, and knows the current stage of the disease.

GRiHxWvHx9rf0zcF.name: Expel Infestation
GRiHxWvHx9rf0zcF.description:
The isqulug expels larvae from the hivemind in its head in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. Creatures in this area take [[/r {6d10}[piercing]]]{6d10穿刺伤害} as the swarm feeds on their flesh (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save). Any creature that takes damage is exposed to isqulugia.

The isqulug becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for [[/br 1d4 #Stupified Duration]]{1d4轮}, during which it can't Expel Infestation.

CwEVrNGC8oHJQrv0.name: Isqulugia
CwEVrNGC8oHJQrv0.description:
Isqulugia's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} conditions can't be removed until this affliction is removed

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1 hour)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} (1天)

阶段3 fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1天)

阶段4 paralyzed (1天)

阶段5 the creature dies, and its body violently transforms into a new isqulug. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish}, similar magic, or a 9th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect} ritual can return the victim to life. The new isqulug remains even if the victim is brought back to life.

u3s5y4pE6L6HfEAq.name: Malleability
u3s5y4pE6L6HfEAq.description: The isqulug can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze} through tight spaces as if it were a Small creature. While Squeezing, it can move at its full Speed. The isqulug can even Squeeze through spaces that typically fit only a Tiny creature, but does so at the standard speed for Squeezing.

WtMCu7aRag8Z4ewh.name: Swamp Stride
WtMCu7aRag8Z4ewh.description: An isqulug ignores difficult terrain that's caused by typical features of swamps.

Jabberwock.name: Jabberwock
Jabberwock.publicNotes:
Few beasts have inspired as many legends, poems, songs, and myths in as many cultures, as this bizarre draconic creature. The jabberwock hails from the fey realm of the First World and is part of a group of powerful First World creatures known collectively as the Tane.

Like all members of the Tane, jabberwocks are living creatures that age, eat, drink, and sleep, but do not reproduce normally. Instead, they are created directly by the godlike Eldest who rule the First World, and they serve at the pleasure of these capricious and mysterious entities. Believed to be the most powerful of all the Tane, jabberwocks are typically only ever created with one purpose: to wreak destruction and havoc upon the Material Plane. One of the Eldest might send a jabberwock to devastate a country, continent, or even entire world in order to get revenge for some slight made against them by a single mortal. Sometimes, no specific insult or injury is required, as some of the Eldest resent the very existence of the Material Plane and periodically create jabberwocks simply to express the wrath of the First World against its younger and less chaotic sibling.

Once a jabberwock arrives on the Material Plane, its first order of business is to seek out a lair. It prefers dwelling in remote forest locations about a day's flight from civilization-the more dangerous the woodland is to those who might eventually come hunting it, the better!

The relationship between jabberwocks and vorpal weapons is the subject of much debate and speculation among scholars, and the various poems, songs, and legends about the jabberwock do little to clarify the issue, conflicting and diverging on this point. Some believe that vorpal weapons were first created specifically to combat jabberwocks, but others take the story one step further. They cite evidence in certain ancient myths that there may once have been only a single, unique jabberwock, so powerful that nothing could so much as scratch it-nothing, that is, except for the first vorpal sword, crafted for that very purpose. So epic was the resulting battle that it created strange echoes throughout reality, and as a result, these echoes, in the form of vorpal weapons, can now be found on many worlds. Those who subscribe to this belief claim that the jabberwocks seen today are but pale imitations of this proto-jabberwock, and they speculate that only the combined efforts of several Eldest would be sufficient to create such a creature again.

Variant JabberwocksThe Eldest have sometimes altered certain aspects of the jabberwocks they create. Some of the more notorious or legendary variant jabberwocks include the following.

Frumious Jabberwock: Frumious jabberwocks have two heads. They are level 24 and gain an extra action on each of their turns they can use only to make a jaws Strike.

Mimsy Jabberwock: Typically hailing from wintry regions of the First World, mimsy jabberwocks have glowing blue-white scales, resist cold instead of fire, and have eyes that burn with blue flames that deal cold damage instead of fire damage.

Slithy Jabberwock: Wreaking destruction beneath the waves, these sinuous and slimy jabberwocks are amphibious, have a swim Speed of 80 feet instead of the normal fly Speed, and do not have a wing Strike. A slithy jabberwock's whiffling aura is activated whenever it swims, makes a tail Strike, or Burbles.
Jabberwock.senses: 黑暗视觉, scent 120尺, true seeing

uAlQecVurdHtCKds.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

g2euZN5HL0HEXaye.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
g2euZN5HL0HEXaye.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

R3HSbrKclMuhH014.name: Planar Acclimation
R3HSbrKclMuhH014.description: The jabberwock always treats the plane it is currently located on as its home plane.

yZCKHSiJwqO7N1sy.name: Claws That Catch
yZCKHSiJwqO7N1sy.description:
触发 A creature within the jabberwock's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, leaves a square during a move action, makes a ranged attack, or uses a concentrate action

效果 The jabberwock makes a claw Strike against the triggering creature. If the Strike hits, the jabberwock disrupts the triggering action.

JJTobEFnvJPV524S.name: Vorpal Fear
JJTobEFnvJPV524S.description: A jabberwock damaged by a vorpal weapon becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 4} on a critical hit).

XhhOGnxq5cUHkcEd.name: Burble
XhhOGnxq5cUHkcEd.description:
The jabberwock creates a blast of strange noises and shouted nonsense in the various languages it knows (and invariably some languages it doesn't know), creating one of two effects.

The jabberwock can't Burble again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

  • Confusion 60 feet. Each creature in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:46] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.
  • Sonic Beam The jabberwock focuses its Burbling into a 60 foot line of sonic energy that deals [[/r {24d6}[sonic]]]{24d6 sonic伤害} to creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:46|basic:true] save).

o38MzuC03KOCw8wS.name: Jaws That Bite
o38MzuC03KOCw8wS.description: If the jabberwock makes a jaws attack and rolls a natural 19 on the d20 roll, the attack is a critical hit. This has no effect if the 19 would be a failure.

eN9AmHu7Wb5ZVY5F.name: Whiffling
eN9AmHu7Wb5ZVY5F.description:
触发 The jabberwock Flies or makes a wing Strike

效果 The jabberwock's wings whiffle, creating severe winds within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. These winds move outward from the jabberwock, and they persist until the start of the jabberwock's next turn. During this time, flight of any kind in the emanation requires a successful Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{Maneuver in Flight}, and creatures flying toward the jabberwock are moving through greater difficult terrain. Creatures on the ground in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:43|name:Approach Jabberwock] check to approach the jabberwock.

Jotund Troll.name: Jotund Troll
Jotund Troll.publicNotes:
Jotund trolls are gigantic, nine-headed horrors who prowl frigid moors, marshes, and wastelands, always alone and always enraged. While each of the jotund troll's nine heads possess their own brains and senses, they work much more in tandem than the dual-minded nature of the two-headed troll. Despite this, the heads often argue and bicker, particularly over which head gets to eat. The fact that all nine maws lead to the same shared stomach makes little difference in such culinary disagreements.

Prevailing wisdom holds that the jotund troll represents a primordial, if not original, shape and design for the first trolls to plague the world, arising from a mythical realm in the Great Beyond known as Jotungard. This sprawling domain, said to be nestled in a remote reach of Elysium, is the legendary home of the deities of giant-kind. Whether the jotund troll was created in Jotungard to plague the Material Plane as punishment or challenge, or if it's merely an evocative legend told by scholars, is unknown. In any case, the jotund trolls themselves likely care little.

mnNaEVfu4nEmEwem.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

nneVdsY6tUBGsScQ.name: Head Regrowth
nneVdsY6tUBGsScQ.description: A jotund troll ordinarily has nine heads, and they can use regeneration to regrow a head that is severed from an effect like a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.6xaxxKfvXED6LfIY]{Vorpal} weapon. After regaining Hit Points from regeneration, the jotund troll attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:8] check. On a success, one missing head is fully restored; on a critical success, two missing heads are fully restored. If a jotund troll loses their last remaining head, they die immediately.

eKSzSgT3W8A9oNzs.name: Multiple Opportunities
eKSzSgT3W8A9oNzs.description: A jotund troll gains an extra reaction per round for each of their heads beyond the first, which they can use only to make Attacks of Opportunity with their jaws or to Fast Swallow. They can't use more than 1 reaction for the same triggering action, even if a creature leaves several squares within their reach, and the jotund troll must use a different head for each Attack of Opportunity they make. Whenever one of the jotund troll's heads is severed, the troll loses 1 of their extra reactions per round.

IZVxmKtbXiti9BZx.name: Cacophonous Roar
IZVxmKtbXiti9BZx.description:
The jotund troll emits a cacophonous roar from all their heads with a mystical power that distorts the listener's mind. Each non-troll creature within 100 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:34] save.

The jotund troll can't use Cacophonous Roar for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Cacophonous Roar for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} for 1 round.

大失败 The creature is confused for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

0mzc60K0kDFbeLL4.name: Fast Swallow
0mzc60K0kDFbeLL4.description:
触发 The jotund troll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grabs} a creature with their jaws

效果 The troll uses Swallow Whole.

v0kg2s0AeP7Pv7zn.name: Ravenous Jaws
v0kg2s0AeP7Pv7zn.description: The jotund troll makes a number of jaws Strikes up to their number of heads, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the troll's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the jotund troll makes all of these attacks.

Jyoti.name: Jyoti
Jyoti.publicNotes:
Jyotis are sometimes called "false phoenixes" by the ignorant or willful. These avian humanoids are native to the Positive Energy Plane. They rarely leave this enigmatic realm and view visitors from other planes as stains on the purity of their home. Jyotis particularly distrust divine spellcasters and religious warriors, seeing them as inclined to take credit for manifesting a life force that, from the jyotis' perspective, is as plentiful and ubiquitous as water is to fish.

Despite their distrust of intruders, jyotis rarely attack unprovoked when their homes are not threatened. They are intolerant, however, of those who intrude on the palaces of crystallized light and captured flame in which they dwell. They often chase even those who come bearing gifts away; few visitors have anything they desire, for what they desire most is to be left alone. The jyotis' full wrath is reserved for natives of the Shadow Plane and the Negative Energy Plane. Historically, the promise of battle with the gargoyle-like sceaduinars, whom they consider it their duty to oppose, has been the only thing to lure jyoti armies beyond the Positive Energy Plane.
Jyoti.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值 , +2 status to all saves vs. divine magic

Ky9wR2NCUma8mVz1.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

u6kTO6HI4KtrGtds.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

k8sBT0SGwUD3ZUuE.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Divine Magic

1vC7HEUnMXCc5wme.name: Positive Energy Affinity
1vC7HEUnMXCc5wme.description: Positive healing effects always heal the jyoti for the maximum amount. It doesn't gain the automatic Hit Points or temporary Hit Points from being on a plane with the positive planar essence.

dbDXIpmXMwGGSF0O.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
dbDXIpmXMwGGSF0O.description:
The jyoti breathes a blast of searing flame infused with positive energy in a @Template[type:cone|distance:40] that deals [[/r {8d6}[fire]+{4d6}[positive]]]{8d6 fire damage plus 4d6 positive伤害} to creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true] save).

The jyoti can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}.

IHn483eD21ShK5j4.name: Infuse Weapons
IHn483eD21ShK5j4.description: Any weapon a jyoti wields becomes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch} weapon while the jyoti holds it.

Kelpie.name: Kelpie
Kelpie.publicNotes: Kelpies are malevolent amphibious fey shapechangers intent on luring mortals to their doom. These cruel predators lurk in and around areas of water, slightly preferring freshwater over saltwater. Kelpies lure or drag their prey underwater then drown and devour them, leaving behind only the victim's heart and liver- the only parts of a meal kelpies find unpleasant. Kelpies are fond of magically disguising itself as fine steeds or attractive strangers to draw in victims, but its true appearance takes the form of a hideous equine with slimy, green flesh resembling aquatic plants.

XGTj8sfNa1YvUTdZ.name: Captivating Lure
XGTj8sfNa1YvUTdZ.description:
The kelpie instills an overwhelming attraction to itself within the mind of a single creature within 60 feet. The target perceives the kelpie as a desirable person (if the kelpie is in humanoid form) or a valuable steed (if the kelpie is in equine form) and must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:23] saving throw.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Captivating Lure for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 1 round and is then temporarily immune to Captivating Lure for 24 hours.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}, and it must spend each of its actions to move closer to the kelpie as expediently as possible while avoiding obvious dangers. If a captivated creature is adjacent to the kelpie, it either attempts to mount the kelpie (if the kelpie is in equine form) or stays still and doesn't act. If the creature is attacked by the kelpie, or if it can't breathe water and enters an area of water, the creature is freed from captivation at the end of the kelpie's turn.

大失败 As failure, but the target doesn't consider water a danger and will enter an area of water even if it can't swim or breathe water. If it is attacked by the kelpie or starts to drown, it can attempt a new save at the start of its next turn, but it isn't freed automatically.

kj7lFKS7xdj7h83n.name: Change Shape
kj7lFKS7xdj7h83n.description:
The kelpie can take on the appearance of any Medium or Large animal of an equine nature (such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.In2nNwo3JL1RXQhj]{Horse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.z39LYFGYmOsoGVSh]{Hippocampus}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.YUk9S6caKqheRsUQ]{Pony}), or any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change its Speeds or its attack and damage modifiers with its Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Korred.name: Korred
Korred.publicNotes: Korreds are reclusive fey in the form of small, hirsute individuals with long, animated manes of hair. While korreds have a natural affinity and admiration for stones and boulders, they prefer to dwell aboveground in areas of rocky forest or wooded hills rather than in caves. Korreds are a private people who don't take kindly to intruders, and they invariably work to drive off or kill any non-fey who stumble into their territory. Staunchly proud of their hair, korreds choose their minimal attire so as to allow their body hair to flow freely, often wearing only a belt with a pouch for throwing rocks and trimming shears-though this belt and pouch are rarely visible under their wild manes.
Korred.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

7j5ta80hcHB60jDE.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

VFViUEQww0BRVE03.name: 塑石术(随意施法) Shape Stone (At will)
VFViUEQww0BRVE03.description:
你将目标石块变成你选择的粗糙形状。该塑形过程十分粗糙，无法制造复杂的组件，细致的细节，可动部分，或者其他类似的东西。当你塑形一个石头时，站在其上的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免或者特技（Acrobatics）检定。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标在石头上 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} 。

大失败 该生物从石头上摔落（如可能）并且倒地着地。

mkhUcjzL4QL7a659.name: 粉碎音波(随意施法) Shatter (At will)
mkhUcjzL4QL7a659.description:
高频音波攻击击碎附近的一件物体。你对该物体造成2d10音波伤害，如果物体的硬度为4或者更低，忽视该硬度。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10，法术所能忽视的硬度增加2。

HKqAzVBtd2gZsgNk.name: Pouch
HKqAzVBtd2gZsgNk.description: A sack can hold up to 8 Bulk worth of items. A sack containing 2 Bulk or less can be worn on the body, usually tucked into a belt. You can carry a sack with one hand, but must use two hands to transfer items in and out.

K80GtqxqKN7Og68w.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

BdJy1HqrIlkJp8rF.name: Animated Hair
BdJy1HqrIlkJp8rF.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The korred's long, animated hair reaches out and interferes with creatures in the area. The korred can select which targets are affected by their animated hair. An affected creature that ends its turn in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} on a critical failure) as long as it remains in the aura.

zglT7mSqeYfcswev.name: Hair Snare
zglT7mSqeYfcswev.description:
The korred causes a long, tangled length of their hair to detach from their body and snake out to coil around an adjacent creature. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21] save.

The korred cannot use Hair Snare again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The hair wraps around the creature. The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all of its Speeds until it Escapes (DC 21) or until the korred uses Hair Snare again (at which point the previous snare drops to the ground, no longer animated).

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} until it Escapes (DC 21) or the korred uses Hair Snare again.

fPGmCfWuF8oqK8hX.name: Otherworldly Laugh
fPGmCfWuF8oqK8hX.description:
频率 three times per day

效果 The korred unleashes an otherworldly laugh. Each non-fey creature within a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21] save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} on a critical failure).

oIucCyy3YvC5FoCA.name: Stone Stride
oIucCyy3YvC5FoCA.description: The korred steps into a block of stone large enough for them to fit inside and instantly teleports to any other stone within 30 feet that has the same minimum size. Once the korred enters the stone, they instantly know the rough locations of other sufficiently large stones within 30 feet. They can exit from the original stone, if they prefer. They can't carry extradimensional spaces with them when they Stone Stride; if the korred attempts to do so, Stone Stride fails.

Leng Spider.name: Leng Spider
Leng Spider.publicNotes: The monstrous, bloated spiders from the windswept realm of Leng build eerie, dangerous lairs with the aid of magically compelled slaves. Leng spiders have anywhere from five to 13 legs, but never an even number.
Leng Spider.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Leng Spider.senses: 黑暗视觉, detect magic, greater web sense

QoW8rIq8ikH4Ebpr.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

ZwTQYhVwvbqvzaHX.name: 凌空而行(恒定法术) Air Walk (Constant)
ZwTQYhVwvbqvzaHX.description: 目标可以在空气中行走，如同在坚实地面上。它可以如此上升与下降，最大45度角。

TanTXAIbWmvfNYpc.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
TanTXAIbWmvfNYpc.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

YGVlqNtd12h0Jimh.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
YGVlqNtd12h0Jimh.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

iw7xcu7OkpYHYyQ2.name: Greater Web Sense
iw7xcu7OkpYHYyQ2.description: While touching its webs, the Leng spider has precise @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.j2wsK6IsW5yMW1jW]{震颤感知 Tremorsense} to detect the vibrations of creatures touching its web.

KJKzoE0ci2sMwyFX.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

snsO2nPGYHe6pZx0.name: Create Web Weaponry
snsO2nPGYHe6pZx0.description: The Leng spider creates a weapon by applying a cord of webbing to heavy objects, such as rocks or chunks of metal, either attaching two heavy objects together to create a web bola or fastening one to its leg to create a web war flail.

0hkOF2WHkLhHAEjQ.name: Descend on a Web
0hkOF2WHkLhHAEjQ.description:
The Leng spider moves straight down up to 120尺, suspended by a web line. It can hang from the web or drop off. The distance it Descends on a Web doesn't count when calculating falling damage.

The web can be severed by a Strike that deals slashing damage (AC 30, Hardness 15, 25 HP), causing the Leng spider to fall.

sWbaqjXgO4EigI5j.name: Lay Web Trap
sWbaqjXgO4EigI5j.description:
频率 three times per day

效果 The Leng spider spins a web within 20 feet of itself to create a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.TFnr9Gq7VXPJu0GQ]{Grasping Snare}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.a2XaerM1KkPyLIPM]{Stunning Snare}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XU8u9F3uoesGDjgM]{Warning Snare}. The Leng spider's web provides all the raw materials it needs. All save and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} DCs associated with web traps use the Leng spider's Crafting DC for traps (DC 36). A web trap decays after 24 hours.

k4tbzCH8jMb0d1Qk.name: Leng Spider Venom
k4tbzCH8jMb0d1Qk.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1轮); the confused effect has the emotion and mental traits.

iZxDrmolCkhIxWO6.name: Ranged Trip
iZxDrmolCkhIxWO6.description: A Leng spider can use a web bola to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip} a target with the Athletics skill. The skill check takes a -2 circumstance penalty. A web bola deals no damage when used to Trip.

Leprechaun.name: Leprechaun
Leprechaun.publicNotes:
Leprechauns are mostly jovial tricksters who prefer mischief over conflict. They fill their days with as much fun, wine, and food as possible. Mostly found in forested regions, leprechauns respect nature and those who protect it.

Leprechauns do not attack on sight. Rather, they engage in conversation and try to charm, cajole, or trick those they meet into doing favors for them or freely giving over a treasured item, usually in return for illusory wealth or false promises of wealth and success. These small tricksters are masters at discerning the desires of those they meet-a knack that puts them in a powerful position when bargaining for goods or favors. They aren't above turning people against each other for their own benefit but generally not to an extent that causes harm.

In most cases, a leprechaun doesn't keep a purloined possession for long. The leprechaun most often returns such stolen prizes just in time to defuse tensions, often as they point out the humor of the situation, hoping to share their amusement and mirth with the victim. In cases where a leprechaun's trick goes too far and results in an incensed victim, the leprechaun quickly flees the conflict rather than engage in combat. This willingness to return stolen goods or to flee from battles fades as leprechauns grow older. Ancient leprechauns who have lived for thousands of years often spiral into dark bitterness and increasingly use their powers and illusions to lure those who offend them or fail to appreciate a joke into danger... or even death.

oqcxPwDIMJ2bu4Ul.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

fUotsbKaORew1RjV.name: 隐形术(仅限自身) Invisibility (Self only)
fUotsbKaORew1RjV.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

qZaBb2z6mE2zLL2u.name: Create Object
qZaBb2z6mE2zLL2u.description:
频率 three times per day

效果 The leprechaun produces an item out of their hat, from behind their jacket, from within a hole in a tree stump, or from any other unexpected location. This conjured item must be no more than 1 Bulk and must be made of relatively commonplace material (such as cloth, wood, stone, or even low-value metal like iron or lead). It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a Cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher.

The created object is temporary and lasts for 1 hour or until the leprechaun creates a new item, whichever comes first.

ixXRVHF3jg0IMuKw.name: Leprechaun Magic
ixXRVHF3jg0IMuKw.description: When a leprechaun uses their innate spells to deceive, trick, or humiliate a creature, the spell DC increases to 20 and the attack modifier to +11.

Lerritan.name: Lerritan
Lerritan.publicNotes: Lerritans are unstoppable giants with skin of volcanic glass and blood of roiling lava. These malicious arsonists would see the world burned to a cinder. They pay homage to Ymeri, the evil elemental demigod of fire, and they bully other fiery creatures. When the urge to immolate grows too great to ignore, lerritans burn forests, destroy villages, and boil rivers, but they avoid large bodies of water.

ej30s3gZXMNhiGRr.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

71Z5UP7uzcvxSIy9.name: 异界传送() Plane Shift (To the Material Plane, Plane of Fire, or Plane of Earth only)
71Z5UP7uzcvxSIy9.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

aTZDvupAiIZ4j3su.name: +3 Greater Striking Warhammer
aTZDvupAiIZ4j3su.description: This weapon has a wooden shaft ending in a large, heavy metal head. Thehead of the hammer might be single‑sided or double‑sided, but it's always capable of delivering powerful bludgeoning blows.

cb6s0BQEA2EVpswg.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

nszzMLENLPQ4zPoa.name: Tenacious Flames
nszzMLENLPQ4zPoa.description:
100 feet.

Creatures in the emanation cannot recover from persistent fire damage.

mY1TZIEvZh0l0OBD.name: 投石 Throw Rock
mY1TZIEvZh0l0OBD.description:
A lerritan can break stony scales off its body to throw; these scales reform at the end of each round, so the lerritan is never without a supply of rocks to hurl.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ThrowRock]

JGXYh66auv2dCHDv.name: Volcanic Eruption
JGXYh66auv2dCHDv.description:
The volcano on the lerritan's back erupts and sends lava bombs raining down in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30], dealing [[/r {12d12}[fire]]]{12d12火焰伤害}.

Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:46|traits:damaging-effect] saving throw. The lava globules quickly cool into heavy stones, transforming the area into greater difficult terrain for non-lerritans.

The lerritan can't use for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} for 1 round.

失败 The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} (Escape DC 46).

大失败 The creature takes double damage and is encased in a rocky crust with lava on the inside. The creature is restrained (Escape DC 46), can't breathe, takes [[/r {3d12}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}, and can't recover from this persistent fire damage until freed.

Leucrotta.name: Leucrotta
Leucrotta.publicNotes: The vile and vicious offspring of a demon lord and a monstrous species of hyenas, leucrottas are intelligent and cruel beasts. They use their astounding vocal mimicry to lure unsuspecting creatures near so that they can first torment and then devour them. Leucrottas measure 5 feet at the shoulder and weigh 800 pounds, and they are perpetually filthy. A leucrotta's oversized jaws are lined with rows of jagged, hardened bony ridges rather than teeth, and it can shear through flesh, bone, and even steel with ease.
Leucrotta.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

kBxRAEuGBWNPM636.name: Language Adaptation
kBxRAEuGBWNPM636.description: A leucrotta can learn any language it hears spoken for at least 10 minutes, adding it to its languages known and replacing the language it previously learned using this ability. Typically, a leucrotta knows Gnoll as the language granted by this ability.

obCe64sZedFgSWGQ.name: Luring Cry
obCe64sZedFgSWGQ.description:
60 feet

需求 The leucrotta's last action was Sound Mimicry

效果 The leucrotta utters a plaintive cry to draw its prey closer. Each creature within the emanation that was deceived by Sound Mimicry must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:19] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} and compelled to move toward the sound of the leucrotta's voice on their turn. Fascinated creatures are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}.

If the leucrotta attacks, the fascinated condition ends only for the creature that is attacked. If the leucrotta speaks a creature's name while using its Luring Cry, that creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to their saving throw to resist the ability.

On a successful save, a creature is temporarily immune to Luring Cry for 24 hours.

H7lzbseyLDhs5Tp3.name: Sound Mimicry
H7lzbseyLDhs5Tp3.description: The leucrotta perfectly imitates voices and speech and attempts a Deception check against listeners' Will DC to fool them. The leucrotta gains a +4 bonus to this Deception check if it has listened to the creature it's imitating for at least 10 minutes at any point in the last 24 hours. The leucrotta can't duplicate voice-based abilities or spells, though it can perfectly mimic the sound of verbal spellcasting and can attempt to deceive constructs or undead that respond to voice commands. The leucrotta can't imitate speech in languages it doesn't know.

Living Boulder.name: Living Boulder
Living Boulder.publicNotes: Living boulders roll and glide through the Plane of Earth, gathering gemstones and metal shards until their surfaces resemble a ship's hull covered in barnacles. Barely more intelligent than many animals, living boulders fill much the same role on the Plane of Earth as the great herd animals found on Material Plane worlds.

1fTRsJAGDuFgPeXF.name: Earth Glide
1fTRsJAGDuFgPeXF.description: A living boulder can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow} through earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, it moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

MJIrkULpmp4soA0F.name: Rolling Charge
MJIrkULpmp4soA0F.description: The living boulder Strides twice, and can then make a Strike with its jaws. This jaws Strike gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{Knockdown}.

Living Thunderclap.name: Living Thunderclap
Living Thunderclap.publicNotes: A living thunderclap is a humanoid-shaped storm cloud that cracks and booms with thunder.

RwPr1Ik2tKeFrL0r.name: Swiftness
RwPr1Ik2tKeFrL0r.description: The living thunderclap doesn't trigger reactions when it moves.

KvQg0sUQsjltpY39.name: Thunderbolt
KvQg0sUQsjltpY39.description:
The living thunderclap emits a bolt of lightning that crashes with deafening thunder. The living thunderclap makes a lightning bolt Strike that deals [[/r {1d12}[electricity]]]{1d12电击伤害}. If it hits, the target and any creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] around the target take [[/r {2d6}[sonic]]]{2d6 sonic伤害} and must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18|basic:true] save.

Any creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Lunar Naga.name: Lunar Naga
Lunar Naga.publicNotes:
Lunar nagas are skilled diviners and astrologers whose dark scales and white hair sparkle with motes of light that mimic the night skies to which they are forever drawn. While they are less physically imposing than other nagas, they possess a graceful beauty that many find entrancing, even without the help of the naga's inherent magical abilities. Earning a lunar naga's trust is difficult, but not impossible, especially for someone who shares the creature's interest in the celestial sphere.

As they have no hands, lunar nagas use mage hand to manipulate delicate instruments and fine telescopes to observe the night sky. They track the positions of celestial bodies, recording their discoveries in esoteric journals. At their best, lunar nagas are wise and mysterious beings who seek to expand their knowledge of the cosmos. At their worst, after too much exposure to the unfathomable entities that dwell in the darkness between the stars, they become dark prophets who drive others to commit terrible deeds in the name of abominable masters.

On Golarion, the lunar nagas of the nation of Nagajor use their abilities to serve many communities as soothsayers. A few have founded observatories in which they and their followers explore the night sky. Some nagas even use their knowledge of the stars as navigators on ships or overland caravans. In the broader world, where people do not give nagas deference as nearly divine rulers, lunar nagas try to avoid contact with outsiders or use their magical powers of disguise to hide their true forms from all but their most worthy allies.

OYGTYAiWBb7ORaF1.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
OYGTYAiWBb7ORaF1.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

ipGw6L7E6GUS565c.name: Hypnosis
ipGw6L7E6GUS565c.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The lunar naga twists the coils of their serpentine body, causing the starlike motes on their scales to shift and move as they glow brighter, creating a mesmerizing swirl of light and darkness. All creatures within a 30.foot emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} until the end of the naga's next turn (on a critical failure, fascinated creatures drop whatever items they are carrying as well). The lunar naga can Sustain a Spell on Hypnosis. If the naga moves, affected creatures are compelled to remain within 30 feet of the naga and must spend each of its actions moving closer to the naga as expediently as possible on its next turn. If a creature is unable to end its turn within 30 feet of the naga, the effect ends for that creature.

OxPw5pr9S1edjy8S.name: Lunar Naga Venom
OxPw5pr9S1edjy8S.description:
豁免检定 DC 24

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 如阶段1 (1轮)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1轮)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} (1轮). Once a creature falls unconscious from lunar naga venom, they remain asleep for [[/r 1d8 #hours]]{1d8小时} unless woken.

Lurker In Light.name: Lurker In Light
Lurker In Light.publicNotes:
These malicious and strange fey appear as fairies about 2 feet tall, with insectile wings, large eyes, and bulbous heads. They slaughter and cause mischief in a pattern only their alien intellect understands, but they've been seen to take particular umbrage against dwarves, gnomes, and creatures who live in darkness. With their grudges and pursuit of their own wicked and sadistic whims, lurkers in light deftly overturn the conventional wisdom that creatures associated with light are benign and friendly.

While lurkers in light are fey and have ties to the First World, these creatures are often found elsewhere in the Great Beyond. They are particularly fond of invading the Shadow Plane to bring light to those who dwell there-not to help, but to spread misery and pain among those to whom light is agonizing.

ctRDT8yPATnd3gxe.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

tLyD1GZ9Oz7JtF5e.name: 次元门() Dimension Door (Only when in bright light, and only to an area in bright light)
tLyD1GZ9Oz7JtF5e.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

bEAhPwJXnrqxPt5i.name: Blend with Light
bEAhPwJXnrqxPt5i.description:
触发 The lurker in light uses a move action

需求 The lurker in light is in an area of bright light

效果 The lurker in light becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} until it enters an area of dim light or darkness, or until it uses a hostile action.

7ibCw6e1BSbQ94NW.name: Lurker's Glow
7ibCw6e1BSbQ94NW.description:
A creature that takes damage from a lurker in light's mote of light must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save.

成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to lurker's glow for 24 hours.

失败 The creature is lined in golden light for 1 minute and can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} during this time. If the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, it is concealed rather than being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}.

大失败 As failure, but the creature sheds bright light in a 20-foot emanation for the duration of the effect. In addition, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} on its first turn after failing this save.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.6E8bOkwFzFuQ3ZAw]{Effect: Lurker's Glow (Critical Failure)}

v2by5D3cMGyVu78a.name: Ritual Gate
v2by5D3cMGyVu78a.description:
需求 The lurker in light has reduced a living creature to 0 Hit Points on this turn or its previous turn and has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.hs7h8f4Z1ZNdUt3s]{Summon Fey} innate spell available

效果 The lurker in light casts summon fey with only a verbal component, using the act of slaughter to replace the normal material and somatic components for the spell. If the fey creature summoned has the same alignment as the lurker in light, the lurker in light can sustain the summon fey spell for up to 1 hour instead of 1 minute.

nQV7pNdpGD2GDrgl.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
nQV7pNdpGD2GDrgl.description:
A lurker in light's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Magma Scorpion.name: Magma Scorpion
Magma Scorpion.publicNotes: Whether skittering through Abyssal wastelands or basking in the searing sand of the deepest deserts, magma scorpions have charred carapaces constantly emitting vision-warping waves of heat.

1jqzGUINJJfVCKfu.name: Smoke Vision
1jqzGUINJJfVCKfu.description: The magma scorpion ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from smoke.

YJzGe5kr1qCZKV34.name: Magma Scorpion Venom
YJzGe5kr1qCZKV34.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}

Manta Ray.name: Manta Ray
Manta Ray.publicNotes: While manta rays might appear daunting, they are generally docile. Manta rays are found in temperate or tropical oceans, and they generally stay in the upper reaches or at the surface of deeper waters. These rays are filter feeders that subsist on plankton. They can also eat larger fish or aquatic creatures as the need arises, but rarely attack anything Small or larger. Many underwater cultures, particularly aquatic elves, raise and farm manta rays to serve as messengers, beasts of burden, or even pets. Manta rays don't make particularly good mounts, but some aquatic civilizations use them to draw underwater carriages.

u1o4MqU6HFWR8rVh.name: Electrolocation
u1o4MqU6HFWR8rVh.description: A manta ray in water can use its electrolocation as an imprecise sense at the listed range to detect living creatures that are in the same body of water as itself.

RkzJDhpWzxqQXiAq.name: Strafing Rush
RkzJDhpWzxqQXiAq.description: The manta ray Swims, making one tail Strike at any point along the way. The Strike deals half damage.

DDI0cQeKx8SLhTUR.name: Swift Swimmer
DDI0cQeKx8SLhTUR.description: The manta ray Swims twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these actions.

Marrmora.name: Marrmora
Marrmora.publicNotes:
On the First World, marrmoras dwell in ruined wildlands perpetually scourged by fire and rarely, if ever, travel elsewhere. When a wildfire devastates a wilderness region on the Material Plane and results in the death of other fey, marrmoras can be drawn across the planar boundary to revel in the resulting destruction. They seek to reignite the fires that beckoned them, to gather up and feed upon the charred remains of those who perished within (particularly the bodies of dead fey), though they do grow homesick if they spend too much time away from the First World. They are burdened by a capricious but persistent rage and are unfailingly cruel. While they are capable of negotiation and intelligent interaction, they almost never bargain in good faith and typically interact with others only as a means to more efficiently spread their fiery devastation.

A marmorra's twisted appearance evokes the look of an arboreal whose bark has been burnt down to charcoal. They have nearly featureless faces and hands ending in long, sharp claws. Their broken flesh looks like charcoal‑burnt wood, riddled with cracks that still glow with an unwholesome heat. They trail ash wherever they walk, and wisps of smoke curl off of their bodies. Though marrmoras enjoy the sight of any woodland and its inhabitants roasting in the flames of their carefully curated fires, there is little that brings more pleasure to a marrmora than the sight of good-aligned plant creatures cooking to a crisp.

bYqHLnt7oqthGfZi.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

ftyJjjKcXegKOZO6.name: 元素形态(仅限火元素) Elemental Form (Fire Elemental only)
ftyJjjKcXegKOZO6.description:
你唤来位面的能量，转变为中性元素战斗形态。当你施放该法术时，选择气、土、火、或者水。处于该形态时，你获得对应的特征以及元素特征。在该战斗形态中你有手，并且能进行操作行动。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=19+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 10临时生命值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的无武装近战攻击，这是你仅能使用的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{攻击 Strike}。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值为+18、你的伤害加值为+9。这些基于敏捷（气或者火）或者基于力量（土或者水）。如果你对应的无武装攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该调整值。
  • 特技（气或者火）或者运动（土或者水）调整值+20；如果你本身的调整值更高，忽略该改变。

你也会根据你选择的元素类型获得特定能力：
