Ostiarius.senses: 高等黑暗视觉, painsight, sense portal

6leNSciOB3vrO7El.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

8vvlKfwG2KuafsIJ.name: 安定心神(随意施法) Calm Emotions (At will)
8vvlKfwG2KuafsIJ.description:
你令区域内的生物强制冷静，令它们进入平和的状态；每个生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 对沉静的渴求令该生物在攻击骰上承受-1状态减值。

失败 任何会影响该生物的情绪效果会被压制，并且该生物无法进行敌对行为。如果该目标成为任何其他生物敌对行为的目标，它不再受到安定心神的影响。

大失败 如同失败，但是敌对行为不会结束该效果。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Qr5rgoZvI4KmFY0N]{法术效果：安定心神}

eZpQaoruvmngTW6T.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

EakALyMQUSW9bDgO.name: Painsight
EakALyMQUSW9bDgO.description: A velstrac automatically knows whether a creature it sees has any of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} conditions, as well as the value of those conditions

vP6KGkCy0KpMQarQ.name: Sense Portal
vP6KGkCy0KpMQarQ.description: The ostiarius always knows the direction and distance to the closest portal between the Shadow Plane and the Material Plane. This sense functions only on these two planes.

vLuAkberNsYeDSD0.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

RFcZ8BNKEh3WWl6j.name: Whispering Wounds
RFcZ8BNKEh3WWl6j.description:
30 feet.

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it hears the wounds on the ostiarius's body whisper obscene truths. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

snHGvNo3Y3eluuUN.name: Compel Courage
snHGvNo3Y3eluuUN.description:
The ostiarius inspires their willing allies and themself by whispering words of courage from their wounds. The ostiarius and their allies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects. The ostiarius can Sustain Compel Courage.

Non-velstracs who accept this compelled courage find bleeding wounds opening on their own bodies to whisper in thanks. They take [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续 Bleed伤害} and can't attempt a flat check to end this damage as long as they're compelled.

t3cnDaUX26zIroa8.name: Focus Gaze
t3cnDaUX26zIroa8.description: The ostiarius stares at a creature they can see within 30 feet. The creature must immediately attempt a Will save against Whispering Wounds. In addition, if the creature was already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened} and fails its save, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} by the ostiarius and can't use hostile actions. This fascination lasts for 1 round or until the ostiarius takes any hostile action against the creature or the creature's allies. Whether the creature succeeds at or fails the save, it is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Pachycephalosaurus.name: Pachycephalosaurus
Pachycephalosaurus.publicNotes:
Pachycephalosauruses are normally peaceful herbivorous dinosaurs, but they grow much more violent during their mating season, when they fight one another to win over mates and warn away interlopers. They also defend themselves vehemently when potential predators stray too close to their herd. The pachycephalosaurus's skull has a distinctive dome-shaped crown surrounded by numerous blunt, bony horns. This feature, combined with the dinosaur's powerful, compact neck, allows it to make battering-ram-like charges capable of inflicting great damage.

Some humanoid groups have successfully trained pachycephalosauruses for use as mounts, but the creatures aren't particularly well suited to the task.

Pachycephalosauruses grow to a length of 15 feet and weigh 1,400 pounds.
Pachycephalosaurus.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

uAKDE9WbARcraQJx.name: Clobbering Charge
uAKDE9WbARcraQJx.description: The pachycephalosaurus Strides up to its Speed. If it ends its movement within melee reach of a target, it can make a skull Strike against that target. If the pachycephalosaurus critically hits with this Strike, the creature hit is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}.

aFiPts0pbbuzRaLf.name: Sudden Shove
aFiPts0pbbuzRaLf.description:
触发 The pachycephalosaurus damages a Medium or smaller foe with its skull Strike

效果 The pachycephalosaurus digs in and flings its head up, shoving its foe away. It attempts an Athletics check against the target's Fortitude DC.

大成功 The pachycephalosaurus pushes the opponent up to 10 feet away from itself and knocks the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}.

成功 The pachycephalosaurus pushes the opponent back 5 feet.

失败 The pachycephalosaurus fails to push the opponent.

大失败 As failure, but the failed attempt leaves the pachycephalosaurus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} for 1 round.

Peluda.name: Peluda
Peluda.publicNotes:
Peludas are wild and savage dragons that favor reedy marshlands, sparsely forested bogs, and river valleys for lairs. A single peluda typically claims a stretch of waterways a few miles in length, then systematically drives off any potential rivals so that the peluda can despoil the land as they please, leaving clawed footprints on muddy riverbanks, toppling trees, and impaling half-eaten corpses on their quills as trophies left to rot. They venture beyond their domains to hunt, roasting prey with their breath or pulverizing them with their tails, burning and killing for cruel sport before slithering, sated, back to their mucky lairs.

Peludas despise weakness and loathe creatures smaller than themselves, especially humanoids, whom they see as fragile and soft, good only for eating or breaking. In contrast, peludas have a massive inferiority complex regarding more impressive creatures-especially larger and stronger dragons. Peludas will try anything to become stronger, including ingesting shiny coins, gems, and jewelry, which old folk tales claim will strengthen their quills and fire breath.
Peluda.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

aHkhx52xZZTtPI25.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

pnvcZVssnfksWBzv.name: Quill Thrust
pnvcZVssnfksWBzv.description:
触发 A creature within 10 feet attempts a melee Strike against the peluda

效果 The peluda shifts their position and makes a quill Strike against the attacking creature. This Strike doesn't count toward the peluda's multiple attack penalty, and the peluda's multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

QmK15RaSe9yfdYIR.name: Vulnerable Tail
QmK15RaSe9yfdYIR.description: If the peluda takes 30 or more slashing damage from a critical hit, the attacker severs the peluda's tail. The peluda takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] and can't make tail attacks until their tail grows back (in about 1 week).

djpxVgfWCno4NZwq.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
djpxVgfWCno4NZwq.description:
Your eidolon exhales a blast of destructive energy. Your eidolon deals 1d6 damage to all creatures in the area, with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. The area and damage type of the Breath Weapon are chosen when the eidolon gains this ability.

Your eidolon then can't use their Breath Weapon again for the next [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d6. [[/r (ceil(@actor.level/2))d6]]{Levelled伤害}

MwuE7Ua1AaKVpFBo.name: Peluda Venom
MwuE7Ua1AaKVpFBo.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}, and flat-footed (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, and flat-footed (1轮)

71Xez8c9broSGKbf.name: Quill Barrage
71Xez8c9broSGKbf.description:
The peluda bristles their quills and shakes, sending dozens of spear-like barbs in every direction. All creatures within 30 feet take [[/r {11d6}[piercing]]]{11d6穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save) and are exposed to peluda venom if they take any damage.

The peluda can't use Quill Barrage again for 1 minute.

Peryton.name: Peryton
Peryton.publicNotes:
The peryton is an amalgam of horror, merging the features of a stag, wolf, and hawk. They love using shadows to stalk their victims before ripping out their still-beating hearts and relishing the dying pulse as they swallow them whole, so the doomed victims spends their last moments watching as their flesh is consumed.

Despite perytons' animalistic appearance and brutal behavior, they are viciously cunning and as intelligent as humans. Their preferred tactic is to find a lone traveler and stalk it from on high. Most perytons are loners who loathe all other creatures. These feelings extend to other perytons as well, and adult males attack each other on sight as surely as they attack anything else.

Once per year, perytons mate. The males offer up hearts they have collected from humanoids to attract females. Those that manage to secure a mate rarely survive long though, as their mating ritual is short and violent. Female perytons generally abandon their eggs after laying them, so newly hatched perytons must fend for themselves from the moment they emerge.

A lone peryton typically builds a nest in a rocky overhang or an exceptionally tall and strong tree where they can observe nearby lands. Although they aren't particularly interested in wealth, perytons do like to collect small objects from their victims. During those times between hunts, they sometimes study these trophies in order to relive the memories of victims' last moments and the taste of victims' hearts.

osi4ctAQErnOa2BZ.name: Heart Ripper
osi4ctAQErnOa2BZ.description: The peryton rips out the heart of an adjacent corpse with their jaws. The creature must have died in the last minute. As the peryton rips the heart free and swallows it whole, they regain [[/r {2d6} #hit points]]{2d6 HP}, and any non-peryton that witnesses this event must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} on a critical failure).

BZfKFoVLNm5bmKHc.name: Mimic Shadow
BZfKFoVLNm5bmKHc.description:
需求 The target must be casting a shadow

效果 The peryton Flies, going no higher than 20 feet over the target creature. The target creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or the peryton's shadow changes to match that cast by the target creature. With their shadow so transformed, the peryton gains a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against that creature.

In addition, each time the peryton successfully Strikes that creature, the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}, or increase its frightened condition by 1 if it's already frightened. This is an emotion and fear effect. The shadow remains transformed for 1 hour or until the peryton Mimics a Shadow again, whichever comes first.

Petitioner (Abaddon).name: Petitioner (Abaddon)
Petitioner (Abaddon).publicNotes:
When a mortal dies, their soul travels to the Boneyard in the Outer Planes where they are judged by Pharasma, the goddess of the dead. Once they have been judged, their soul is sent on to their final reward or punishment in the afterlife, and in the process is transformed into a creature known as a petitioner. This process grants the soul a new body, one whose shape is the result of the prevailing philosophical forces of the plane to which it is sent. The petitioner's memories from their life are typically wiped nearly clean, allowing them to retain only a few hazy fragments akin to half-remembered dreams. Regardless of the petitioner's size, power, or nature in life, they're a Medium creature in their afterlife.

Existence as a petitioner can last for eons, but this state is not necessarily eternal. Deities, powerful denizens of the Great Beyond, or even the outer planes themselves can further change the petitioner's nature by transforming them into raw quintessence, spiritual essence that is then used to expand a plane's physical manifestation, or by transforming the petitioner into a new form of supernatural life such as a celestial, monitor, or fiend. Should a petitioner die, their body breaks down in a process akin to decay, their nature reverting back to the quintessence or elements that make up their plane. This represents the true end of a soul's journey: their associated life essence travels back to the heart of the Great Beyond to be recycled into the Positive Energy plane, fueling the creation of entirely new souls.

The hunted appear as Medium sized versions of themselves from their prior lives, and they exist to be pursued and consumed by daemons.

9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.name: Planar Incarnation - Abaddon
9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.description:
All petitioners are formed from and personify the nature of the plane on which they manifest, and their statistics are adjusted as summarized below. They also gain any trait associated with creatures from their plane.

Abaddon The hunted appear as Medium sized versions of themselves from their prior lives, and they exist to be pursued and consumed by daemons

  • Alignment NE;
  • Language Daemonic;
  • Additional Ability @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing} 5;
  • Melee fist +7, Damage 1d8+2 bludgeoning

The larvae appear as maggot-like grubs with the face the petitioners had in life.

9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.description:

Abyss The larvae appear as maggot-like grubs with the face the petitioners had in life

  • Alignment CE;
  • Language Abyssal;
  • Additional Ability immune to disease and poison;
  • Melee jaws +7, Damage 1d8+2 piercing

Petitioner (Astral Plane).name: Petitioner (Astral Plane)
Petitioner (Astral Plane).publicNotes:

The untethered appear as astrally projected versions of their mortal forms, yet they lack a silver cord.
Petitioner (Astral Plane).languages: any one spoken in life (such as Common)

9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.name: Planar Incarnation - Astral Plane
9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.description:
All petitioners are formed from and personify the nature of the plane on which they manifest, and their statistics are adjusted as summarized below. They also gain any trait associated with creatures from their plane.

Astral Plane The untethered appear as astrally projected versions of their mortal forms, yet they lack a silver cord

  • Alignment any;
  • Language any one spoken in life (such as Common);
  • Additional Ability fly Speed 20 feet;
  • Melee fist +7, Damage 1d8+2 bludgeoning

Should a petitioner die, their body breaks down in a process akin to decay, their nature reverting back to the quintessence or elements that make up their plane. This represents the true end of a soul's journey: their associated life essence travels back to the heart of the Great Beyond to be recycled into the Positive Energy plane, fueling the creation of entirely new souls.

Plane of Water Water pneuma appear as versions of their mortal selves formed of flowing water

  • Alignment any;
  • Language Aquan;
  • Additional Ability amphibious, swim Speed 20 feet;
  • Melee current +7 (water), Damage 1d8+2 bludgeoning

Petitioner (Positive Energy Plane).name: Petitioner (Positive Energy Plane)
Petitioner (Positive Energy Plane).publicNotes:
When a mortal dies, their soul travels to the Boneyard in the Outer Planes where they are judged by Pharasma, the goddess of the dead. Once they have been judged, their soul is sent on to their final reward or punishment in the afterlife, and in the process is transformed into a creature known as a petitioner. This process grants the soul a new body, one whose shape is the result of the prevailing philosophical forces of the plane to which it is sent. The petitioner's memories from their life are typically wiped nearly clean, allowing them to retain only a few hazy fragments akin to half-remembered dreams. Regardless of the petitioner's size, power, or nature in life, they're a Medium creature in their afterlife.

Existence as a petitioner can last for eons, but this state is not necessarily eternal. Deities, powerful denizens of the Great Beyond, or even the outer planes themselves can further change the petitioner's nature by transforming them into raw quintessence, spiritual essence that is then used to expand a plane's physical manifestation, or by transforming the petitioner into a new form of supernatural life such as a celestial, monitor, or fiend. Should a petitioner die, their body breaks down in a process akin to decay, their nature reverting back to the quintessence or elements that make up their plane. This represents the true end of a soul's journey: their associated life essence travels back to the heart of the Great Beyond to be recycled into the Positive Energy plane, fueling the creation of entirely new souls.

The enlightened appear as diaphanous, radiant versions of their mortal selves.

9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.name: Planar Incarnation - Positive Energy Plane
9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.description:
All petitioners are formed from and personify the nature of the plane on which they manifest, and their statistics are adjusted as summarized below. They also gain any trait associated with creatures from their plane.

Positive Energy Plane The enlightened appear as diaphanous, radiant versions of their mortal selves

  • Alignment any good;
  • Language Jyoti;
  • Additional Ability @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing} 5;
  • Melee glowing touch +7, Damage 1d8+2 positive

Petitioner (Shadow Plane).name: Petitioner (Shadow Plane)
Petitioner (Shadow Plane).publicNotes:
When a mortal dies, their soul travels to the Boneyard in the Outer Planes where they are judged by Pharasma, the goddess of the dead. Once they have been judged, their soul is sent on to their final reward or punishment in the afterlife, and in the process is transformed into a creature known as a petitioner. This process grants the soul a new body, one whose shape is the result of the prevailing philosophical forces of the plane to which it is sent. The petitioner's memories from their life are typically wiped nearly clean, allowing them to retain only a few hazy fragments akin to half-remembered dreams. Regardless of the petitioner's size, power, or nature in life, they're a Medium creature in their afterlife.

Existence as a petitioner can last for eons, but this state is not necessarily eternal. Deities, powerful denizens of the Great Beyond, or even the outer planes themselves can further change the petitioner's nature by transforming them into raw quintessence, spiritual essence that is then used to expand a plane's physical manifestation, or by transforming the petitioner into a new form of supernatural life such as a celestial, monitor, or fiend. Should a petitioner die, their body breaks down in a process akin to decay, their nature reverting back to the quintessence or elements that make up their plane. This represents the true end of a soul's journey: their associated life essence travels back to the heart of the Great Beyond to be recycled into the Positive Energy plane, fueling the creation of entirely new souls.

The mutilated appear as they did in their mortal lives, yet are covered in wounds or partially adorned or wrapped in chains.

9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.name: Planar Incarnation - Shadow Plane
9yu44cM7W0Xg2Q36.description:
All petitioners are formed from and personify the nature of the plane on which they manifest, and their statistics are adjusted as summarized below. They also gain any trait associated with creatures from their plane.

Shadow Plane The mutilated appear as they did in their mortal lives, yet are covered in wounds or partially adorned or wrapped in chains

  • Alignment any evil;
  • Language Shadowtongue;
  • Additional Ability immune to bleed and fear;
  • Melee chain +7, Damage 1d8+2 bludgeoning

Piscodaemon.name: Piscodaemon
Piscodaemon.publicNotes:
Scions of death by poisoning, piscodaemons are cruel even by daemonic standards, delighting in slow and painful suffering. To a piscodaemon, death is but the icing on a putrescent cake-its true pleasure comes from watching, hearing, smelling, and even tasting raw anguish. While poisons and venoms are piscodaemons' preferred tools, their cruel claws are more than capable of tearing enemies asunder if necessary.

Piscodaemons dwell in fetid swamps and noxious waterways, including the River Styx, the Bile Sluice, and the Drowning Court of Charon, Horseman of Death. They are often accompanied by cadres of hydrodaemons-representations of death by drowning. While they are cunning commanders, piscodaemons are apt to forget their station in the heat of battle and slice their way to the center of the fray.
Piscodaemon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

6ITLmA9FU1LuwZNY.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

lWOARoBijDLtXC58.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
lWOARoBijDLtXC58.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

ysmXZKOimV2eOJdk.name: 识破隐形(恒定法术) See Invisibility (Constant)
ysmXZKOimV2eOJdk.description:
你能看见 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{法术效果：识破隐形}

moM05QmLZeKsreVi.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限善良) Detect Alignment (At will) (Good Only)
moM05QmLZeKsreVi.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

Q3rKZnaS5mmSsg1J.name: 侦测毒素(随意施法) Detect Poison (At will)
Q3rKZnaS5mmSsg1J.description:
你可以侦测一个生物是否分泌毒素或者具有毒素，或者一件物体是否是毒素或者已经被下毒。你无法判断目标是否有多种毒素，也无法了解毒素的种类。特定的物质，例如铅或者酒精，是毒素，并会遮盖其他毒素。

升阶 (2环级) 你会得知毒素的数量和类型。

pLNcYnrUhpwxDo9b.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

LcHF4msXaAScrZFk.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

jfL2tU9w9oSiQlmg.name: Enhance Venom
jfL2tU9w9oSiQlmg.description:
触发 A creature within 30 feet attempts a saving throw against piscovenom

效果 The creature takes an additional [[/r {2d8}[poison]]]{2d8毒素伤害} even if it succeeds at its save.

A46dQA87Lnn71IzJ.name: Gory Rend
A46dQA87Lnn71IzJ.description: The piscodaemon makes two claw Strikes against the same creature. If both hit, the creature takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d10.success] and is exposed to piscovenom.

mSpMpLaDOLKbXWns.name: Piscovenom
mSpMpLaDOLKbXWns.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d8}[poison]]]{2d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {4d8}[poison]]]{4d8毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

Planetar.name: Planetar
Planetar.publicNotes: The beings of righteous fury known as planetars are known to be the least patient of angels. They exist to destroy evil that cannot be redeemed, and they often leave prolonged dialogue to other angels. Of course, no planetar ignores the importance of diplomacy, but they know that others among the angelic hosts are better suited to that task, while they focus on the larger picture. In angelic armies, planetars serve as commanders or generals. They stand at least 9 feet tall and weigh over 500 pounds.
Planetar.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Planetar.senses: (32 to detect illusions), darkvision, true seeing

xzuxIMk5QK7iPQ9j.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

ofun5QHmnppWzdgV.name: 移除恐惧(随意施法) Remove Fear (At will)
ofun5QHmnppWzdgV.description:
你通过一次接触来平缓一个生物的恐惧。你可以尝试反制目标正承受的一个恐惧效果。这只会令目标得到解脱，不包括该恐惧效果的其他目标。

升阶 (6环级) 该法术的射程增加到30尺，并且你能以至多10个生物为目标。

0BT4rsp6NVFOXHYe.name: 解除魔法(随意施法) Dispel Magic (At will)
0BT4rsp6NVFOXHYe.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

iQ847whFi4kDiEDu.name: 侦测阵营(恒定法术,仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (Constant) (Evil only)
iQ847whFi4kDiEDu.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

MKjUJB31R5kiPnhA.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
MKjUJB31R5kiPnhA.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

cMrDWgOf9PHIIIZT.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
cMrDWgOf9PHIIIZT.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

R1yZI6IRZc1d6a6H.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At will) (Self only)
R1yZI6IRZc1d6a6H.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

gKujbrE9tdbREcZi.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

BsKlvqGTEEIQo1cx.name: +4 Bonus on Perception to Detect Illusions

EIhaPhUMiN88cQT6.name: Aura of Righteousness
EIhaPhUMiN88cQT6.description:
20 feet.

Allies in the planetar's aura gain a +2 status bonus to AC against evil creatures and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls against evil creatures. The area in the aura is difficult terrain for evil creatures.

Q57wXsK3JdmLYoDR.name: Blade of Justice
Q57wXsK3JdmLYoDR.description: The planetar makes a greatsword Strike against a target it detects as evil. If the target is evil, the Strike deals three extra weapon damage dice and deals [[/r {1d6}[persistent,good]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续善良伤害} to the target. The planetar can convert all the physical damage from the attack into good damage.

RXUhJpHPbpDMUlbJ.name: Change Shape
RXUhJpHPbpDMUlbJ.description:
The planetar can take on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change their Speed or Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

XSN5GyOi1NAbLqve.name: Holy Armaments
XSN5GyOi1NAbLqve.description: Any weapon gains the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy} property rune while a planetar wields it.

Polar Bear.name: Polar Bear
Polar Bear.publicNotes: Polar bears are known for their pale fur, with black eyes, lips, and toe pads. They are aggressively predatory creatures, stalking prey for miles on land or across the icy waters of frozen oceans. They are also amazing ambush predators, leaping from the water to ambush seals resting on ice floes. If they are desperate, polar bears hunt not only other animals but also humanoids.
Polar Bear.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺

JGCkaVnAvnwAxWOp.name: Mauler
JGCkaVnAvnwAxWOp.description: The polar bear gains a +3 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against creatures it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

ktdazJyPHLCoWXur.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
ktdazJyPHLCoWXur.description:
The polar bear's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Purrodaemon.name: Purrodaemon
Purrodaemon.publicNotes: Few creatures embody war's sheer amount of bloodshed and loss of life as deeply as the purrodaemons, deacons of war. These giant humanoid daemons are bedecked in black, unholy armor, with weapons piercing their flesh at every opening. Far from wounds, however, these weapons are the purrodaemon's arsenal. A purrodaemon can, with frightening swiftness and nauseating ease, extract a weapon from its own flesh as though drawing a sword from a sheath, and their blood is so tainted with evil that weapons steeped in it become powerful tools of war.
Purrodaemon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

XUErBTnVDmhG16lW.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

v4FHOiOqxoo52YTS.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
v4FHOiOqxoo52YTS.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

K5z1UHEznk6ZV8GU.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
K5z1UHEznk6ZV8GU.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

I1dP96sPZylIIzoF.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限善良) Detect Alignment (At will) (Good only)
I1dP96sPZylIIzoF.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

UpvwE0gzoIhEpwom.name: +2 Greater Striking Glaive
UpvwE0gzoIhEpwom.description: This polearm consists of a long, single‑edged blade on the end of a 7‑foot pole. It is extremely effective at delivering lethal cuts at a distance.

A18yDTtE84tJ1jhJ.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

CsNzwFbWatN4ivRP.name: Hurl Weapon
CsNzwFbWatN4ivRP.description: The purrodaemon causes a weapon that has steeped in their flesh (see Steep Weapon) to telekinetically launch from their flesh. The purrodaemon makes a hurled weapon Strike without using their hands.

1Z3FZ39brRJH2cIs.name: Recall Weapon
1Z3FZ39brRJH2cIs.description:
需求 A steeped weapon that's no longer sheathed in the purrodaemon's body is within 120 feet of the daemon

效果 The steeped weapon swiftly flies through the air to resheath itself in the purrodaemon's body. If a creature is along this flight path, the purrodaemon can make a hurled weapon Strike against the target; if it hits, the weapon drops to the ground in a square adjacent to the creature.

oKEblFTjM5UV6Lwa.name: Steep Weapon
oKEblFTjM5UV6Lwa.description:
The purrodaemon sheathes a weapon in their own flesh. This deals no damage to the purrodaemon, which can have up to 10 weapons sheathed in their body at a time. A steeped weapon must be one that deals piercing or slashing damage.

If a purrodaemon @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interacts} to crush a soul gem, one weapon of their choice sheathed in their flesh becomes enchanted with the daemon's fiendish power and becomes a +2 greater striking weapon that can be used in place of their glaive or hurled at targets (with a +2 item bonus to the hurled weapon's attack modifier and an extra d10 of damage). This magical quality fades 24 hours after it ceases being sheathed in the daemon's living body. A steeped weapon can be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed}.

LN7JypAnmAunS0lg.name: Twist the Blade
LN7JypAnmAunS0lg.description:
需求 The purrodaemon has fewer than 10 weapons sheathed in their body

触发 The purrodaemon is hit with a weapon that deals piercing damage

效果 The purrodaemon seizes the triggering weapon. The weapon's wielder must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:40] save. On a failure, the weapon is disarmed and falls to an adjacent square. On a critical failure, the weapon is sheathed in the purrodaemon's body as though the daemon had used Steep Weapon.

Quetz Couatl.name: Quetz Couatl
Quetz Couatl.publicNotes:
These sacred feathered serpents tirelessly serve the powers of law and good. Some operate directly as messengers and intermediaries of the deities, while others operate independently in aiding the cause of righteousness. Either way, they watch over mortals and try to influence and aid them from the shadows, shifting from plane to plane to spread wisdom and healing where they are needed. Some quetz couatls are worshipped as divinities in remote or isolated societies, and while they do not encourage such veneration, they use the trust placed in them to foster peace and cooperation with others.

Quetz couatls are typically 10 to 20 feet long, with iridescent blue and green scales. Their glorious wings of rainbow-hued feathers span 15 feet and weigh nearly a ton. They are carnivorous, feeding on birds, mammals, and even the occasional evil humanoid.

R9YnxMf9012f1ajN.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

kfWXgpb3mBY8x5bX.name: 幻化灵体(随意施法) Ethereal Jaunt (At will)
kfWXgpb3mBY8x5bX.description:
你进入灵界位面，这是一个与物质位面重叠的位面。物质位面的生物无法看见你，并且你可以穿过物质位面的事物。你以你通常速度的一半移动，但是可以向任何方向（包括上下）。你可以看见60尺半径内的物质位面；它是灰色且朦胧的，对你具有 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。你无法影响物质位面，并且你不会被物质位面影响，除了从物质位面发出的力场效果以及防护系效果。当法术结束时，你回到物质位面。如果你在空中，你会坠落（除非你能飞），并且如果你在物体中，你会被推离到最近的开放空间，并且你每被推离5尺会承受1d6伤害。如果你施放该法术时不处于物质位面，你失去该法术。

升阶 (9环级) 你能以射程30尺内的至多另外5个自愿生物为目标。该持续时间为至多10分钟。

xWKBg0GE28Tpu1bC.name: 异界传送(随意施法) Plane Shift (At will)
xWKBg0GE28Tpu1bC.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

xCOiURbOFmMct0Ad.name: 侦测阵营(恒定法术,同时侦测所有阵营) Detect Alignment (Constant) (All Alignments Simultaneously)
xCOiURbOFmMct0Ad.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

SFLxOb7tFxjJz3mj.name: 读心术(随意施法) Mind Reading (At will)
SFLxOb7tFxjJz3mj.description:
你通过一次短暂的心灵接触来尝试阅读目标的想法。它必须尝试一次意志豁免。目标会暂时免疫你的读心术1小时。

大成功 目标得知当施放该法术时你模糊的表层想法。

成功 你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

失败 你得知当施放该法术时目标模糊的表层想法，并且你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

大失败 如失败，并且在法术持续时间中，你可以维持该法术来再次侦测目标的表层想法。目标不会获得另外的豁免。

xm7v6OJXM7xTHseI.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At will) (Self only)
xm7v6OJXM7xTHseI.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

FIBgwJl6ghhZJB6Y.name: Quetz Couatl Venom
FIBgwJl6ghhZJB6Y.description:
A quetz couatl's venom deals good damage rather than poison damage to fiends

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d8}[poison]]]{2d8毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d10}[poison]]]{2d10毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, and flat-footed (1轮)

XMbOWL8A6tcWyW18.name: Radiant Wings
XMbOWL8A6tcWyW18.description:
The quetz couatl spreads its multicolored wings and radiant plumage. Each enemy within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Radiant Wings for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is dazzled for 1 minute.

大失败 As failure, but if the creature is evil, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}.

49zcmiZjqimM6a7b.name: Wrap in Coils
49zcmiZjqimM6a7b.description:
需求 The quetz couatl has a Medium or smaller creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} in its jaws

效果 The quetz couatl moves the creature into its coils, freeing its fangs to make attacks, then uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.OmV6E3aELvq9CkK1]{Greater Constrict} against the creature. The quetz couatl can hold as many creatures in its coils as will fit in its space.

Quickling.name: Quickling
Quickling.publicNotes:
Few creatures can match a quickling's speed. These malicious fey creatures delight in striking with blinding speed and accuracy, racing in to stab and slash at foes before scampering away for cover with maddening- even frightening-swiftness. Stories of people simply doubling over, bleeding from what appear to be spontaneously opening wounds, are often eyewitness accounts of quickling attacks.

Quicklings actively hate the "slow-paced dullards" they encounter every day, delighting in inflicting suffering and pain on creatures they deem too sluggish to matter. While they are related to kinder fey such as brownies and pixies, quicklings care only for their own merriment. They see their own cruel pranks as the height of humor and have full confidence that their speed and invisibility will keep them safe from harm. They occasionally form gangs of up to a dozen individuals, although the group usually devolves very quickly into mayhem, as they inevitably perform increasingly deadly pranks against each other.

QNLWcv6w045fE1oE.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

dynvtBdr79KGnqBo.name: Can't Catch Me
dynvtBdr79KGnqBo.description:
触发 The quickling is targeted by a Strike

效果 The quickling darts aside, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, then Strides up to half their Speed after the Strike resolves.

jCQO2RfqPLKqDeuF.name: Slow Susceptibility
jCQO2RfqPLKqDeuF.description: The quickling takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against effects that cause the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed} condition. If the quickling ever becomes slowed, they lose their supernatural speed, can't Fade from View, and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} for the duration of the slow. They also can't reduce this sickened condition for the duration of the slowed effect.

sNUoqbThXZbfj5S7.name: Fade from View
sNUoqbThXZbfj5S7.description:
需求 The quickling used no attack, manipulate, or move actions in the previous round

效果 The quickling becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} until it uses an attack, manipulate, or move action.

The quickling can't use Fade from View again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

3BSxL95mz6QjoWi1.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
3BSxL95mz6QjoWi1.description:
The quickling's Strikes deal an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

WIPFxMzyJ87R3t7k.name: Supernatural Speed
WIPFxMzyJ87R3t7k.description: The quickling's speed, combined with nearly instantaneous acceleration and deceleration, enables them to move in astonishing ways. As long as they have a firm surface to travel across, they can Stride their full movement vertically or horizontally. They can even run across unstable surfaces, such as water, in the same way, although dangerous surfaces (acid, lava, etc.) harm them as normal. They must end their movement on a horizontal surface capable of bearing their weight or else they fall.

Quoppopak.name: Quoppopak
Quoppopak.publicNotes: Quoppopaks combine the most terrifying aspects of water striders, octopuses, and vampire bats into one evil, water-dwelling monster. Their bodies consist of an oval abdomen, eight hollow tentacles, and a thick, tail-like limb ending in a ventral tube, which resembles a lamprey's mouth and is capable of intaking fluids at an astounding rate. While quoppopaks can clumsily maneuver on land, they prefer to move on water; quoppopaks glide along the surface of lakes or the ocean by thrusting their ventral tubes into the water, cycling liquid up through their bodies, then spraying the water back out in a high-pressure stream through their hollow, spear-like tentacles. Though the ventral tube can't expel fluids, it still poses a substantial threat to other creatures. Quoppopaks have gills, but they are located inside the creatures' abdomens, allowing them to draw their air from the water they siphon through their ventral tubes. Quoppopaks can hold some water in their abdomens for quick forays on land, but this is akin to humans holding their breath to go underwater, and the monsters' water reserves quickly deplete.

DJ4DzpxUnMokZPId.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

xx6zXcdGLkuW5RmE.name: Flooding Thrust
xx6zXcdGLkuW5RmE.description:
需求 The quoppopak's ventral tube is in water

效果 The quoppopak uses Tentacle Stab against a creature within reach; if either of these Strikes hits, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|traits:damaging-effect] save. On a failed save, the quoppopak shoots water through its tentacles into the creature, dealing [[/r {2d6+5}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6+5钝击伤害} and making the creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} as its internal organs fill with water (double damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

NDQPoKh0SP7tR1Ss.name: Tentacle Stab
NDQPoKh0SP7tR1Ss.description:
频率 once per round

效果 The quoppopak makes two tentacle Strikes against the same creature. These Strikes deal piercing damage instead of bludgeoning, and the quoppopak can't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab} with them. Its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

Ev5luBuqFKW5s9MN.name: Water Glide
Ev5luBuqFKW5s9MN.description: The quoppopak can stand and move on the surface of water or other liquids without falling through. It can go underwater if it wishes, but it must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} to do so.

Raven.name: Raven
Raven.publicNotes:
These omnivorous birds are cunning and opportunistic scavengers. Capable of solving simple puzzles in order to retrieve desired items, ravens gather at the periphery of civilization, raiding it as needed when they are not hunting in the wilds. Whether singularly, in pairs, or as a flock, ravens live off scraps as often as they do carrion or prey. They are also unusually social among their own kind, even alerting other ravens to large carcasses with loud, croaking cries; it is rumored that this extends between flocks as well.

Few birds are as cunning and social as the raven.

4zEyOGGm0vwVrtmi.name: Cunning
4zEyOGGm0vwVrtmi.description:
Usage etched on a slashing or piercing weapon The weapon performs divination magic on the blood of your foes, granting you insight into their abilities and weaknesses.

启动 F 想象

频率 每分钟一次

需求 On your previous action this turn, you used this weapon to hit and damage a creature that has blood or other vital fluids

效果 You learn the secrets the weapon gleaned from the creature's blood. Attempt to Recall Knowledge about the target of the required attack, gaining an item bonus to the Recall Knowledge skill check equal to the weapon's item bonus to attack rolls from its potency rune.

If the required attack was a critical hit, you also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.

Raven Swarm.name: Raven Swarm
Raven Swarm.publicNotes:
A flock of ravens is known as an unkindness. Certainly the name lives up to its meaning when a swarm of ravens decides to work together. In most cases, a raven swarm like the one presented here won't attack larger foes, but when manipulated by supernatural forces or simple desperation born from hunger, an unkindness of ravens can be a surprisingly dangerous foe.

Few birds are as cunning and social as the raven.

5qgx9qhXAceS6uLh.name: Enraged Cunning
5qgx9qhXAceS6uLh.description: There are few things as dangerously persistent in the natural world as an angry unkindness of ravens. A raven swarm can hound its prey through most barriers. Simple latches, unsecured chimney flues, loosely shuttered windows, and similar obstacles rarely keep an unkindness away. A raven swarm attempts a Thievery check to bypass many of these simple obstructions, typically against DC 20.

WVChw6DFgtcfsrAf.name: Swarming Beaks
WVChw6DFgtcfsrAf.description: The ravens' angry pecking deals [[/r {1d8}[piercing]]]{1d8穿刺伤害} to each enemy in the swarm's space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true] save). A creature that critically fails its save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for [[/br 1d4 #Duration Blinded]]{1d4轮} as the ravens focus their attacks on the target's vulnerable face.

Ravener.name: Ravener
Ravener.publicNotes: The ravener presented here was once an ancient red dragon.
Ravener.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Ravener.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺, smoke vision, soulsense 60尺

8gcJAk8CnEreKNfO.name: 火墙术(随意施法) Wall of Fire (At Will)
8gcJAk8CnEreKNfO.description:
你创造一面火焰墙壁，它会灼烧穿过它的生物。你创造至多60尺长的10尺高5尺厚的直线型火焰墙壁，或者5尺厚，10尺半径10尺高环形火焰。该墙无论哪种形态均为竖直墙；如果你想的话，墙的高度可以更小。墙一侧的任何事物对于另一侧的生物而言均为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。任何穿过该墙或者在回合开始时占据墙的区域的生物承受4d6火焰伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该火焰伤害增加1d6。

7rYfyAQXss9duKBu.name: 暗示术(随意施法) Suggestion (At Will)
7rYfyAQXss9duKBu.description:
你的甜言蜜语令生物难以抗拒。你向目标指示一系列动作，其用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和它们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 目标立即按照你的指示行动。该法术的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但基本持续时间为1小时。

升阶 (8环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

cl53LLrZpaVbVWIa.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
cl53LLrZpaVbVWIa.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

HHscPOBzNRjg9IJ5.name: Smoke Vision
HHscPOBzNRjg9IJ5.description: Smoke doesn't impair an ancient red ravener's vision; it ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from smoke.

0dTEwPV9TXqDzFno.name: Soulsense
0dTEwPV9TXqDzFno.description: A ravener senses the spiritual essence of living and undead creatures within the listed range. Creatures whose material bodies are one unit with their souls, like celestials and fiends, appear brighter to this sense.

rCDCEl5KfuYha1bo.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

gKqI8aZDucHlpC9C.name: Cowering Fear
gKqI8aZDucHlpC9C.description:
90尺, DC 42.

A ravener's frightful presence causes creatures to cower in fear as well. As long as a creature is at least frightened 2 or more as a result of the ravener's frightful presence, it is also immobilized from the fear.

Qzr8MBWWm4DE5P8H.name: Discorporate
Qzr8MBWWm4DE5P8H.description:
触发 The ravener takes excess damage to their soul ward but still has at least 51 Hit Points in their soul ward

效果 The ravener draws deeply into their soul ward, discorporating their body into soul energy in order to escape. They take 50 damage to their soul ward and their physical body vanishes, reappearing [[/r 1d4 #hours]]{1d4小时} later in a random location within 1 mile from the location where they used Discorporate.

d68HrWYDDAvuRFIR.name: Redirect Fire
d68HrWYDDAvuRFIR.description:
触发 A creature within 100 feet casts a fire spell, or a fire spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet

效果 The ravener makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, and other effects of the spell, as though they were the caster.

kxiMCVyD0e1fsT96.name: Soul Ward
kxiMCVyD0e1fsT96.description:
200 HP

An intangible field of necromantic energy protects a ravener from total destruction. A soul ward has 150 maximum Hit Points, or 200 if the ravener is level 21 or higher. Whenever a ravener would be reduced below 1 Hit Point, all damage in excess of what would reduce them to 1 Hit Point is instead dealt to their soul ward. If this damage reduces the soul ward to fewer than 0 Hit Points, the ravener is destroyed. A soul ward's Hit Points can be restored only via specific ravener abilities such as Consume Soul, ravenous breath, or vicious criticals. A ravener who goes more than a week without successfully using Consume Soul to feed on a dying creature starves, and their soul ward loses [[/r {1d4}[healing]]]{1d4 Hit Points} each day until they feed. If the ravener's soul ward loses all its Hit Points while the ravener still has more than 1 HP, they become a ravener husk.

v8A5DhitrEJIAAL1.name: Consume Soul
v8A5DhitrEJIAAL1.description:
DC 44

触发 A living creature within 30 feet of the ravener dies

效果 The ravener tears the creature's soul from its body with their maw and gulps it down. The dying creature must attempt a Fortitude save with the same DC as the ravener's Breath Weapon.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The ravener tears off a small chunk of the creature's soul. If the victim is restored to life, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} in addition to any other side effects of returning to life. The ravener adds a number of Hit Points to their soul ward equal to half the creature's level.

失败 As success, but the creature's soul is ravaged. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3} and the ravener adds a number of Hit Points to their soul ward equal to the creature's level.

大失败 As failure, but the ravener devours the entire soul. The victim can't be restored to life as long as the ravener exists except via a 10th-level effect such as miracle or wish, and the ravener adds a number of Hit Points to their soul ward equal to twice the creature's level.

RwVJwyaaTesWbfgR.name: Manipulate Flames
RwVJwyaaTesWbfgR.description: The ravener attempts to take control of a magical fire or a fire spell within 100 feet. If it succeeds at a counteract check (counteract level 10, counteract modifier +34), the original caster loses control of the spell or magical fire, control is transferred to the ravener, and this action counts as the ravener having Sustained the Spell with the action (if applicable). The ravener can choose to end the spell instead of taking control, if they choose.

uMVIaXXt18rDrOPn.name: Ravenous Breath Weapon
uMVIaXXt18rDrOPn.description:
The ravener breathes a blast of flame that deals [[/r {20d6}[fire]]]{20d6火焰伤害} plus [[/r {4d6}[persistent,negative]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续负能量伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:44|basic:true] save). A creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} on a critical failure). If a creature is drained by the ravener's Ravenous Breath Weapon, the ravener's soul ward gains 5 HP.

The ravener can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

kGZni5n9AHCuIa7c.name: Vicious Criticals
kGZni5n9AHCuIa7c.description:
The ravener treats an attack roll as a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20, as long as the attack roll was a success. Additionally, whenever the ravener makes a critical hit with one of their Strikes, the target must succeed on a Fortitude save or gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} condition. If the target already has a drained value of greater than 0, their drained value instead increases by 1, to a maximum of drained 4.

Whenever the ravener applies drain to a creature in this way, their soul ward gains 5 Hit Points.

Ravener Husk.name: Ravener Husk
Ravener Husk.publicNotes: Raveners require a steady diet of souls, and a ravener that's unable to feed for too long eventually cannibalizes their own soul. Should a ravener's soul ward ever be reduced to 0 Hit Points by hunger while the ravener has more than 1 Hit Point (see Soul Ward), they lose all traces of their former identity and descend into a feral, nearly mindless state. Even if a ravener husk later consumes soul energy, the transformation can be reversed only via Ravenous Repast.

mZb7eFQ1yel73da5.name: Soulsense
mZb7eFQ1yel73da5.description: A ravener senses the spiritual essence of living and undead creatures within the listed range. Creatures whose material bodies are one unit with their souls, like celestials and fiends, appear brighter to this sense.

tjcUq4Pdk5hq6KqX.name: Boneshatter
tjcUq4Pdk5hq6KqX.description:
触发 The ravener husk takes any amount of bludgeoning damage

效果 The ravener's brittle bones shatter, spraying bone shards everywhere. Every creature within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] of the ravener husk takes [[/r {7d6}[piercing]]]{7d6穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true] save).

xmBUGoRIvL3UEoqs.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
xmBUGoRIvL3UEoqs.description:
The ravener husk breathes a torrent of negative energy that deals [[/r {16d6}[negative]]]{16d6负能量伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:40] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true] save).

它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

VN24JoB39HXPdS3r.name: Ravenous Repast
VN24JoB39HXPdS3r.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The ravener husk makes a jaws Strike against a deceased creature that has been dead no longer than 1 minute, was good aligned, and was at least level 15 in life. The ravener attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check; if successful, they transform back into a ravener with 1 Hit Point in their soul ward.

Red Dracolisk.name: Red Dracolisk
Red Dracolisk.publicNotes: Dracolisks are rare magical crossbreeds of chromatic dragons and basilisks. None now know how they first came to be, but they have proven viable and can breed with one another as well as with basilisks. While a dracolisk appears much like a young true dragon of its parent type, its eight legs are an immediate indication that it is something more. Its coloration varies, depending on the nature of its draconic ancestry, though it's lighter on its underside and darker near its wing tips. A typical dracolisk is 15 feet long and weighs 3,000 pounds.
Red Dracolisk.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30尺

4au76ROiAjb1dHdY.name: Draconic Resistance
4au76ROiAjb1dHdY.description: A dracolisk has resistance 10 to the type of damage it produces with its breath weapon.

zLE5uQwBNSB8wfkR.name: Petrifying Glance
zLE5uQwBNSB8wfkR.description:
触发 A creature within 30 feet that the dracolisk can see starts its turn

效果 The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save. If it fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 minute as its body stiffens.

cVEH8toDyk2cQnEC.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
cVEH8toDyk2cQnEC.description:
The dracolisk breathes a gout of energy based on its draconic heritage, as noted below. This breath weapon deals [[/r {6d10}[fire]]]{6d10火焰伤害}, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true] save.

The dracolisk can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Red @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of fire

W86zITZjQ9sKIM3N.name: Petrifying Gaze
W86zITZjQ9sKIM3N.description:
The dracolisk stares at a creature it can see within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save. If it fails and has not already been slowed by Petrifying Glance or this ability, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}. If the creature already was slowed by this ability or Petrifying Glance, a failed save causes the creature to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified} permanently.

A creature petrified in this manner can be instantly restored to flesh by being coated (not just splashed) with fresh dracolisk or basilisk blood no more than 1 hour old. A single dracolisk contains enough blood to coat [[/r 1d4+2 #Medium creatures]] Medium creatures in this manner.

PWBjM1JecEFdjzo0.name: Savage Jaws
PWBjM1JecEFdjzo0.description: The dracolisk makes a single Strike with its jaws. If the attack hits, it deals [[/r {4d12+16}[piercing]]]{4d12+16穿刺伤害} (versatile S). This counts as two attacks for its multiple attack penalty.

Reef Octopus.name: Reef Octopus
Reef Octopus.publicNotes: The common reef octopus is a risky but valuable catch for coastal fishers.

B7bDAaNEMatWBkDD.name: Camouflage
B7bDAaNEMatWBkDD.description: The reef octopus can change the color of its skin to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide} even if it doesn't have cover.

g3Gb5EYfu1jFqndC.name: Ink Cloud
g3Gb5EYfu1jFqndC.description:
The reef octopus emits a cloud of dark-brown ink in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]. This cloud has no effect outside of water. Creatures inside the cloud are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} and can't use their sense of smell. The cloud dissipates after 1 minute.

The octopus can't use Ink Cloud again for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮}.

loahwrlFxvmp2CXy.name: Jet
loahwrlFxvmp2CXy.description: The reef octopus moves up to 80 feet in a straight line through the water without triggering reactions.

sUall0U5UbL2KkEE.name: Reef Octopus Venom
sUall0U5UbL2KkEE.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} and Flat-Footed (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害} and Flat-Footed (1轮)

u58XzFLTCWAEQCJN.name: Writhing Arms
u58XzFLTCWAEQCJN.description: The reef octopus makes up to four arm Strikes with different arms, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the octopus's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all of its attacks.

Revenant.name: Revenant
Revenant.publicNotes: Revenants are obsessed, undead stalkers who arise from their own murders and are driven by only one thing: revenge against their killers. The common wisdom is that revenants arise only from individuals who have been utterly betrayed or abandoned to die a grueling death, but even then such victims might not rise from their graves. In other cases, revenants might even rise from what might legitimately be considered an accident if the revenant doesn't understand the full circumstances of their demise. In such cases, it doesn't matter that the "murderer" may not have intended to kill, for revenants understands no pity and can never forgive. Revenants have little memory of their lives other than anything they might need to recall in order to achieve their goal of vengeance.
Revenant.languages: Any One Spoken in Life by Their Murderer

NJS22AHrPTckdEPS.name: Sense Murderer
NJS22AHrPTckdEPS.description: A revenant knows the direction of their murderer (as long as both are on the same plane), but not the distance.

Hn5PgfCFMwbKdN20.name: Self-Loathing
Hn5PgfCFMwbKdN20.description:
If a revenant sees their own reflection or any object that was important to them in life, they must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

大成功 The revenant is unaffected and can no longer be affected by that reflection or object in this way.

成功 The revenant is distracted by self-loathing and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round.

失败 The revenant becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} by the source that triggered their self-loathing and does everything they can to destroy it until the end of the revenant's next turn.

大失败 The revenant becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} as long as the source of their self-loathing is apparent, until they're attacked, or until they see their murderer.

nPZlZs1rfnERketf.name: Undying Vendetta
nPZlZs1rfnERketf.description: If the revenant's murderer dies, the revenant is immediately destroyed. A revenant that can't sense their murderer must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] check once every 24 hours to avoid becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}; they immediately rise again once they can sense their murderer. A murderer who becomes undead does not trigger the revenant's destruction until the murderer is finally destroyed. The revenant gains a +2 status bonus to checks and DCs against their murderer.

azVkPps7BUkHzups.name: Baleful Shriek
azVkPps7BUkHzups.description:
The revenant wails horribly. Each creature within a @Template[type:burst|distance:60] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:23] save. Regardless of the outcome of their saving throw, affected creatures are then immune to Baleful Shriek for 1 hour. The revenant's murderer never improves their degree of success due to this ability's incapacitation trait.

The revenant can't use Baleful Shriek again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3} and paralyzed for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Rhinoceros.name: Rhinoceros
Rhinoceros.publicNotes: Rhinoceroses are short-tempered, territorial, and easily startled, and these traits combined with their innate ferocity means their natural instinct when disturbed is to attack. When intruders disturb or surprise rhinoceroses, the animals respond by charging directly at the interlopers and then lashing out with their mighty horns.

OeHuAJLeUtdJFHfo.name: Rhinoceros Charge
OeHuAJLeUtdJFHfo.description: The rhinoceros Strides twice, then makes a horn Strike. As long as the rhinoceros moved at least 20尺, the Strike's damage increases to [[/r {3d8+6}[piercing]]]{3d8+6穿刺伤害}. A Medium or smaller creature struck by this attack must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21] save or be automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoved} back 5 feet and knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} by the force of the blow.

Sacristan.name: Sacristan
Sacristan.publicNotes: Sacristans are failures among the velstracs, creatures whose bodies and minds have been utterly broken by the velstracs' torments. These unfortunates are assembled from scrap metal, nerveless flesh, and bits of darkness into loyal agents who take ecstatic pleasure in serving other velstracs. Sacristans are empowered by a miniature gateway to the Shadow Plane deep in their mouths. By distending their jaws, they can howl with the shrieks and windstorms of that plane. Sacristans vary in appearance but are the size of maimed humans. Their features are redundant or absent and they are wrapped in barbed and rusted chains.
Sacristan.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

qBIJw1s6aIrNQQaJ.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

urEbuoDUEyOj6f0A.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

ulrrbkt4l6SBi1z8.name: Painsight
ulrrbkt4l6SBi1z8.description: A velstrac automatically knows whether a creature it sees has any of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} conditions, as well as the value of those conditions

fuxGM2FMqoHqXPJ4.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

kCNQjJs87QDFBoGR.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

9UD8fQB0IDkl7w1X.name: Staggering Servitude
9UD8fQB0IDkl7w1X.description:
30 feet.

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it sees a vision of the sacristan groveling in pitiable servitude. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}.

tRLWCHj0DJ8Jb78B.name: Focus Gaze
tRLWCHj0DJ8Jb78B.description: The sacristan stares at a creature they can see within 30 feet. The creature must immediately attempt a Will save against Staggering Servitude. In addition, if the creature was already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}, on a failed save its revulsion toward the sacristan's presence causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for 1 minute. After attempting this save, the creature is then temporarily immune until the start of the sacristan's next turn.

ZwOinMaTzmRM28rJ.name: Shadow Scream
ZwOinMaTzmRM28rJ.description:
频率 once per hour

效果 The sacristan opens their mouth to unloose the wailing howls and mind-twisting darkness of the Shadow Plane. This creates a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] of darkness and wailing sounds around the sacristan. Creatures with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.qCCLZhnp2HhP3Ex6]{Darkvision} can't see through this darkness. The sacristan can Sustain Shadow Scream for up to 1 minute. Non-velstrac creatures in the area when the ability is used, as well as those who enter or start their turn in the area, must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:28|traits:damaging-effect] save.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for 1 round.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} and deafened for 1 round.

大失败 The creature takes [[/r {20}[mental]]]{20心灵伤害}, and is confused and deafened for 1 round.

Sandpoint Devil.name: Sandpoint Devil
Sandpoint Devil.publicNotes:
While some creatures have been fused to create a new entity that's graceful and beautiful, the Sandpoint Devil is the opposite. It has the hooves and body of a powerful horse, but it walks on its hind legs in a perverse parody of a humanoid gait. Its equine face has been distorted and elongated with skeletal, yellowed fangs and milky eyes. The pox-spotted hide along the creature's back bears a draconic tail with dark, spiny plates and two torn, bat-like wings.

The legendary Sandpoint Devil appears only on moonless nights when mists gather around the coast. Most encounters end with missing livestock or children, with little left behind other than oddly placed hoofprints that reek of brimstone.
Sandpoint Devil.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Sandpoint Devil.senses: 高等黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

CApABKQSTABj5rMd.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

92vCOzCAnkOL6uGy.name: 造风术(随意施法) Gust of Wind (At will)
92vCOzCAnkOL6uGy.description:
一团暴风从你的掌中喷出，从你施放法术时所在位置直吹到线形终点。这团风吹灭所有小的非魔法火焰，吹散云和雾，吹起负载轻或者更低的物体，并且会推动更大的物体。区域中大型或者更小的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。在之后进入风中的大型或者更小的生物也必须在进入时尝试该豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物无法顶风移动。

失败 该生物 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。如果它在飞行，它改为承受大失败效果。

大失败 该生物被沿风向推离30尺，倒地，并且承受2d6钝击伤害。

h3krrxTbAiZjVs8m.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

GL5oMe9C6pcXxqcU.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

xcs2mYc8h9YshZle.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

QuXauTCFwPyxjFZ6.name: Accursed Breath
QuXauTCFwPyxjFZ6.description:
The Sandpoint Devil breathes a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of flame that deals [[/r {6d10}[fire]]]{6d10火焰伤害}. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|traits:damaging-effect] save.

The Sandpoint Devil can't use Accursed Breath for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} by the agonizing pain of its burns.

大失败 The creature takes full damage and is cursed. The victim's flesh appears charred and burned, and the pain of being burned alive never fully vanishes. The cursed creature takes a -2 status penalty to all checks from the constant pain. Healing doesn't alter the appearance of the burns or lessen the penalty, but removing the curse does.

1gwUpyZY3w0LloLq.name: Devil's Howl
1gwUpyZY3w0LloLq.description:
The Sandpoint Devil unleashes a bloodcurdling howl that can be heard for miles. Each creature within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100] must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3} and fleeing as long as it remains frightened on a critical failure).

Creatures that attempt this Will save are then immune to Devil's Howl for 24 hours.

Sard.name: Sard
Sard.publicNotes: An immense, gnarled, tree awoken with raw, primal power by one of the fey Eldest of the First World, this monster-one of the legendary Tane-skitters on huge, spidery roots and thrashes its branches as fiery lightning courses within its blackened bark, a living manifestation of the violent clash between ancient forest and stormy sky.
Sard.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

OKh9LnvuAtiEOz1f.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

qUW0IwnKj9NAkPZu.name: 操控天气(不需要次要施法者) Control Weather (Doesn't require secondary casters)
qUW0IwnKj9NAkPZu.description:
你改变了天气，让它变得平静并更符合当前季节，或者根据季节来选择两种效果。

你无法细致地控制这些气象，比如龙卷风的确切行进路线或者雷电落在哪里。

  • 秋季 Autumn 凉爽（cold weather），雾（fog），炎热（mild heat），霰（sleet）
  • 春季 Spring 细雨（drizzle），高温（heat），飓风（hurricane），霰（sleet），雷暴雨（thunderstorm），龙卷风（tornado）
  • 夏季 Summer 细雨（drizzle），大雨（downpour），炽热（extreme heat），冰雹（hail），高温（heat）
  • 冬季 Winter 暴风雪（blizzard），寒（mild cold），极寒（extreme cold），融雪（thaw）

大成功 你能够根据需要改变天气，并且能够影响更远的区域（至多半径5英里的圆形区域）、或者让仪式持续时间更长（任意数量个额外d12小时，至多为16d12）。

成功 你能够根据需要改变天气。

失败 你没能根据需要改变天气。

大失败 天气以一种意想不到的方式产生了变化，变化方式由GM决定，不过通常会与你的真实愿望相悖（比如当你想要好天气的时候，会出现极强的风暴）。

升阶 (9环级) 你能够制造出不合时节的天气以及矛盾的气候效果，比如极端寒冷和飓风。你能够把气候变为对于其他季节来说平静且正常的样子，或者从任意季节列表中选取天气效果。

G2PIvLQqH98WKNaK.name: Planar Acclimation
G2PIvLQqH98WKNaK.description: The sard treats the plane it is located on as its home plane.

KQ5qTss6bA4fQLVK.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

FFRvTDGH1FEnAKjH.name: Splintering Death
FFRvTDGH1FEnAKjH.description: When the sard dies, its body explodes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. All creatures in the area take [[/r {10d6}[electricity]]]{10d6电击伤害} and [[/r {10d6}[piercing]]]{10d6穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true] save). Any creature that takes piercing damage is also exposed to sard venom.

UE4WlNSLrotRauZG.name: Lightning-Struck Curse
UE4WlNSLrotRauZG.description:
触发 The sard is about to damage a creature that has electricity resistance

效果 An instant before the target takes the electricity damage from the triggering event, the sard's electrical sparks glow red. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:41] save or lose any electricity resistance it has until this curse is lifted.

R2a5AYr0RbUoKiK3.name: Sard Venom
R2a5AYr0RbUoKiK3.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6电击伤害}, [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {3d6}[electricity]]]{3d6电击伤害}, [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {4d6}[electricity]]]{4d6电击伤害}, [[/r {4d6}[poison]]]{4d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} (1轮)

LXMgaHhqx5CpVHAu.name: Thorn Volley
LXMgaHhqx5CpVHAu.description: The sard makes up to four thorn Strikes, each against a different target. The sard's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks have been made.

Sarglagon.name: Sarglagon
Sarglagon.publicNotes:
Sarglagons dwell in Hell's myriad waterways, lakes, and oceans. They serve as guardians of the Academy of Lies-the repository of secrets in Stygia, the fifth layer of Hell. Sarglagons breathe water and air with equal ease, and can move through water, land, and even air with uncanny swiftness. Few fiends travel the waterways of the multiverse, but where a river crosses the planes, odds are sarglagons have traveled it to further their infernal machinations. The only body of water they avoid is the River Styx, as the fiends have yet to develop any defense against that waterway's memory-sapping qualities. Mortal spellcasters sometimes bind sarglagons as guardians of precious secrets or treasures, particularly in aquatic areas. Most strangely, sarglagons sometimes act as unnerving caretakers to mortals who have no idea what they did to earn their unwanted protectors' attention. The constant uninvited vigilance of these devils is often disturbing and stifling to their wards.

Each type of devil plays a particular role in Hell's bureaucracies and hierarchies, though some have far more specialized functions than others.
Sarglagon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Sarglagon.senses: 高等黑暗视觉; see invisibility

xxK8rXRDWK5Rwj9i.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

mxpkzQTw0tzSwaUL.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
mxpkzQTw0tzSwaUL.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

oIJY4ycXpaF4IjIM.name: 识破隐形(恒定法术) See Invisibility (Constant)
oIJY4ycXpaF4IjIM.description:
你能看见 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{法术效果：识破隐形}

BMv1jkvT4dSbEL8X.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

GoYV1mj4XKxDiBOM.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

tqSmdxFVDmY2CLns.name: Heavy Aura
tqSmdxFVDmY2CLns.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature that enters the heavy aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:23] save. It is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} while it remains in the area. If the creature is already encumbered, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} while it remains within the aura.

大失败 As failure, but the effect persists for 3 rounds after leaving the aura.

myXt3SwrT2L8VMW4.name: Stygian Guardian
myXt3SwrT2L8VMW4.description:
触发 A creature or object within the sarglagon's reach is targeted by an attack

效果 The sarglagon interposes themself, giving the creature or object @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Standard Cover} against the attack (+2 circumstance bonus to AC), or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Greater Cover} (+4 circumstance bonus to AC) if the sarglagon was already granting it lesser cover.

nBbFutvNlcdf1cgZ.name: Drown
nBbFutvNlcdf1cgZ.description:
The sarglagon conjures murky water to fill the lungs of a creature that can't breathe water within 30 feet. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save.

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target coughs up water and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

失败 The target is holding its breath. The only action it can take is to attempt a Fortitude save against Drown to expel the water, which is a single action.

大失败 The target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} and begins suffocating. If the target succeeds at its Fortitude save while suffocating, it coughs up the water and can breathe again.

5Vw9VTB3I1sie1g1.name: Sarglagon Venom
5Vw9VTB3I1sie1g1.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1[[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2[[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

Scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
Scarecrow.publicNotes:
A ramshackle collection of materials in a human shape, the scarecrow construct is indistinguishable from a normal scarecrow until it slowly creaks to life. As it animates, its carved pumpkin or sackcloth face bursts into eldritch flame, sending fear creeping into the air around it. Each scarecrow is handcrafted and unique in its appearance, though most are 5 to 6 feet tall and constructed of a combination of wood, cloth, rope, straw, sawdust, discarded husks and cobs, and similar materials, all dressed in ragged pastoral garments. This rudimentary construction makes a scarecrow somewhat fragile, prone to snapping limbs in the crush of battle. Yet its structure is adaptable, allowing it to reshape another piece of itself into a clawed limb or grip a severed portion of itself to swat at its foes.

When a scarecrow is created, it must be anointed with a drop of its creator's blood into each of its eyes. This blood soaks into the material and siphons a tiny sliver of the creator's soul away-not enough to harm the creator, but more than enough to imbue the scarecrow with an instinctive intellect that allows it to follow commands as eagerly as a well-trained guard dog. When a scarecrow is destroyed, the blood leaks back out from its eyes, but the portion of the creator's soul never returns.

TAIcUgt3JKg5c7fV.name: Scarecrow's Leer
TAIcUgt3JKg5c7fV.description:
40 feet.

The scarecrow's eyes flicker with an unnerving glow. A creature can't reduce its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} condition below 1 as long as it is in the aura's emanation. When a creature enters or starts its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:18] save. Birds and other avian creatures take a -2 circumstance penalty to this save.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} by the scarecrow until the end of its next turn.

大失败 As failure, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}.

1V1IFVEwiJA8p72B.name: Baleful Glow
1V1IFVEwiJA8p72B.description: The scarecrow's head bursts into ghostly, heatless flame that sheds bright light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] and dim light to the next 20 feet). If the scarecrow uses this ability on the first round of combat, any creature that has not acted yet is startled and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the scarecrow for 1 round. It can suppress the light by using this action again.

oYtncLyCKuBAQThk.name: Clawing Fear
oYtncLyCKuBAQThk.description: The scarecrow's strikes deal an additional [[/r {1d6}[mental]]]{1d6心灵伤害} to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} creatures.

NTWIBx9lvUwV7F1W.name: Mundane Appearance
NTWIBx9lvUwV7F1W.description: Until it acts, the scarecrow resembles an ordinary scarecrow. It has an automatic result of 32 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as an ordinary scarecrow.

Sceaduinar.name: Sceaduinar
Sceaduinar.publicNotes:
Strange creatures born from jagged crystals in the heart of the Negative Energy Plane, sceaduinar are fueled by its negative energy and driven to extinguish all life. Resembling crystalline gargoyles with serrated limbs and sharp, bat-like faces, sceaduinar stand about 7 feet tall and weigh around 100 pounds.

These malevolent beings sometimes gather in great packs of their own kind. Despite their intelligence, they act like cunning, feral beasts for the most part, though they occasionally build tools to aid them in extinguishing life. Sceaduinar sail through the great voids of their home plane, seeking to destroy any sparks of life that find their way into that deadly realm-even the twisted sparks found in undead creatures.

When they discover portals to other planes, sceaduinar swarm through in great numbers, slaughtering all they come across. While dwelling outside the Negative Energy plane is uncomfortable for sceaduinar, they can exist for extended periods of time apart from their home.
