Of course, the feeling of a plane where negative energy isn't the rule doesn't improve these creatures' attitude, and as a result, they tend to be particularly cruel and violent when encountered in such realms.
Sceaduinar.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

9AHoo6l3g2enrpEz.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

pwHxPg0sBxXkBROU.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

sGGppAnKyKB4kipq.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

bJVD9JQb7YrlkdAs.name: Void Child
bJVD9JQb7YrlkdAs.description: Sceaduinars have neither souls nor the ability to create. A sceaduinar is immune to effects that target a soul (such as bind soul or resurrect) or that require knowledge of a creature's identity (such as scrying), and critically fails Crafting checks.

pXVSNEwIRE2uBaw6.name: Wing Flash
pXVSNEwIRE2uBaw6.description:
触发 A creature attempts a melee attack against a sceaduinar or an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} the sceaduinar's space

效果 The sceaduinar flexes its wings to emit a brief pulse of negative energy that deals [[/r {4d6}[negative]]]{4d6负能量伤害} to the triggering creature (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true] save).

H3y3IbgMpQWevqRk.name: Drain Life
H3y3IbgMpQWevqRk.description:
When the sceaduinar damages a living creature with its jaws Strike, the sceaduinar gains 5 temporary Hit Points and the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}.

Further damage dealt to the creature by the sceaduinar increases the drained value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

SNtv0J2CRa2RFhi9.name: Entropic Touch
SNtv0J2CRa2RFhi9.description: Negative damage dealt by a sceaduinar damages undead and creatures with negative healing as if it were positive damage. The sceaduinar's melee Strikes have the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch} property rune on attacks against incorporeal undead.

Scythe Tree.name: Scythe Tree
Scythe Tree.publicNotes:
Malevolent, vicious, and cruel, scythe trees pose as normal trees near deep forest paths, where they wait to slaughter passersby. Instead of drawing sustenance from light and soil, scythe trees gorge themselves on the flesh, blood, and bone of sapient creatures. Nothing is more delectable to scythe trees than a kind-hearted gnome or an altruistic dryad who believes that a scythe tree can be redeemed. The screams and whimpers of these victims are music to these cruel plants and add an extra dimension of flavor to the meal.

Scythe trees are solitary creatures by nature, and their size and power mean that they don't need to compete for food with other carnivorous plants. Once food sources dwindle in an area, scythe trees move on to another location. When a scythe tree dwells in a location for many months or years, it leaves traces of its bark and roots in the soil. Over time, these blood-nourished fragments might grow into a new scythe tree, but the progenitor will most likely have already moved on to new hunting grounds long before the new scythe tree reaches maturity.

Scythe trees appear as dead or dying deciduous trees with long, twisted branches that end in scythe-like blades. These carnivorous plants have dark-brown bark that is nearly black near the bottom of the trunk and rusty brown leaves that remain attached year-round. Scythe trees' disturbing mouths remain closed when not eating, appearing as a jagged gash on the trunk. When scythe trees deign to speak, their voices are rough, deep, and mocking, particularly when discussing arboreals, whom scythe trees universally find to be insufferable and worthy of little more than being hacked to pieces.

VyJyNz5V3NR5Gylr.name: Axe Vulnerability 5
VyJyNz5V3NR5Gylr.description: A scythe tree takes 5 additional damage from axes.

ALbbJNuSFbicqOfo.name: Ripping Disarm
ALbbJNuSFbicqOfo.description:
触发 A creature rolls a critical failure on a melee weapon Strike against the scythe tree

效果 The scythe tree attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the creature.

hFDR91zB1cjh1UHv.name: Dead Tree
hFDR91zB1cjh1UHv.description: Until the scythe tree acts, it appears to be a dead tree. It has an automatic result of 35 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as a dead tree.

XCr9jxxE59Egb2R1.name: Woodland Ambush
XCr9jxxE59Egb2R1.description:
需求 The scythe tree is using Dead Tree in forested terrain, and a creature that hasn't detected it is within 30 feet

效果 The scythe tree Strides up to 25 feet toward the triggering creature. Once the creature is in reach, the scythe tree makes a scythe branch Strike against it. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against this Strike.

Sea Drake.name: Sea Drake
Sea Drake.publicNotes:
Long and slender, sea drakes have fins down the length of their backs and webbing between their talons, making them just as adapted for gliding through ocean waves as the skies above. More solitary than most drakes, they hunt and live alone. Although most sea drakes make their roosts high on ocean-facing cliffs, it isn't unheard of for them to dwell in underwater caves, living entirely aquatic lives.

Distant cousins to dragons, drakes menace and terrorize settlements.
Sea Drake.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

Hsh9yw0IW6kN2n8t.name: Electrified Blood
Hsh9yw0IW6kN2n8t.description:
触发 An adjacent creature deals piercing or slashing damage to the sea drake

效果 An arc of electricity courses through the sea drake's blood. The triggering creature takes [[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6电击伤害}.

hTuKXeGWvUSUobx7.name: Ball Lightning Breath
hTuKXeGWvUSUobx7.description:
The sea drake spews a ball of electricity that strikes a primary target within 100尺, dealing [[/r {7d6}[electricity]]]{7d6电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save). The lightning then arcs to up to three secondary targets within 30 feet of the primary target, striking the closest available targets first. The secondary bolts each strike one secondary target and deal the same rolled damage value as the primary bolt (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true] save).

The sea drake can't use Ball Lightning Breath again for [[/br 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6轮}.

iWYCpNJjdadjk8JX.name: Briny Wound
iWYCpNJjdadjk8JX.description:
A sea drake's saliva carries a large quantity of salt, making its bite wounds even more painful. When a creature takes damage from a sea drake's jaws Strike, the creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save; the creature is then temporarily immune to briny wound for 1 minute.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}.

大失败 The creature is Sickened 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} as long as it's sickened.

uhW4OwaKUkyMz6W3.name: 倾覆 Capsize
uhW4OwaKUkyMz6W3.description: The drake tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. The drake must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 25 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the drake) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

gBFFibeJFk4MB72C.name: Draconic Frenzy
gBFFibeJFk4MB72C.description: The sea drake makes one jaws Strike and two tail Strikes in any order.

AbCU1QPQN43QSP6d.name: Speed Surge
AbCU1QPQN43QSP6d.description:
频率 three times per day

效果 The sea drake Strides, Flies, or Swims twice.

Sea Snake.name: Sea Snake
Sea Snake.publicNotes: These lithe snakes like to frequent the shallow waters of tropical seas. Their 4-foot-long, blue-green bodies easily blend into the water where they lurk to ambush prey. Tales speak of massive sea snakes that swim in deeper waters and follow ships, waiting for sailors to fall overboard or climbing the side to snatch them from the deck.
Sea Snake.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

Dax6qfY1KhJqryzV.name: Deep Breath
Dax6qfY1KhJqryzV.description: The sea snake can hold its breath for about an hour.

Qhdl7tHPD3bhAihm.name: Lash Out
Qhdl7tHPD3bhAihm.description:
触发 A creature within the sea snake's reach uses a move action

效果 The sea snake makes a bite Strike against the attacker.

QoOV8oVWiooAilxA.name: Sea Snake Venom
QoOV8oVWiooAilxA.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

Shadow Drake.name: Shadow Drake
Shadow Drake.publicNotes: Shadow drakes are typically among the smallest and least powerful of their species. Most stand as tall and long as house cats and have charcoal-colored scales and membranous wings just translucent enough to pass for shadows. Attracted to shiny materials, they employ deception, teamwork, and even rudimentary traps to create opportunities to make off with ill-gotten gains. Shadow drakes have a particular fascination and admiration for umbral dragons-a notable exception to the norm for drakes and dragons.
Shadow Drake.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

QNy9Hrx2ib5tkQKt.name: Shadow Blend
QNy9Hrx2ib5tkQKt.description: The shadow drake's form shifts and blends reflexively with surrounding shadows. A shadow drake gains an additional reaction each round, but it can use this reaction only for Shadow Evade.

0VNX7MbrCqRSKYkE.name: Shadow Evade
0VNX7MbrCqRSKYkE.description:
触发 A creature attacks the shadow drake while it is in an area of dim light

效果 The shadow drake further obscures its position. The attacker must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] check in order to affect the shadow drake, as if the drake were @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} for the triggering attack.

wnZi8QCOMG86Db4l.name: Draconic Frenzy
wnZi8QCOMG86Db4l.description: The shadow drake makes one bite Strike and two tail Strikes in any order.

usIKpszaYrCWfN8r.name: Shadow Breath
usIKpszaYrCWfN8r.description:
A shadow drake spits a ball of black liquid that explodes into a cloud of frigid black shadow. This attack has a range of 40 feet and explodes in a 5-foot-radius burst. Creatures within the burst take [[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true] save). The explosion of shadow also snuffs out mundane light sources the size of a torch, lantern, or smaller, and attempts to counteract magical light with a +10 counteract modifier.

The shadow drake can't use Shadow Breath again for [[/r 1d6]] rounds.

5IixHzakyftZgS0g.name: Speed Surge
5IixHzakyftZgS0g.description:
频率 three times per day

效果 The shadow drake Strides or Flies twice.

Shoal Linnorm.name: Shoal Linnorm
Shoal Linnorm.publicNotes: Shoal linnorms occupy rocky shoreline shallows and slither along lonely coastlines. While they do not intentionally seek out large settlements, these linnorms nonetheless beleaguer fishers headed out from small coastal towns, and they may even follow skiffs back to their home port to appraise the town's defenses and plan a raid. Shoal linnorms tend to hunt large prey, both underwater and on land. Their preferred quarries includes giant squid and grizzly bears-meals rich in fat, which the linnorms metabolize into the fiery steam that courses through their veins.
Shoal Linnorm.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值
Shoal Linnorm.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)60尺, true seeing

QbjjKmqSkCf93Xw5.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

C3660uLElTZLdhwb.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
C3660uLElTZLdhwb.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

lIhRNM5msYgcZJCL.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
lIhRNM5msYgcZJCL.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

Q6Z6sPX8M68AUOXI.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

UuDDHSI5hH9lHpZv.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

2oTY3Ohbh0C59vOv.name: Curse of Drowning
2oTY3Ohbh0C59vOv.description: When a creature slays a shoal linnorm, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:38] save or become cursed. As long as the curse of drowning persists, the character must spend 3 actions when drinking any liquid. Attempting to drink liquid faster causes the victim to begin drowning, immediately running out of air and falling unconscious.

CThMS3QhSA3Obh7Z.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
CThMS3QhSA3Obh7Z.description:
The shoal linnorm exhales scalding steam that deals [[/r {12d8}[fire]]]{12d8火焰伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:36|basic:true] save). The steam lingers until the end of the linnorm's next turn; anyone who enters the area or begins their turn in the area takes [[/r {6d8}[fire]]]{6d8火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:36|traits:damaging-effect] save negates). During this time, the steam is so thick that it impedes movement as well as sight, turning the area into difficult terrain. All creatures in the steam become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}, and all creatures outside the steam become concealed to creatures within it.

The shoal linnorm can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

hREXXxR78zjxAtPW.name: Shoal Linnorm Venom
hREXXxR78zjxAtPW.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 [[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6火焰伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6火焰伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮).

Shocker Lizard.name: Shocker Lizard
Shocker Lizard.publicNotes:
These brightly colored reptiles share the rough size and pack mentality of guard dogs, roaming in small groups. Shocker lizards have specialized glands under their scales that accumulate static electricity, and they can unleash blasts of lightning strong enough to harm significantly larger foes. Though they're meek and docile when encountered alone, shocker lizards are significantly more aggressive in packs, when they can amplify each other's electrical attacks.

Shocker lizards are notoriously difficult to domesticate because they're dangerously hostile as part of a pack, but will also swiftly wither and die if kept alone in captivity without constant attention. A shocker lizard is 3 feet long and weighs 25 pounds.

6qDqRA2Nq93rsvx9.name: Greater Electrolocation
6qDqRA2Nq93rsvx9.description: A shocker lizard can sense minute electrical charges in living creatures, which it can use as a precise sense at a range of 20 feet. This distance increases to 100 feet against any creature that has used an electricity effect within the last minute.

le0p8FsNfX4jkVzn.name: Amplify Voltage
le0p8FsNfX4jkVzn.description:
触发 A shocker lizard within 20 feet makes a shock Strike or uses Discharge

效果 The shocker lizard lends some of its electrical power to the nearby lizard. This either causes the other lizard's shock Strike to lose the nonlethal trait or increases the DC of its Discharge to 20.

IPLCR3K5wWzQiSHK.name: Discharge
IPLCR3K5wWzQiSHK.description:
The shocker lizard releases a blast of lightning from its body. Creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] take [[/r {3d6}[electricity]]]{3d6电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true] save).

The shocker lizard can't use Discharge for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

JakacQ9SCpgoCpCp.name: Shocking Burst
JakacQ9SCpgoCpCp.description:
The shocker lizard hunkers down and begins to spark with electricity, which it releases in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] that deals [[/r {3d8}[electricity]]]{3d8电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true] save).

The shocker lizard can't use Shocking Burst again for 1 minute.

Up to four shocker lizards can combine their Shocking Bursts. In this case, the lizards can delay the release of their electricity until any other shocker lizard within 30 feet completes its Shocking Burst. The combined Shocking Bursts create an emanation with the combined area from all participating shocker lizards. For each additional shocker lizard that joins the burst, the damage increases by 3d8 and the save DC increases by 1 (to a maximum of four lizards dealing 12d8 damage with a DC 21 save).

Shoggti.name: Shoggti
Shoggti.publicNotes: Shoggti travel to other planes in roving bands to capture and charm victims, bringing them back to the Abyss where they are enslaved for unknown-but no doubt insidiously evil-purposes. These squid-like qlippoth have slick, blue skin and four suckered tentacles that end in dexterous pincers. In addition to a lamprey-like mouth at the base of its body, each has a secondary maw in the middle of its forehead that stretches from between its two bulging eyes to the back of its head.

8yvIS9Nt5mat9qnA.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

TI8XxzDQbTfM2D3M.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
TI8XxzDQbTfM2D3M.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

hwX8mlw73yOCgwYw.name: Braincloud
hwX8mlw73yOCgwYw.description: The shoggti caresses a creature with a tentacle and supernaturally erodes the creature's capability for thought as it does so. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}, with an unlimited duration. The target can attempt the save to remove the stupefied condition again 每天一次 when it makes its daily preparations.

KpGCXx2t9NN3a85q.name: Fascinating Display
KpGCXx2t9NN3a85q.description:
The shoggti writhes its tentacles and shifts its coloration to put on an unnaturally fascinating hypnotic display. Creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Fascinating Displays for 1 minute.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} for 1 minute. Once the fascination effect ends, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

大失败 The creature is fascinated for 1 minute, can't use reactions while fascinated, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} once the fascination ends.

Skaveling.name: Skaveling
Skaveling.publicNotes:
Hideous necromantic rituals give rise to skavelings, or ghoul bats, monstrosities that are not true ghouls but instead are specifically crafted undead creatures. Their creators are the bloodsucking urdefhans of the Darklands, who create skavelings from giant bats specially raised on diets of toxic fungus and the flesh of ghouls-especially brains harvested from these undead. Upon reaching maturity, these giant bats are ritually slain via the use of cytillesh oil. While this poison simply rots away the flesh of most creatures, one of these specially prepared bats will immediately rise from death as a skaveling after succumbing to its effects.

Despite its tattered wings and sagging skin, a skaveling is more than capable of flight, even when carrying a creature mounted on its back-urdefhans often use skavelings as mounts in this way. Their intelligence is more advanced than that of the typical giant bat, and in combat they function more as allies than as mere mounts, capable of making their own tactical decisions. Yet even though they can reason and think, skavelings remain loyal to the urdefhans who created them, and they never take actions in a fight that would knowingly put their masters in harm's way.

h35hRTaiSXOfVZFA.name: Echolocation
h35hRTaiSXOfVZFA.description: A skaveling can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range

x183YuDiYXsrOlKc.name: Bone-Chilling Screech
x183YuDiYXsrOlKc.description:
The skaveling unleashes a horrifying screech that chills the very bones of those close enough to feel it. The screech can be heard for miles, but each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] must also attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save.

The skaveling can't use Bone-Chilling Screech again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Bone- Chilling Screech for 24 hours.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}.

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} by fear.

aOFgYZJ7qXDOoWDH.name: Ghoul Fever
aOFgYZJ7qXDOoWDH.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

阶段1 carrier with no ill effect (1天)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6负能量伤害} and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1天)

阶段3 如阶段2 (1天)

阶段4 [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6负能量伤害} and gains no benefit from healing (1天)

阶段5 如阶段4 (1天)

阶段6 dead, and rises as a ghoul the next midnight

2doPyPIBLoDzjzk9.name: Paralysis
2doPyPIBLoDzjzk9.description:
Any creature hit by the skaveling's Strikes must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}.

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each save.

Skrik Nettle.name: Skrik Nettle
Skrik Nettle.publicNotes:
The expansive skies of the First World are home to skrik nettles-delicate, bizarre-looking creatures that resemble large jellyfishes. A fringe of brightly colored feathers circles their bodies, and long tendrils trail from their center, each ending in a snapping beak. Known for their eerie, chirping melodies, skrik nettles soar above the First World in flocks of a dozen or more, diligently scavenging for food in the fey realm's cutthroat ecosystem. When hunting or provoked, skrik nettles attack their foes by injecting them with a magical poison that causes the victim to float helplessly up into the sky. Skrik nettles continuously inject this poison into their helpless prey until it dies or is so high up that the skrik nettle needs only wait for the poison to end, its meal crashing helplessly to the ground below.

Skrik nettles that find their way to the Material Plane tend to be much more aggressive, for the planar energies that they find comforting and soothing on the First World are conspicuously absent. The first few minutes after a skrik nettle arrives on any plane but the First World tend to be filled with violence and fear, as the panicking creature lashes out at any nearby creatures in the mistaken notion that these others are somehow responsible for the discomforting change. After 10 minutes or so, assuming the skrik nettle survives its bout of violence, the creature calms down somewhat and does its best to acclimate to its new home. Yet even skrik nettles who find themselves marooned beyond the First World for years never lose their longing for home, and they instinctively seek out portals to this plane for the rest of their lives.

FKpHGfQVea81uMo2.name: Motionsense
FKpHGfQVea81uMo2.description: A flying skrik nettle can detect the movement of nearby creatures and objects from the tiny gusts of wind created by their movements. This is a precise sense at the listed range, but it works only against creatures and objects that moved through air in the previous round.

4CALESo8Bdrqe3vE.name: Spill Venom
4CALESo8Bdrqe3vE.description:
触发 The skrik nettle takes piercing or slashing damage

效果 The skrik nettle ejects its venom onto an adjacent creature. That creature is exposed to skrik nettle venom.

oAxtReNr1iwTRmKX.name: Negate Levitation
oAxtReNr1iwTRmKX.description: The skrik nettle attempts to counteract (with a modifier of +17) a single effect currently levitating a creature it can detect with its motionsense.

APChG7D4rcYDlQ8m.name: Skrik Nettle Venom
APChG7D4rcYDlQ8m.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} and levitate upward 5 feet (1轮)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} and levitate upward 10 feet (1轮)

A levitating creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls. It can spend an Interact action to stabilize itself and negate this penalty for the remainder of its turn. If it's adjacent to a fixed object or stable terrain, it can move across the surface by climbing (if the surface is vertical) or crawling (if the surface is horizontal, such as a ceiling).

A flying creature can move normally but still increases its altitude as appropriate from the venom. A creature that can't fly falls as soon as it recovers from skrik nettle venom.

Skulk.name: Skulk
Skulk.publicNotes:
The cowardly and lazy skulks live on the fringes of organized societies and steal from others without a second thought. Even murder is merely another necessity, and they think nothing of creeping into a house, dispatching the residents, and taking what they want.

Their chameleon-like ability to blend into their surroundings makes skulks difficult to detect, so their ever-present populations around the periphery of large settlements are nearly impossible to dislodge permanently. They typically travel in small groups of no more than 16 individuals, since groups larger than that tend to break into violence directed at one other. While skulks see themselves as sharing a common history of being cast out and hated, this is not a strong enough bond to hold large groups of the creatures together with a shared purpose for very long.

Entrances and exits from cities, especially less-guarded access ways around sewers and the like, are skulks' favorite stomping grounds. These sites allow them to closely observe who comes and goes from the city while also affording them swift escape options, should the authorities uncover their presence. On rare occasions, a well-disciplined skulk can rise to prominence within the local thieves' guild and become sought after for difficult jobs. Their repugnant personalities and overwhelming selfishness, however, usually means they are unable to secure long-lasting leadership roles.

A typical skulk is 6 feet tall with similar body structure to a gangly human. Skulks mature quickly and can live up to 50 years, although most meet a violent end long before then. The rare skulk who manages to escape their society of violence and craven bitterness can be of any alignment, but those skulks who remain bound by their traditions always see these self-imposed exiles as the worst kind of traitors, and the exiles are often targeted for eradication to the exclusion of all other victims. More than one band of skulks has accidentally engineered its own doom after throwing caution to the wind and exposing its existence to the authorities in an ill-planned but violently passionate attempt to track down such an exile.

HLOEvF4GMvQEPHct.name: Camouflaged Step
HLOEvF4GMvQEPHct.description: The skulk gains the benefit of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SB7cMECVtE06kByk]{Cover Tracks} action in forests and subterranean settings without moving at half Speed.

vMUHP7DevP54tmz4.name: Chameleon Skin
vMUHP7DevP54tmz4.description: The skulk's skin shifts and changes to match the surroundings. As long as most of their body is not covered by clothing or armor, the skulk gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide}.

gbsLwd2FBQal3xdZ.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
gbsLwd2FBQal3xdZ.description:
A skulk's Strikes deal an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Slime Mold.name: Slime Mold
Slime Mold.publicNotes:
A slime mold appears as a mound of earth and detritus covered in a thick layer of fungus that exudes a faint stink of decay. The fungus actually shares a symbiotic relationship with the slime mold, serving as an external digestive system while gaining access to the nutrients it needs. The ooze remains perfectly still until living prey passes within reach, then it lashes out with disgusting pseudopods. With a touch, a slime mold can infect its prey with a foul contagion known as slime rot, a horrific disease that painfully breaks down a victim's flesh. At first, the disease manifests as painful rashes and agonized joints. In the later stages, though, the flesh of the affected creature actually begins to liquefy and run in rivulets as the creature's spores continue to work. Death, when it occurs, swiftly causes the resulting body to split open and release a brand new slime mold.

Due to their bizarre physical structures and ability to break down and feed on a wide variety of materials, oozes are able to adapt to nearly any climate, especially when assisted by magical or alchemical tinkering. As a result, explorers frequently encounter new and terrifying varieties of these amorphous creatures.

IieLHPPUSUSDsN8d.name: 运动感知60尺
IieLHPPUSUSDsN8d.description: A slime mold can sense nearby creatures through vibration and air or water movement.

kkVojFishI8AxnVn.name: Slime Rot
kkVojFishI8AxnVn.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

Onset [[/br 1d4 #days]]{1d4 days}

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段2 如阶段1 (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} (1天)

阶段4 如阶段3 (1天)

阶段5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} (no Perception check to wake up) (1天)

阶段6 dead, and the body erupts to release a new slime mold

Snapping Turtle.name: Snapping Turtle
Snapping Turtle.publicNotes: Snapping turtles are freshwater reptiles with a long flexible neck, a sharp piercing beak, and a confrontational temperament that doesn't prevent some spellcasters from choosing these creatures as familiars. They weigh about 20 pounds and have shells around 18 inches in length.
Snapping Turtle.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官)30尺

P0EyFCnT4og9udgU.name: Deep Breath
P0EyFCnT4og9udgU.description: The snapping turtle can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

J4SHx8p5wCH9xlMo.name: Clench Jaws
J4SHx8p5wCH9xlMo.description:
需求 The snapping turtle damaged a creature with a jaws Strike in its previous action

效果 The snapping turtle clenches its jaws down and automatically deals an additional [[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4钝击伤害} to the creature it just bit.

E4bINR3oniilC0ba.name: Shell Defense
E4bINR3oniilC0ba.description: The snapping turtle retracts its limbs and head into its shell and ends its turn. This increases its AC to 18, but it can't act except to reemerge, which it can do as a single action.

Solar.name: Solar
Solar.publicNotes:
Solars are among the greatest of all angels, ranking just below empyreal lords. Many solars serve at the right hand of a deity or champion a cause that benefits an entire world. Most archangels resemble humanoids, but not all-they can adopt more unusual forms as needed. A typical solar is about 9 feet tall and weighs about 500 pounds, with a commanding voice that is impossible to ignore. Most have silvery or golden skin.

Solars are legendary trackers; the most masterful of them are said to be able to follow the centuries-old passage of a pit fiend flying through the Astral Plane.

Angels are benevolent messengers who aid good forces in the fight against evil. Each angel has a special aura that assists in their individual tasks, and each angel delivers certain types of messages and performs other duties for the angelic hosts. While most angels live in the enlightened realm of Nirvana, some serve the forces of Heaven and Elysium, especially in the case of the angel empyreal lords within those two realms. Angels organize themselves into choirs depending on their ranks and roles.
Solar.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

ZuY8xngBTZhm5ag1.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

h0EZFRSOjyHLlf5b.name: 侦测阵营(恒定法术,仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (Constant) (Evil only)
h0EZFRSOjyHLlf5b.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

Fzzx1tAOIDLb7AC0.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
Fzzx1tAOIDLb7AC0.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

cMsllioMOMLPtc53.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
cMsllioMOMLPtc53.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

lSIa7PfqOouOg8nP.name: 解除魔法(随意施法) Dispel Magic (At will)
lSIa7PfqOouOg8nP.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

jRw5SkXrC7GWOpXb.name: 移除恐惧(随意施法) Remove Fear (At will)
jRw5SkXrC7GWOpXb.description:
你通过一次接触来平缓一个生物的恐惧。你可以尝试反制目标正承受的一个恐惧效果。这只会令目标得到解脱，不包括该恐惧效果的其他目标。

升阶 (6环级) 该法术的射程增加到30尺，并且你能以至多10个生物为目标。

b88vNXkalAte3tvf.name: 复原术(随意施法) Restoration (At will)
b88vNXkalAte3tvf.description:
回复魔法反制目标上的毒素或者状态，令其得以全力施展其能力。当你施放复原术时，选择缩减状态或者弱化毒素。一个生物每天只能从一个复原术中受益，并且它的某一次感染毒素只能受益于复原术一次。

  • 弱化毒素 减少目标正承受的一种毒素的阶段1级。这无法将阶段降低到1级以下或者治愈该苦难。
  • 缩减状态 减少目标的 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled} 或 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied} 状态2点。你可以改为减少两种所列的状态各1点。

升阶 (4环级) 将 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained} 状态增加到你能缩减的状态列表中。当你弱化毒素时，减少阶段2级。你可以获得第三个选项，你可以减少目标的 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed} 值1点。你不能使用这个选项来减少永久毁灭状态。

升阶 (6环级) 如4环级复原术，但是如果你在施放该法术时增加一个施法动作和一个材料成分，并在此时提供100gp的钻石尘作为消耗，你可以减少一个永久毁灭状态。

NjjDQDdWwJEhS8MF.name: 次元锚(随意施法) Dimensional Anchor (At will)
NjjDQDdWwJEhS8MF.description:
你妨碍目标传送以及在次元之间旅行的能力。次元锚会尝试反制任何传送效果，以及任何移动目标到另一个位面的效果。法术持续时间由目标的意志豁免决定。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 该效果持续时间为1分钟。

失败 该效果持续时间为10分钟。

大失败 该效果持续时间为1小时。

iQNp3D21Ql8PiDZA.name: +3 Major Striking Greatsword
iQNp3D21Ql8PiDZA.description: This immense two‑handed sword is nearly as tall as its wielder. Its lower blade is often somewhat dulled to allow it to be gripped for extra leverage in close‑quarter fights.

mANOW81qmnDzn8ZY.name: +3 Major Striking Longbow
mANOW81qmnDzn8ZY.description: This 5‑foot‑tall bow, usually made of a single piece of elm, hickory, or yew, has a powerful draw and is excellent at propelling arrows with great force and at an extreme distance. You must use two hands to fire a longbow, and it can't be used while mounted.

qHEzK4MngkQB6vhD.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

ZiB2QG6oo1w3v4H2.name: Aura of Protection
ZiB2QG6oo1w3v4H2.description:
20 feet.

Allies in the solar's aura gain a +2 status bonus to AC against evil creatures and a +2 status bonus to saves against effects from evil creatures. The bonus increases to +4 against control by evil creatures and attacks by evil summoned creatures. When the solar or an ally is hit by an attack from a creature in the aura, that foe must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:43|traits:incapacitation] save or be blinded for 1 minute (this is an incapacitation effect). It's then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Y9QK094iVscecdmW.name: Animate Weapon
Y9QK094iVscecdmW.description:
触发 The solar hits with a melee weapon Strike while Animate Weapon is not already in effect

效果 The solar's weapon leaps into the air and moves with the solar as if held with both hands. The weapon gains the effects of the dancing weapon rune for 1 minute.

NZRABrBe5xEzlWlP.name: Arrow of Mortality
NZRABrBe5xEzlWlP.description:
The solar doesn't need to provide ammunition for their bow. When they draw their bow, they create a magical arrow of light that sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius until the end of the solar's next turn.

On a critical hit with the arrow, if the target has 75 or fewer Hit Points after taking the damage, it drops to 0 Hit Points and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying 1} (or, if it was already dying, increases its dying value by 3).

92YIjzpVzdYw3ZQC.name: Change Shape
92YIjzpVzdYw3ZQC.description:
The solar can take on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change their Speed or Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

gnL5MFzMfrbfAapT.name: Holy Armaments
gnL5MFzMfrbfAapT.description: Any weapon gains the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy} property rune while a solar wields it.

Soul Eater.name: Soul Eater
Soul Eater.publicNotes: Only the most desperate or foolhardy conjurers call upon the aid of these strange fiends from the inky swamps of Abaddon.

AJ75IwgP2pUKWDa2.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

Lt5U1QzZ5Wx4rMiJ.name: Caster Link
Lt5U1QzZ5Wx4rMiJ.description: A conjured soul eater forms a mental link with its conjurer. While both are on the same plane, the soul eater knows the location of its conjurer per its find target ability. If the soul eater's target dies before the soul eater can drain its soul, or if the soul eater is defeated (but not destroyed) by the target, the soul eater returns to its conjurer and tries to kill them.

YS1pxmdE8Ebmyy23.name: Find Target
YS1pxmdE8Ebmyy23.description: When a soul eater is conjured to the Material Plane to find a specific creature, it gains the benefits of a 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate} spell that isn't blocked by lead or running water. The conjurer must have seen the target and must speak the target's name while conjuring the soul eater in order to grant this ability.

lqG3xn6Di5qPS55E.name: Drain Soul
lqG3xn6Di5qPS55E.description:
需求 The soul eater is adjacent to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} creature

效果 The soul eater attempts to devour the dying creature's soul. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save. A creature that dies as a result of Drain Soul can't be restored to life except by a spell or ritual of 8th level or higher. If the soul eater that used Drain Soul on a creature is slain within 100 feet of that creature's corpse and the creature has been dead no longer than 1 minute, the creature's soul returns to its body and is restored to life, leaving the creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} and dying 1 but no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed}.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}, or increases its doomed value by 1 if it was already doomed.

失败 As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}.

大失败 As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 3}.

CwxYoKcoC0dSFuhX.name: Mind-Numbing Touch
CwxYoKcoC0dSFuhX.description:
When a soul eater hits a creature with its claw Strike, the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} on a critical failure).

Further damage dealt by the soul eater increases the stupefied value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of stupefied 4. This condition value decreases by 1 each time the creature gets a full night's rest. As long as the creature is stupefied by a soul eater, rest does not decrease any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} value that creature might have.

Spark Bat.name: Spark Bat
Spark Bat.publicNotes: Spark bats congregate around volatile weather in the Plane of Air.

qbm10J9qDUiFCQDn.name: Arc Lightning
qbm10J9qDUiFCQDn.description: The spark bat transforms into lightning that arcs to a large piece of metal within 100尺, such as a suit of metal armor or a metal weapon. The bat then returns to its normal form in a space adjacent to the metal. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Spear Frog.name: Spear Frog
Spear Frog.publicNotes: The spear frog is named for its toxin, which is traditionally used to envenom thrown projectiles like spears and daggers.

40BuHxitDl0hJDTK.name: Toxic Skin
40BuHxitDl0hJDTK.description: Anytime a creature touches the spear frog or an adjacent creature Strikes the spear frog with a melee attack, that creature is exposed to spear frog venom.

kzg3qoq55PGMljc3.name: Spear Frog Venom
kzg3qoq55PGMljc3.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

aYcG8JHXY8UJvVcF.name: Sticky尺
aYcG8JHXY8UJvVcF.description: Spear frogs are not flat-footed when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balancing} on a narrow surface, and they gain a +4 bonus to Reflex saves to avoid falling.

Specter.name: Specter
Specter.publicNotes:
When an evil mortal creature dies, it sometimes returns to haunt the area of its death as a specter, a hateful remnant, always seeking to slay others-particularly humanoids-in an attempt to distribute its pain among as many souls as it can. A specter maintains a strange semblance of its prior identity, but with a corrupted sense of purpose. It cannot be reasoned with.

A specter denied the opportunity to harm living humanoids grows increasingly agonized and irrational, akin to the mindset of a starving person forever denied a release from agony through death.

dr.exceptions: except force, ghost touch, or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical

Specter.languages: 心灵感应100 feet (With Spectral Thralls Only)

V9Ei1dwq0RUilrjT.name: 心灵感应100 feet (With Spectral Thralls Only)

RGaUdIjwMpgnNYGg.name: Pain Starvation
RGaUdIjwMpgnNYGg.description: A specter that goes for more than a month without dealing negative damage to a living humanoid becomes desperate and almost feral. It changes alignment from lawful evil to chaotic evil, loses control of any corrupted thralls it might have, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}. It can use its additional action only to make vile touch Strikes against humanoid targets. At the end of any turn in which it deals any amount of negative damage to a living humanoid, it reverts to lawful evil and is no longer quickened, but any thralls it lost control of remain free.

qh8LFXVLWjILfZZx.name: Sunlight Powerlessness
qh8LFXVLWjILfZZx.description: A specter caught in sunlight is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} for as long as it remains in the sunlight.

OSiq1CXChzTT7udW.name: Spectral Corruption
OSiq1CXChzTT7udW.description:
The specter makes a Vile Touch Strike. If it damages a living creature, the specter gains [[/r 5 #Temporary Hit Points]]{5 temporary Hit Points} and the target creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save to avoid becoming corrupted.

大成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to spectral corruption for 1 minute.

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for 1 hour.

失败 The creature succumbs to the corruption and becomes a spectral thrall temporarily. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} by the specter, obeying the specter's telepathic or spoken orders, though a spectral thrall does not obey obviously self-destructive orders. This lasts until the end of the thrall's next turn, at which point it is no longer controlled but becomes stupefied 2 for 1 hour.

大失败 As failure, but the duration is unlimited. The thrall can attempt a new Will save at the end of each of its turns; on a success, it is no longer controlled by the specter but becomes stupefied 2 for 1 hour.

Spiral Centurion.name: Spiral Centurion
Spiral Centurion.publicNotes:
These mechanical constructs were created to serve as guardians in an ancient and bygone era, although exactly who made them and the secrets of their construction have long since been lost to history. From the waist up, they resemble humanoids made of metal, but from the waist down their bodies take the form of spinning metal tops ringed with blades, which excel at cutting down nearby foes. Most spiral centurions can be directed to stand down with a password, although often these command phrases have been lost to the mists of time. In rare cases, a spiral centurion may also wield manufactured weapons or a shield in addition to its built-in weapons, giving it access to additional actions besides those listed below.

Most spiral centurions are hundreds or even thousands of years old, only staying functional because of the powerful magic used in their creation. Still, millennia of neglect have caused many spiral centurions to develop small glitches or malfunctions.

gPcAYqbYyOADoHwc.name: Top-Heavy
gPcAYqbYyOADoHwc.description: A spiral centurion's top-like design makes it susceptible to effects that would cause it to fall prone. The DC of any attempt to knock the spiral centurion @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} is reduced by 5. If the spiral centurion attempts a check or saving throw to resist being knocked prone, it takes a -5 status penalty. A spiral centurion that has been knocked prone can't use any actions other than to attempt to Stand, but it must succeed at a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:30] check to do so.

xijGvHanHygeHGCM.name: Hurl Blade
xijGvHanHygeHGCM.description:
The spiral centurion hurls one of its blades with an angled spin to ensure a swooping flight path. The blade deals [[/r {6d6}[slashing]]]{6d6 slashing伤害} to each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:40] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save).

At the start of the spiral centurion's next turn, the blade swoops around and returns along the same flight path, again dealing [[/r {6d6}[slashing]]]{6d6 slashing伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save) to each creature along the same line.

LOsTy4ZSFM2RSN4k.name: Rev Up
LOsTy4ZSFM2RSN4k.description:
需求 The spiral centurion has not acted yet this turn

效果 The spiral centurion Strides up to its Speed. It then gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls until the end of its turn.

3cCzIUJ7cXhefnQ1.name: Whirling Death
3cCzIUJ7cXhefnQ1.description: The spiral centurion spins furiously in place, its blades extended to slice through nearby creatures. It makes up to five melee blade Strikes. No single creature can be targeted by more than one blade Strike during one use of this ability. These attacks count toward the spiral centurion's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks are made.

Spirit Naga.name: Spirit Naga
Spirit Naga.publicNotes:
In naga culture, the foul-tempered, unkempt spirit naga holds a contemptible place similar to that of hags in humanoid cultures. These decrepit creatures live out lives of solitude, sought out only by those who are foolish or brave enough to think they can benefit from the spirit naga's powers without paying a heavy price-for most who dare to show such hubris, the price is their own lives.

Spirit nagas seek out desolate ruins and places long associated with death and corruption. These sinister, serpentine beings can be found in abandoned graveyards, crumbled fortresses, rotting swamps, and blighted woodlands. Though they may know little of the actual history of such places, the nagas are nonetheless attracted to the psychic remnants of evil deeds and tormented spirits that remain within the earth and stones there.

Despite their hideous appearance and treatment as pariahs by other nagas, spirit nagas feel a profound pride in their abilities and even in their hermetic existences. They see themselves as connected to a greater force whose mysteries are revealed only to those who can cast off the trappings and morals of "civilized" society. Even so, spirit nagas gleefully accept the worship of other creatures willing to bow to their capricious whims. They often form cults around themselves, using their charm spells and rituals to ensnare the minds of a few key individuals who spread the nagas' foul influence throughout a community.

Nagas are identifiable by their serpentine bodies and strange, humanlike heads. All nagas have magical abilities and great intelligence, which they combine to advance their own agendas.

yXsCXHBtJlv801hG.name: 飞行术 Fly
yXsCXHBtJlv801hG.description:
目标能够在空气中穿梭，获得等于其速度或者20尺的飞行速度，取较高者。

升阶 (7环) 该持续时间增加到1小时。

JAkbON2RxsaUuRL8.name: 卜筮术 Augury
JAkbON2RxsaUuRL8.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

bhHtf5BItsngQL42.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
bhHtf5BItsngQL42.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

Jspfa7SNI6gNhPK4.name: 巫团 Coven
Jspfa7SNI6gNhPK4.description:
A spirit naga adds @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.U58aQWJ47VrI36yP]{Hallucination}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9BnhadUO8FMLmeZ3]{Mind Probe}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion} to their coven's spells.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Coven]

QTnEqxIt2MaL0WlZ.name: Spirit Naga Venom
QTnEqxIt2MaL0WlZ.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1轮)

Sportlebore Swarm.name: Sportlebore Swarm
Sportlebore Swarm.publicNotes: A swarm of sportlebores is a much more dangerous foe than a single insect.

wugLYHXdCUg05j8X.name: Sportlebore Infestation
wugLYHXdCUg05j8X.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

阶段1 carrier with no ill effect (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1 hour)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1 hour)

阶段4 [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6钝击伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|basic:true] save) as the host painfully vomits out a sportlebore swarm and returns to stage 1

dl10m47AKrgF3eVj.name: Pour Down Throat
dl10m47AKrgF3eVj.description:
触发 A creature in the sportlebore swarm's area speaks, uses a verbal component, or opens its mouth

效果 A portion of the sportlebore swarm attempts to surge down the throat of the triggering creature, which must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|traits:damaging-effect] save.

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 The creature gets a mouthful of sportlebores. It spits the insects out and avoids further damage, but it can't speak for 1 round, and if it was performing a verbal spellcasting action, the spell fails and the caster wastes the action.

失败 The creature takes [[/r {4d6}[piercing]]]{4d6穿刺伤害} from sportlebore bites, can't speak for 1 round, and loses a spell as noted under Success.

大失败 As failure, but the creature is also exposed to sportlebore infestation.

zE1qMdAfyFxOdrrK.name: Swarming Bites
zE1qMdAfyFxOdrrK.description: Each creature in the sportlebore swarm's area takes [[/r {4d6}[piercing]]]{4d6穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true] save).

Spriggan Bully.name: Spriggan Bully
Spriggan Bully.publicNotes: The typical spriggan is a bully who prefers to take live prisoners in fights, but only to ensure that they have a large stock of living victims to torment, tease, and abuse. They train to use weapons in nonlethal ways that inflict the maximum amount of pain even as they guard against accidental death. When not bullying prisoners or hunting for new victims, spriggan bullies enjoy drinking, watching others fight, and fighting among themselves.

kM1AoSQF8Q3phCJt.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

bN7RCHuZpCHYpb2L.name: Enraged Growth
bN7RCHuZpCHYpb2L.description:
触发 The spriggan bully takes damage

效果 The spriggan bully grows to Large size, along with their equipment (which returns to natural size if removed). The spriggan bully's reach increases by 5 feet. They regain 5 Hit Points and gain a +2 status bonus to melee attacks and damage rolls. This effect continues until the end of the spriggan bully's next turn, but on any turn in which the spriggan bully deals damage to another creature and is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}, the effect extends until the end of the following turn.

When Enraged Growth ends, the spriggan bully is fatigued for 1 hour.

5CgVbeYygEXhZf6y.name: Bully's Bludgeon
5CgVbeYygEXhZf6y.description: The spriggan bully makes a morningstar Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. This attack is nonlethal.

9bkFg1e33lRT8urN.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
9bkFg1e33lRT8urN.description:
The spriggan bully's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Spriggan Warlord.name: Spriggan Warlord
Spriggan Warlord.publicNotes: While the leaders of larger spriggan enclaves tend to be uniquely trained warriors with highly specialized skills, spriggan warlords are fond of the traditional spriggan weaponry of morningstar and crossbow, valuing this traditional fighting style for its simplicity and for using both weapons to their full potential. Spriggan warlords often serve as sub-commanders in large groups, filling roles in spriggan society akin to captains of the guard or bodyguards to spriggan royalty. In smaller groups or remote outposts, a single spriggan warlord is typically in charge of a band of spriggan bullies.

IoKSTbFElqXPiGiX.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

shoUZGVA0Hg78nbc.name: 飞行术 Fly
shoUZGVA0Hg78nbc.description:
目标能够在空气中穿梭，获得等于其速度或者20尺的飞行速度，取较高者。

升阶 (7环) 该持续时间增加到1小时。

iHz93nPS055VlpTQ.name: +1 Crossbow
iHz93nPS055VlpTQ.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.

xrKfhlv0heNZjJQl.name: +1 Morningstar
xrKfhlv0heNZjJQl.description: This weapon has a short shaft ending in a metal ball studded with spikes.

OKH1R1FoBSEm3oKP.name: Enraged Growth
OKH1R1FoBSEm3oKP.description:
触发 The spriggan warlord takes damage

效果 The spriggan warlord grows to size Large, along with their equipment (which returns to natural size if removed). The spriggan warlord's reach increases by 5 feet. They regain 15 Hit Points and gain a +2 status bonus to melee attack and damage rolls.

This effect continues until the end of the spriggan warlord's next turn, but on any turn in which the spriggan warlord deals damage to another creature and is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}, the effect extends until the end of the following turn.

When Enraged Growth ends, the spriggan warlord is fatigued for 1 hour.

YHmyiWDMvEgujfl1.name: Bully's Bludgeon
YHmyiWDMvEgujfl1.description: The spriggan warlord makes a morningstar Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. This attack is nonlethal.

7kGu1ORgE4Nay79B.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
7kGu1ORgE4Nay79B.description:
The spriggan warlord's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

FapwAUPhHeXc1NKj.name: Warlord's Training
FapwAUPhHeXc1NKj.description: A spriggan warlord has access to the critical specialization effects for crossbows and morningstars, and the reload of any crossbow they wield is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Star Archon.name: Star Archon
Star Archon.publicNotes: Embodiments of the virtue of prudence, star archons serve as philosophers and administrators, and in times of war as the tacticians, strategists, and generals of archon armies. Star archons burn with the glory and intensity of a sun, and their sense of duty and desire to defeat evil are as indefatigable as the light of the stars. While their dazzling intellects and unmatched strategic cunning make them most useful in war rooms rather than on battlefields, star archons are fierce opponents when motivated to enter the fray. Those who witness the self-sacrifice of a star archon and live to tell the tale describe the experience in terms that might befit the sight of a supernova at the instant the star collapses in on itself.
Star Archon.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

oJLAT2NTlht6zFtA.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

mzVH7SLTrdxDaZ3j.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
mzVH7SLTrdxDaZ3j.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

y12tfuxEBFbR9qgU.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
y12tfuxEBFbR9qgU.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

mjBHvn4bdXCaG65R.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
mjBHvn4bdXCaG65R.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

KRlaXOK9VXp9mlCh.name: +2 Greater Striking Starknife
KRlaXOK9VXp9mlCh.description: From a central metal ring, four tapering metal blades extend like points on a compass rose. When gripping a starknife from the center, the wielder can use it as a melee weapon. It can also be thrown short distances.

3KU5Y0WaS2TkXwb0.name: +2 Greater Resilient Full Plate
3KU5Y0WaS2TkXwb0.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor and a pair of gauntlets.

LPLiXKoxMuJu4ifi.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

xmYe9vSGZokROsE8.name: Blinding Soul
xmYe9vSGZokROsE8.description:
Whenever the star archon takes slashing damage, bright light pours from their wounds. Non-archons within 10 feet must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] save.

On a failure, a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} instead.

The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 round.

XuX1YKa36ctJmZJH.name: Explosive Rebirth
XuX1YKa36ctJmZJH.description:
When killed, the star archon explodes in a blinding flash of holy energy that deals [[/r {12d6}[fire]]]{12d6火焰伤害} and [[/r {12d6}[good]]]{12d6善良伤害} to anything in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true] save.

A non-archon creature that sees the explosion and critically fails its save is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} as well.

The slain star archon reincarnates [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} later as a shield archon.

x3aksJFYweZk98OP.name: Retributive Strike
x3aksJFYweZk98OP.description:
伤害降低 21

A star archon can also make a Retributive Strike by throwing its starknife, and the enemy and ally can be within 60 feet instead of 15 feet.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.RetributiveStrike]

NqdW9zuvmBwHZScr.name: Archon's Door
NqdW9zuvmBwHZScr.description: Once per day, if an archon sees another creature cast dimension door, the archon can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door} (heightened to 5th level) within 1 round to attempt to follow that creature to the maximum distance of the archon's dimension door. If the archon's dimension door has enough distance, the archon appears the same distance and direction from the creature as before either creature used dimension door.

OJA9CljFVtmCuzlZ.name: Prudent Asterism
OJA9CljFVtmCuzlZ.description:
The star archon calculates a celestial constellation and sends their starknife flying along that path from one foe to the next. It makes a starknife Strike against a target within 60 feet. If the Strike hits, it can make another Strike at a different target within 60 feet of the first target, and so on, until it misses with a Strike or runs out of targets it hasn't attacked within range of the most recent target.

The star archon can attack a given target only once per use of this ability. These attacks don't apply any range increment penalty, and the star archon resolves all the attacks before increasing the multiple attack penalty.

Steam Mephit.name: Steam Mephit
Steam Mephit.publicNotes: These brash and arrogant creatures are among the more energetic mephits. They are quick to nominate themselves the leaders of any group, barking out orders in shrill, high-pitched voices and insisting on having everything done their way. Even when they aren't bossing others around, the constant hiss of steam escaping from their pores ensures that there is never a quiet moment.
Steam Mephit.hp: (快速愈合2 (in boiling water or steam))

0IwQxSLxEqwPcB3q.name: Steam Vision
0IwQxSLxEqwPcB3q.description: The steam mephit ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from mist and steam.

CpVMSme8RWwiT0UY.name: 快速愈合2 (in boiling water or steam)

uyXWXmerHoFxX1jU.name: Boiling Rain
uyXWXmerHoFxX1jU.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The steam mephit calls down a rain boiling water that surrounds them in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]. Creatures in the area take [[/r {2d8}[fire]]]{2d8火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] save), and small unattended flames (such as torches) are extinguished.

j9L9BPR6t7eHpHAt.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
j9L9BPR6t7eHpHAt.description:
The steam mephit spits a cloud of steam in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害} to each creature within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] save).

The steam mephit can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Stingray.name: Stingray
Stingray.publicNotes: Found in salt or fresh water, stingrays are normally passive creatures, but when threatened or cornered, they lash out with their tails to lance foes with their toxic stingers. Stingrays often bury themselves in mud, sand, or sea grass, and unfortunately for those wading in shallow waters, stepping on an unseen stingray is a surefire way to receive a painful sting.

r3hGo7TAQ3TtGwLY.name: Electrolocation
r3hGo7TAQ3TtGwLY.description: A stingray in water can use its electrolocation as an imprecise sense at the listed range to detect living creatures that are in the same body of water as itself.

c2nQF7qTMD3mwnrM.name: Stingray Venom
c2nQF7qTMD3mwnrM.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

Striding Fire.name: Striding Fire
Striding Fire.publicNotes: An embodiment of the speed and chaos of a spreading blaze, a striding fire appears as a lithe and long-limbed humanoid composed of shifting-hued flames churning within a skeleton-like framework.

7B1Q0p1BKuDwOEoo.name: Smoke Vision
7B1Q0p1BKuDwOEoo.description: The striding fire ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from smoke.

up0HVVMUk86V0DdT.name: Burning Rush
up0HVVMUk86V0DdT.description:
The striding fire Strides up to double its Speed in a straight line. Its movement during this Stride doesn't trigger reactions. Any creature the striding fire was adjacent to at any point during this Stride must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save. If it critically fails, it is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} by a wave of heated air.

The striding fire can't use Burning Rush for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Stygira.name: Stygira
Stygira.publicNotes:
Withered hermits wrapped in tattered rags, these scarred, eyeless creatures command strange secrets of the earth and interpret the fateful energies of the subterranean depths. In some regions, stygiras are worshipped as seers or even gods, although they lack the ability to grant spells to clerics and are often not aware of their worshippers at all. In other areas, they have strange ties to the ancient empires of the cyclopes, often dwelling in the oversized ruins those creatures left behind long ago. To many stygiras, gemstones harvested from ancient cyclopean mosaics have even greater magical properties than other crystals.

Although technically blind, stygiras do have vestigial eyes hidden beneath the stony, scarred flesh of their faces. Capable of sensing bright lights even through their scars, stygiras are sickened and distracted by these flashing glimpses, so they keep to their caves during the day and wander into the world above only after nightfall. Far from benevolent, they seek out unwary travelers or explorers to capture and reduce them down to the base chemicals and supernatural humors the stygiras require to infuse gemstones with the capacity to give them sight and magical power.
Stygira.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值

SITpZWO5sj03l95G.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

uRbNro9mLAqvYrrE.name: 卜筮术 Augury
uRbNro9mLAqvYrrE.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

fiKhFiynAYN8X5if.name: Gemsight
fiKhFiynAYN8X5if.description: As long as the stygira holds a gemstone, they can see through the gem with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.qCCLZhnp2HhP3Ex6]{Darkvision} and the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing}. The stygira is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} when they are not holding a gem in a hand.

LqnyBEmxdZr7oIfJ.name: Light Sickness
LqnyBEmxdZr7oIfJ.description: A stygira in an area of bright light is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

gYBpkJDYJYKODQRK.name: Gem Gaze
gYBpkJDYJYKODQRK.description:
The stygira holds aloft a gem and gazes into the mind of a creature within 30尺, infusing the creature's thoughts with visions of the creature's own dead body slowly petrifying.

The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} on a critical failure).

pSl7SmKRkTYkQI1N.name: Stone Curse
pSl7SmKRkTYkQI1N.description: Wounds dealt by the stygira's claws leave the flesh bleached of color and turn the blood that runs from them dark gray. Each time a creature is damaged by the stygira's claw Strike, it must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save or become permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (slowed 2 on a critical failure) as its flesh stiffens like stone. If a creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points from the stygira's claw Strike and fails the saving throw against stone curse, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified}. A creature that spends 8 hours in direct sunlight can attempt a new saving throw to remove the effects of stone curse, even if it has been petrified.

Suli Dune Dancer.name: Suli Dune Dancer
Suli Dune Dancer.publicNotes:
Because their genie forebears are native to the Material Plane, sulis are by and large the most common geniekin on the Material Plane. They are often artisans and peace brokers, compelled to try and bring harmony and balance in a world wrought with discord.

Sulis have a natural charm that often eludes other geniekin, but tend to layer on a level of boastful pride or even arrogance as a personal quirk or humorous facade. Few non-sulis realize that bragging is not simply the symptom of a puffed-up ego for sulis, but instead is a cultural institution easily comparable to human poetry. Sulis' boasts not only glorify themselves, but also secure their companions' and families' accomplishments in history, with the ultimate goal of spinning stories that will be retold for generations. This is especially true for sulis who have lived with other geniekin and have been seen as lesser for not having a strong connection to an Elemental Plane.

Suli dune dancers are but one way these geniekin seek to integrate with other humanoid societies. They work to hone their skills at boasting to an extent that their claims help to bolster those they travel with. Suli from regions other than deserts adjust their names to match their terrains, but regardless of whether they prefer forests, hills, or arctic plains, their boasts remain as compelling.

nktnO0aAYu7JllFI.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
nktnO0aAYu7JllFI.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

pIbaFSljYvozaZdG.name: Tambourine (Handheld Musical Instrument)
pIbaFSljYvozaZdG.description: Handheld instruments include bagpipes, a small set of chimes, small drums, fiddles and viols, flutes and recorders, small harps, lutes, trumpets, and similarly sized instruments. The GM might rule that an especially large handheld instrument (like a tuba) has greater Bulk. Heavy instruments such as large drums, a full set of chimes, and keyboard instruments are less portable and generally need to be stationary while played.

D89GcjloR9CLNbq8.name: Elemental Bulwark
D89GcjloR9CLNbq8.description:
触发 An enemy is about to damage the dune dancer with cold, electricity, or fire, or with a spell that has the air, earth, fire, or water trait

效果 The dune dancer gain resistance 2 against the triggering damage

1Kmvtn64DZibqUls.name: Elemental Assault
1Kmvtn64DZibqUls.description:
Elemental magic fills the dune dancer's body or weapon. The dune dancer chooses one element and makes a melee Strike. The Strike deals an additional [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4伤害} of the indicated type and has the trait corresponding to the element:

  • Air electricity
  • Earth bludgeoning
  • Fire fire
  • Water cold

Sunflower Leshy.name: Sunflower Leshy
Sunflower Leshy.publicNotes:
Sunflower leshys are the ambassadors and social leaders of their kind. Their petals radiate from their heads in various hues with a serrated, leafy, beard-like ruff. When particularly excited, their eyes and petals glow with collected sunlight, and when they become depressed or saddened, their usually vibrant coloration grows correspondingly muted. These shifts in coloration are echoed in sunflower leshy art, which can lead to unexpected color palettes for artworks. For example, a human artist might illustrate Hell as a place of glowing lava and flickering flames, drawing upon many vibrant colors, but to a sunflower leshy, the only proper way to depict a place like Hell is in morose grays, blacks, and whites.

The more adventurous sunflower leshys leave their communities to grow bonds with nearby settlements of humanoids. When interacting with humanoids, sunflower leshys are some of the most likely to act friendly and give strangers a chance to prove their good intentions, though they remain cautious. They're often accompanied by other, more powerful leshys.

E283z5pYuHL8XdzA.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

LQBlltvEb0rVnJYA.name: Heliotrope
LQBlltvEb0rVnJYA.description:
20 feet

需求 The sunflower leshy begins its turn in an area of bright light

效果 The sunflower leshy reflects the sun or another source of bright light from their face. Each creature that ends its turn in the emanation must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:16] save.

成功 The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to heliotrope for 24 hours.

失败 The creature is distracted by the light, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} for 1 round.

大失败 As failure, but the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round.

G3Qoqz5IMBvs9EYb.name: Verdant Burst
G3Qoqz5IMBvs9EYb.description:
When a sunflower leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from its body, restoring [[/r {1d8}[healing]]]{1d8 Hit Points} to each plant creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. This area immediately fills with sunflowers, becoming difficult terrain.

If the terrain is not a viable environment for these sunflowers, they wither after 24 hours.

LwAD4kqFgkuoaJ0b.name: Change Shape
LwAD4kqFgkuoaJ0b.description:
The sunflower leshy transforms into a Small flower. This ability otherwise uses the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Tree Shape}.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

h20KMmp1wuDSm1Oa.name: Seed Spray
h20KMmp1wuDSm1Oa.description:
The sunflower leshy launches a deluge of seeds from their head in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], dealing [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6钝击伤害} to creatures within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:16|basic:true] save).

It gains a +2 status bonus to this damage against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} creatures.

The sunflower leshy can't use Seed Spray again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}.

Sylph Sneak.name: Sylph Sneak
Sylph Sneak.publicNotes:
Born with elemental gales coursing through their breath, sylphs are wispy planar scions whose bodies seem caught in a perpetual, gentle breeze. Born of unions between mortals and djinn, sylphs are quick-witted and creative, but they are prone to flights of fancy and tend to be easily distracted.

Sylphs are notorious for their practice of "listening to the wind," which most others dismiss as a fancy name for eavesdropping. Yet this custom means much more to sylphs, who spend hours listening to the stories brought to them on the proverbial breeze. While some less scrupulous sylphs may use the information they learn to blackmail or abuse others, most of them see listening to the wind as their way of staying connected to the world around them while still keeping it comfortably at arm's length. Certainly the typical sylph sneak doesn't seek to use what they learn for ill, but instead tries to warn others of dangers yet unrealized or to prepare themself for a dangerous task.

sRJgd3DpiEABxebP.name: Deflecting Gale
sRJgd3DpiEABxebP.description:
触发 The sylph sneak is the target of a physical ranged attack

需求 The sylph sneak is aware of the attack

效果 A swift gale whips up between the sylph sneak and the source of the ranged attack, giving the sneak a +3 status bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the wind deflected it. The wind can't deflect unusually large or heavy ranged projectiles (such as boulders or ballista bolts).

HhUiMTB8Qa8ySlVM.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
HhUiMTB8Qa8ySlVM.description:
The sylph sneak's Strikes deal 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

DcQizfyqoLcJASk7.name: Surprise Attacker
DcQizfyqoLcJASk7.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the sylph sneak.

U64zKLjgQG2MzhAS.name: Wind's Guidance
U64zKLjgQG2MzhAS.description: When the sylph sneak attacks with a thrown weapon, the range increment increases by 10 feet.

Taiga Giant.name: Taiga Giant
Taiga Giant.publicNotes:
Taiga giants prefer a nomadic lifestyle, both to keep from depleting any one area's resources while satiating their massive appetites and to satisfy a constant wanderlust. They are deeply spiritual and frequently commune with their ancestors' spirits for guidance and knowledge. Taiga giants are happiest when they are left alone to live out their traditional lives, and their impressive size and strength are enough to persuade all but the most dangerous foes to do so.

Taiga giants subsist on migratory herds of aurochs, mammoths, and elk. They occasionally raid humanoid villages, but such cases are opportunistic rather than malicious, with a focus on stealing away livestock for food rather than people. Nevertheless, the arrival of a group of taiga giants is a potentially devastating event to any town or village, so many communities attempt to placate the giants by creating a yearly offering at those times when they know the giants are scheduled to come close.

Most taiga giants venerate their ancestors and seek to honor their works in everything they do. This deep connection makes them ferociously proud of those legacies, and little can compel taiga giants to go to war more swiftly than insulting their ancestors. Merely mentioning the false rumors that ancient taiga giant spellcasters were responsible for the creation of the first rune giants is a surefire way to earn a taiga giant's unending wrath.

A taiga giant stands 20 feet tall and weighs 10,000 pounds.
Taiga Giant.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. enchantment and illusion effects

dNIO5C35HeSGtxDD.name: See Invisibility
dNIO5C35HeSGtxDD.description: A taiga giant can see invisible creatures and objects as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} to the taiga giant.

x1avaIq02Cr7LmNs.name: +2 Status Bonus on Saves vs. Enchantment and Illusion Effects

XrJk8sW9W9FE8rtL.name: Guardian Spirit
XrJk8sW9W9FE8rtL.description:
触发 The taiga giant has Ancestral Guardian active and would take energy or mental damage

效果 The taiga giant's ancestral spirits intervene and protect the giant from taking up to 20 energy damage or 30 mental damage. The giant takes any remaining damage; if it does, the spirits depart and the giant is no longer protected by the ancestors.

TW4FUgjb7YgD89jt.name: Ancestral Guardian
TW4FUgjb7YgD89jt.description:
需求 The taiga giant must be protected by the ancestors

效果 The taiga giant calls upon their ancestors' spirits to rise up and protect them, causing a cloak of spectral faces to shimmer and swirl around them. The taiga giant's AC increases to 34 until the start of its next turn.

Ir6SQ9XsXTFTSPKi.name: Protected by the Ancestors
Ir6SQ9XsXTFTSPKi.description: A taiga giant's prayers to their ancestors grant them spiritual protection.
